story:
Hais Scrubs 

 

I started the idea of Hais scrubs 3 years ago, it wasn't until last year that I got the courage to actually start and put it into action. I have been in the medical field for over 5 years from being in school to working as an X-tech  and now being accepted in to Penn State for PA school. I have a few idea into what females want and need in scrubs.  Starting something new during this pandemic is hard and scary but If not know when? 

Hais will be locally produce I made my own fabric and my own tech packs, even though they do have a lot of different scrubs out there I made them suitable for people that like to feel confident and stylish while working. I know these are hard time for everyone and that was the scariest part about it all, not knowing were this is going to go but I'm glad I took the initiative and exited for the next step. 

Thank you stay safe.

story:
HART: THE NEW STANDARD IN BLUE-LIGHT GLASSES

Premium eco-friendly materials with unparalleled blue-light blocking lenses. Partner with 1% for the Planet.

The digital world is here. For many of us, the glow of a phone's screen is the first and last thing we see each day. We live our lives through cameras and apps, typing more than we speak. We are overworked and overstimulated. We are both wired and exhausted. Then, when we finally get the chance to rest, we can’t slow our brains down. We are all being forced to find our new normal, to decide on our own balance, and all, it seems, without any real guidance. 

You might’ve heard of blue-light, the high-energy rays that beam from our favorite devices, and if you’ve been staring at a computer for the past year like us, you’ve probably experienced it yourself. Our recent increase in digital activity has not only sent our screen-time soaring to new heights, but also thrown off our sleep schedules, confusing our eyes and leading to new and unfamiliar problems.

By protecting melatonin production, restoring your natural sleep rhythm, and regulating your daily screen intake, HART Eyewear’s blue-light protective glasses are here to get you through your day with more energy and effectiveness. 

 

Doing Things Differently.

We're doing things a little differently. After noticing that other protective lenses on the market were either using dyes or blue-light filter coatings, a rather ineffective solution, we developed something much better. Our proprietary process infuses the blue-light blocking compound into the lens material itself during the manufacturing process. This provides 10 times more protection than an external filter, especially against the most harmful frequency (455nm), with minimal distortion of color, and it will never wear off.

From our research, we know one lens can’t do it all, which is why we’ve developed two lenses for two purposes. 

All of our lenses are made of high-quality Grade A CR-39 material with scratch-resistance, 100% UVA, UVB, and UVC coverage, and anti-glare protection. 

 

Fashion with Function.

From Zoom calls, to design projects, to gaming marathons, our high-tech lenses are only effective if the frames can be worn comfortably for as long as you need.

We spent a year designing and testing shapes to come up with a diverse set that fits all face shapes and preferences, that will never go out of style. These light-weight, sleek designs are made to make you forget you're wearing them, until the compliments come pouring in!

 

Looking To The Future.

At HART, we know that a bright future means immediate action, which is why we’ve worked tirelessly to develop a sustainable product. It is our mission to make a big impact with a small footprint!

Most of our frames are made of cellulose acetate, a plant-based, biodegradable material with a high-quality feel. Our cases, microfiber cloths, packaging, inserts, and branded material are made with recycled materials and pared down to the smallest, most efficient shipping size. We also offer carbon neutrality credits to offset any shipment. At HART, we will never stop prioritizing the health of our planet as we strive to continuously improve and evolve our process.

 

Making an Impact.

Sustainability is only the first step, we’ve made a non-negotiable commitment to growing our positive impact on the planet in parallel with the growth of the company. We are so excited about our partnership with 1% for the Planet, committing 1% of our revenue towards an approved environmental non-profit. As we grow, so does our impact.

By supporting us, you are participating in a bigger movement to save our planet for future generations!

When you purchase our offer, you will get an email with a unique promo code per pair ordered, worth $99/each (the base price of our current frames with Day lenses) that you can use to pick out your frames on our website. These promo codes will never expire, so you are free to wait until new styles roll out or we launch our sunglass and prescription line (coming later 2021), to use each code.

Product will begin shipping in April 2021, in order of purchase date.

Note: Lens upgrades will come with an extra fee that is charged through the website at the time of purchase. 

 

*Sleep and Sunglass Lenses require a $25 lens upgrade fee, which will be paid for at checkout on our website. 

Each pair comes with a pair of glasses with our clear blue-blocking lens, a case and microfiber cloth, and a warm fuzzy feeling that you are contributing to a better tomorrow.

Thank you for joining our movement!

Steve Hart
Founder and CEO

story:
Short Summary

To keep it short, my name is Caroline and 2 years ago I decided that I'm going to start a brand called Dunni. Dunni was made to celebrate the power and joy of black and brown people. The products are beautiful, ethical head coverings that are made to protect textured hair.  

Dunni was created to empower Black and Asian people by continuing to show us in a way that is bold and reflects how we move. I want the designs to show the things we believe in, the great things we’ve created, our communities and our cultures. The fresh-take on head coverings are about who and how we are.

Dunni is set up as a sustainable social enterprise. The products are made from natural materials by fair-pay businesses and independent tailors across Africa. The aim is for Dunni to be a partner that supports other entrepreneurs in their own businesses, and to give further development opportunities to those who would like it.

I’m calling on anyone who believes in black businesses or that businesses and brands can be ethical, high quality and also service their communities. Will you support me as I put together a tangible and sustainable business? 

 

The Challenge

The challenge now is that I’m stepping up from sourcing fabrics to creating Dunni’s own designs. The picture above is one of many initial designs. Dunni is inclusive. It's made for all genders and non-gender conforming people to be a part of.

I want to make this, but don’t have the privilege of the start-up costs to make this happen, or the eyes of investors to put their wallets to back me. What I do have is myself (if you know me) and the people... it’s never failed yet, so I’d love your support in anyway that you can give it. 

I’ve successfully helped to grow many businesses across the UK and this will be the first time that I start my own! Covid-19 means that I’m no longer working and can support Dunni full-time.

 

The Impact

Reaching these milestones will allow me to do the following*:

  • £750 will help to set up, print and ship 1 design.
  • £2,000 will help to cover printing, finishing and set up costs for the first 2 designs.
  • £5,000 will support 4 designs to be printed and finished by multiple tailors across Africa.
  • £10,000 will help to set up our own production and fully equip all tailors with updated machinery.
  • £30,000 will support building our first production house and training for tailors across Africa.
  • £50,000 will support creating our own fabric printing factory. 

*I will not create this if it involves low pay, unethical practices and poor working conditions.

Anything after this will be split between other new black businesses for their start up costs or supporting their development as an alternate source to the current UK investment funds.

 

Other Ways You Can Help

If you can’t support financially right now then please:

  • Share this and help to make some noise
  • Follow the journey on Instagram! @dunni.studio

story:
There is an elegant simplicity to a quality watch and it does so much more than tell time. It tells people who you are. It can be subtle or the centrepiece of your unique sense of style.

Jac Neil is a new watch company founded with the goal of sharing with the world, our beautiful trendsetting designs that resonate with the culture of today, while still paying homage to the history and heritage of what traditionally makes a watch timeless.

Choosing a Jac Neil watch is about beauty, inspiration and celebrating life.

We make our watches with the consumer in mind, meaning that the quality of our watches are comparable with mid to high end watches costing $500 and up at a fraction of the cost. 

20+

 

When it comes to watches, consumers are faced with the dilemma of being able to get a high-quality timepiece without breaking the bank, which is where we come in. Each of our timepieces embodies the essence of the environment and represent how we interact with the world.

A  lot of care, planning and time has gone into designing our watches, keeping you the consumer in mind at all times. Our current selection watches our powered by Miyota Japanese quartz movements.

The Miyota cal. 2035
Miyota cal. 6P25
 

 

ISEDA (Nature) Collection

The Iseda Classic is the first watch we designed and released  and is made with the utmost care and dedication using quality materials. The clean, simple construction and practical functionality were designed for the true minimalist.  The case and watch band are made of real Zebrawood and Sandalwood and feature Miyota’s signature model Caliber 2035 movement

Specifications:

  • Watch Size: 42mm
  • Material: Zebrawood & Sandalwood
  • Colors: Brown Zebrawood & Black Sandalwood
  • Movement: Miyota cal. 2035
  • Accuracy: ±20 sec per month
  • Average Battery Life: 3 years
  • Warranty: 2 years

Features:

  • Shock detection: The SMART IC inside the movement will detect the external impact/shock and prevent hands from jumping. It will give you more flexibility for hands selection.
  • Super quick date adjusting: The date disc flips super quickly when the crown is turned for date adjusting.
  • Quick reset: The remarkable mechanism of Heart-shaped cam allows the two counters of second/minute chronograph to reset instantly. The center chronograph second hand is IC-controlled and reset smoothly.
  • 4 Beats hand movement: Center chronograph hand sweeps in 1/4 second increments.
  • Click feeling of push-button: Watch users will notice the premium value of the watches from the click of push buttons.

ILU (City) Collection

ILU means "city", and was designed to be simple yet versatile  to handle any situation or event. This will be the second style in our collection. This beautiful chronograph watch features a clean minimalist inspired look with a stainless steel case, Italian leather strap and a beautiful dial design. This collection is offered in both a 40mm and a larger 45mm case and is powered by Miyota's caliber 6P25. We already have prototypes and need your support to mass produce this beautiful addition to our collection.  

Specifications:

  • Watch Size: 40mm & 45mm
  • Case Material: Stainless Steel
  • Band Material: Genuine Italian Leather
  • Colors: Brown, Black and Blue
  • Movement: Miyota cal. 6P25
  • Accuracy: ±20 sec per month
  • Average Battery Life: 3 years
  • Warranty: 2 years

Features:

  • Shock detection: The SMART IC inside the movement will detect the external impact/shock and prevent hands jumping. It will give you more flexibility for hands selection.
  • Super quick date adjusting: The date disc flips super quickly when the crown is turned for date adjusting.
  • Quick reset: The remarkable mechanism of Heart-shaped cam allows the two counters of second/minute chronograph to reset instantly. The center chronograph second hand is IC-controlled and reset smoothly.
  • 4 Beats hand movement: Center chronograph hand sweeps in 1/4 second increments.
  • Click feeling of push button: Watch users will notice the premium value of the watches from the click of push buttons.

 

Help us raise $15,000.

We have self-funded the design and production of our first design, the ISEDA collection as well as the design and prototyping of our ILU collection to this point. With you backing and support, we will be able to continue the production and distribution of our beautiful trendy watches .

We also need funds to bring to life new amazing designs and style concepts that are sure to amaze and capture your imagination. 

 

 

 

Our brand needs pledging but above all, it needs your attention and interest! If you love this book and her approach as much as we do then please take a moment to click on one of our social media buttons.

 

 

 

 

 

Help us spread the word and get things started!

Hey, we have some lovely, romantic, and inspiring vidoes for you above. Please do not miss out on that. 
 
PRINT DESIGN & ILLUSTRATION
Our designers hand sketched each print passionately and added watercolor artistic effect to each print to create beautiful piece of art for women of today. Our prints are exclusive and copyrighted and you will not see our prints or artwork in any other brand. 
 
 
SUSTAINABLE FABRICS & PRINTING
We care for the environment and sustainability. In our quest to create a sustainable slow fashion brand our  merchandising team hand picked the natural and sustainable fabrics which are environment friendly and breathable for the skin. The team went further to not to get the fabrics printed in a conventional way but chose latest cutting-edge digital printing technology as the digital printing does not put strain on the water resources and at the same time it does not use any harmful dyes or colors. 
 
 
 
THE PRODUCTION PROCESS 
Our entire team is passionate to give to you a world-class garment and we keep in mind every detail and this includes the production process. Our garments are stitched with lot of attention to quality and detailing. Not only this the factories working for our brand are socially responsible. 
 
 
 
USP/FEATURES

Our entire collection is crafted from eco-friendly fabrics.
We believe in sustainable fashion and we have made deliberate efforts to craft the collection keeping in mind the environment. 
Our clothing line is slow-fashion and this means we do not believe in chasing trends. Our garments are of high quality and can be worn for a long time irrespective of the seasons.
As a brand we want to be socially responsible and we believe in fair wages and fair trades. The factories we work with are socially responsible factories.
Our garments are machine washable and can be maintained easily. 
 Our garments are made from 100% viscose fabric which does not need heavy ironing and are a perfect wear for everyday life. 

 
 

BEHIND THE SCENES: CITY & BEACH SHOOT
To portray the real vibe of the brand we went to beautiful cities of Southern Spain to do the video and photo shoot for our collection. As we are truly inspired by each and every element of Southern Europe, what place could have been better than Cadiz and Tarifa for the maiden shoot of our collection. 
 
 
 
BEHIND THE SCENES: THE  NATURE SHOOT
We truly love nature and all our inspiration comes from the nature and its beauty. To showcase our love for the nature and the natural beauty we shot our collection in lovely gardens and places which truly convey the story of the soul of our brand. 
 
 
INDIEGOGO SPECIALS: SHIRTS
Our design team crafted beautiful shirts from our exclusive artistic prints for the women of today. These shirts are crafted from 100% Viscose natural fabric. These shirts are perfect for all seasons and can be worn to work, in the evenings, at home, while having a stroll on the beach, or while just being yourself. These pack of shirts also make a perfect gift for someone you care about and you want to make them happy. 
 
 
INDIEGOGO SPECIALS: SCARVES
Scarves are a woman's best accessory and they are for all seasons and all reasons.  Crafted from lightweight 100% Viscose fabric and adorned with beautiful prints, they are perfect for all occasions and accentuate your style quotient with anything you wear. They are also a perfect gift for your loved ones and for that special person in your life. 
 
 
Our lovely model Claudia is truly inspired and  enjoying each moment in NRVNA MODE clothing line amidst the beautiful nature. 
 
 
Our  lovely model Nuria loving each moment in our collection which has been designed by the women of today and it's a celebration of femininity with LOVE, PASSION, & INSPIRATION.  

 
SIZE CHART
Please refer to the size chart before picking up the size for yourself and for your loved ones. Our sizes are comfortable and are perfect for all body types.
 
We thank you for the time  you spent on going through our campaign. We look forward to your support in this journey of creation of a romantic, artistic, and an inspiring slow fashion brand.

story:
Anjali Means Offering!

These clothes are our offering to the world. 

We are a 10 year old eco-conscious activewear & lifestyle brand that is made in the USA. 
We take tremendous pride in our work and it really lights us up whenever anyone connects to and appreciates our clothing. 
Our reviews speak for themselves!
For the Fall 2016 season we pushed ourselves to come up with the best collection we have ever done.  All of our prints and graphics are designed in house and are exclusive to Anjali.  Each piece is individually printed to ensure optimal quality and our production is locally sourced so that we can monitor every step of the process.

Press the Gallery Tab above to view multiple images of each piece that we offer.


What We Need & What You Get

We want to partner with the every day Yoga enthusiast to select our Fall Collection.

Pre-ordering a collection is usually only available to retailers and those orders are what determines what actually goes into bulk production.  We are offering you the opportunity to collaborate with us to decide what we make.

We are utilizing the Indiegogo platform to allow people to  select items through pledges of support.  Once the campaign period ends, each contributor will receive an order form so that they can choose their item, color and size.  In addition to giving each person a vote on what our final collection looks like, they will receive their selection before any retailer, shipped for free to anywhere in the world.  In order to encourage people to participate and to sweeten the deal even further, each participant will receive a discount code that they can use for a later purchase.

If you would like to support the campaign but are hesitant to commit just yet, we offer a discounted gift card that you can use at any time on our website for anything your heart desires at that time, Its a win, win. YAY!

Initial Goal

Our goal covers the production cost of our core offering, which includes 3 original print designs and our Embossed Baroque design.  That includes the cost of fabric, printing, cutting and sewing.  

Two of our prints, Versailles and Urban Jungle, are on a poly-spandex fabric made out of BPA free recycled plastic bottles.  

The Apex Dot is printed on a premium quality poly-spandex mid compression space dye. 

We are also offering the Embossed Baroque Performance range, a fabric that could easily go from Handstand to Happy Hour and our beloved Everyday pant, that is made from such a scrumptious fabric that you simply want to wear them every day! 

All fabrics have 4-way stretch for maximum mobility, quick drying capabilities, and are anti-microbial.

Scroll down to see full item details and size chart


The Pieces

We have put a lot of thought and care into developing these pieces.  We have designed them to serve you whatever activity you might be into.  We mean it when we say from Handstand to Happy hour!  We make Clothing for Living Yoga, whatever your Yoga is!

  • Our pieces are all made in the USA.
  • Our prints are sublimation printed, which is an environmentally responsible printing method that results in no water waste.
  • We utilize  flat-lock stitching for a smooth chafe-free experience.
  • All are true to size.
  • Our Leggings have a higher rise and waistband to ensure maximum  coverage and stability, as to keep you together through the stretchiest sweatiest of activities.

No Logos!

We don't put our logo on the outside of our clothes.  We don't feel that your Yoga Clothes should look any different from the rest of your wardrobe.  Only you should know who you are wearing.


Every pledge of support will come with a special Thank You card, which includes a 10% discount code that can be used for any future purchase on our website.


Sizing

Our sizing is pretty standardized and we work hard to maintain strict consistency.  The measurements below are approximate and there could be a small variation, but not enough to make a difference when choosing your size.

The waist measurements is taken on a flat garment.  and you should take into account that it's the measurement of elastic before it stretches.


Risks & Challenges

This is a low risk campaign.  Anjali has been in business for 10 years.  We work with some amazing production partners in New York & New Jersey and all of our fabrics are sourced from California.

We are subject to some production minimums like all companies are.  If any particular item does not receive enough support to move into production, we will offer you the option of selecting a different item or refund the contribution for that item.

The production time will take approximately 8 to 10 weeks and we anticipate being able to ship all rewards the first week of September.  We will of course keep you updated throughout the entire process.


Who we are & where we come from

Kristinn is originally from Iceland and Julissa is a born and raised New Yorker.  We met 25 years ago when we were paired to form a design team.  We have been together ever since, partners in life.  

Between the two of us we have over 30 years experience in the fashion world.  We each have 16years of Yoga practice and Julissa has been a Yoga teacher for 11 years and counting.

Over the years we have been featured in countless magazines and blogs and even dressed Justin Theroux' character Seth in the movie Wanderlust.


Other Ways You Can Help

We believe that Collaboration creates Community so even if you can't contribute to our campaign, please consider supporting us in another way.

  • Make some noise about our campaign. Tell your friends and help us spread the word.
  • Use the IndieGoGo sharing tools to share this campaign on Social Media.

Thank you so much for checking out our campaign!
story_txt:
Anjali Means Offering!
These clothes are our offering to the world. 
We are a 10 year old eco-conscious activewear & lifestyle brand that is made in the USA. 
We take tremendous pride in our work and it really lights us up whenever anyone connects to and appreciates our clothing. 

Our reviews speak for themselves!

For the Fall 2016 season we pushed ourselves to come up with the best collection we have ever done.  All of our prints and graphics are designed in house and are exclusive to Anjali.  Each piece is individually printed to ensure optimal quality and our production is locally sourced so that we can monitor every step of the process.Press the Gallery Tab above to view multiple images of each piece that we offer.

story:
About this project

Hi All!

Many thanks indeed for your interest and for believing in our Linea Icona project.

We are two 26 year old Italian interior designers working and living in London. 

About one year ago we have passionately initiated what you saw today, a new line wardrobe composed of 15 different elements. In this whole year we have developed the idea starting from the concept, via sketches, passed through a deep research, the 2D drawings, the 3D visuals, to finally create the prototype and this video.

We believe that through the crowdfunding we could realize our dream and our idea will finally have the opportunity to be a real success.

Thanks to the backers we are confident to reach our dream of creating an incredible new brand of smart furniture, starting developing the first 3 full lines of Linea Icona and partecipating at the best world design events without having to bear the costs, costs that as of today we definitely cannot afford and it's the reason why we want give our best thanks to INDIEGOGO that allow us to realize our dream.

As Interior Designers we thought that something was missing in the "closet world"; we have always seen big doors in the same finish completely hiding what was inside; the way people interpretate this type of furniture will change with Linea Icona.

Why don't give value to what is inside? .. Creating an "Icon" on the front door in order to show your best clothes. .. and .. why don't incorporate the latest technologies in order to make interactive even the furniture around you?

Now all this is possible! Stop spend too much time to dress up, now choosing your outfits will be more simple than ever and you will be also able to interact with your furniture with simple vocal commands.

Linea Icona will transform your idea of interior design!

Any single elements of Linea Icona is equipped with the latest Raspberry Pi 3 and it's programmed with "Ely" our A.I, which allows you to do a lot of cool things remotely by simply using your voice, for example you can:

Open the modules automatically - Turn on/off the Lights - Turn on/off the different light modes - Listen to time and weather of all cities - Listen to the stock market in real time - Use the notify & incoming call mode - Use the proximity mode - Use youtube to play any song - Play the best world radio to listen live news, sports and music - Use the voice memo recording function to set your schedule and needs on the calendar and listen to your memo whenever you want.

                                                                                

Furthermore for the more experienced  we will always upload on our website new codes and commands that can be directly loaded on their LINEA ICONA modules independently.

"Ask and Play" anything you need!  - Play with the elements and Create your style!

Only for INDIEGOGO bakers we created 3 beautiful gadjet as perks and 5 Linea Icona perks at a special Indiegogo price.

You can find more informations about our prototype, technology, product informations, colours and finishes available and about our gadjet perks in the image gallery below the video or on our website:  http://www.creativedesigncreations.com/

             

             

             

                                       "DEDICATED TO HER AS TO HIM"

 
      (you can also have the products with reduced depth, which is 45cm)
 
 
More informations on our website:  http://www.creativedesigncreations.com/

The project LINE ICONA will be fully functional and available for distribution within six month from the end of the campaign on Indiegogo. The prototype is fully functional, so we have to develop the entire line of modules in order to improve the interconnection between them and also perfect a few design details.
We do not expect any problems and we believe we will be able to deliver the modules within the right time.

More informations on our website:  http://www.creativedesigncreations.com/

The prototype is fully functional, so we have to develop the entire line of modules in order to improve the interconnection between them and also perfect a few design details.We do not expect any problems and we believe we will be able to deliver the modules within the right time.

story:
Made-to-order clothing that is reversible and detachable.

Customize it | Wear it 8 ways | Sell it back to us

 

 

 

You'll never have to worry about baggage limits again!

 

 

Stop making regret-purchases. You can sell your Dona Paula piece back to us using our pre-paid shipping label -- but only after you've worn it at least 8 times.

 

 

 

 

Choose your top, choose your bottoms, and then choose your print and colour(s) to your liking by using our interactive e-store (launching February 2018). For crowdfunding purposes, we've limited your customization options to print and colour(s). Please note that you will be able to choose your print/colours only after August 5th.

 

The average t-shirt is only worn 4 times before being discarded. We think that's ridiculous, so we've made all our garments reversible, and some can be detached into a top + bottoms. *Please note: The Martina and The Nadia are not detachable, only reversible*

 

But not before you prove to us that you've worn your Dona Paula piece at least 8 times. This is not a joke -- we are tired of seeing people give away their impulse purchases to second-hand stores, only for the majority of those clothes to end up in a landfill. We do not want our clothes to be part of the problem, and so we are establishing a take-back program! We will have our take-back program fully established to the public by July, 2018, but we will keep our campaign backers updated constantly.

 

Here's the Indiegogo Collection available for purchase. All Canadian orders get FREE SHIPPING throughout the campaign.

We hope to use Lenzing Micro-TENCEL® as the primary fabric for our garments -- it's an all-natural, breathable fibre made from wood pulp that feels like flower petals on your skin. When Tencel can't be dyed with certain prints, we will opt for another natural and sustainable fabric; your donations can help us research and test out the best fabric choices for our product!

 

 

Not quite feeling our current collection, or are you a person who just doesn't wear dresses and jumpsuits? Don't worry -- we get it. We're offering two great alternative perks, regardless of your age and gender.

And if you're feeling adventurous, consider an unforgettable experience in the place that inspired our collection:

If we exceed our goal of $30,000 to at least $50,000, one lucky donor and a friend will WIN a Goa Retreat!

 

 

We know -- $30,000 is a lot of money. But this is the bare minimum we would need to cover our loan repayment, producing rewards, and making an awesome e-store. If we exceed our goal -- even better! We can invest all that extra money into making more people aware of our brand and working on the first collection for when our e-store goes live.

story:
Who are we? 

ReCreativity is a social enterprise based in Budapest. We have been operating for over 4 years, organizing and running non-formal educational programs for young people to show them a sustainable way of living and support them to develop soft skills. These are skills they can utilise in their everyday life and on the labor market.

Young people are participating in these programs from all over Europe and shearing their knowledge with each other and the local (Hungarian) communities. In the non formal educational training programs we provide opportunity as trainers to young people to develop their skills and build a more personal and creative connection with the environment.

 

Cimbi is a fresh, up cycled bag brand of ReCreativity Social Enterprise. It has not only an environmental purpose but also strong social mission. We are passionate about sustainability and urban design. The bags are hand made by us, with a lot of love and care, we would like to share with as many people as possible.

Our partners

* Viasat 

*Oázis Gardening

*Mastercard

*Athenaeum Kiadó

 

What We Need & What You Get

What we need, is your support to make ReCreativity Social Enterprise grow, for us to be able to keep on creating a positive impact on the environment and society. 

  • You are going to get a piece of Cimbi, which represent everything that we believe in.
  • You will be part of our mission by supporting us on our journey.

You are going to receive a unique piece of Cimbi. These bags are special and one of a kind – it means you can not find two of the same from the same pattern. You will receive your Cimbi as You are going to choose (ONLY COLOR OPTION) dark or light. We are going to prepare it for You with love and care.

Aim of the campaign

The aim of our campaign is to have enough operational cost to grow for the coming one year. We are going develop our capacity and the production of the bags in order to make a bigger positive impact on society and the environment. As a result of the successful campaign we will be able to provide more educational opportunities for young people with difficult social background.
We are going to rent a space for storing the banners, creating new bags and have showroom.

YOU have the chance to change a young people’s life and create a positive impact on the environment at the same time. Your contribution will support a social enterprise to carry out its mission.

 

Perks

 

 

Materials and Features

The material is made from PVC (plastic) and it is durable. These materials are design mainly for outside also to bear extreme weather conditions. For this reason the material itself is durable and good for everyday use.

 

Banner Material

The base of the material is PVC, it is usually used to advertise large events. We use it for the inner and outer parts of the bags and accessories. The future of the banner materials is always chosen according to its main characteristics: color, patterns, thickness. Before recycling the banner materials they go through a cleaning process. It is strong and 100% waterproof as it is designed to resist all kinds of weather conditions.

Advertisement Net

The base of it is PVC, there are harder and softer versions of it, as well as densely and rarely weaved ones. They are hanged on buildings to advertise brands and events, their size can reach 200 square meters. We cut the large materials into smaller pieces in order to store and handle them easier. After cleaning the material we use it for the inner and outer parts of the bags.

Bicycle Inner Tubes

The material itself is rubber, we use the inner parts of used bicycle tires. You will find it on the selvedge of the bags, it sticks together the bags and gives a form to them.

Seat Belt

We use the seat belts of wreck cars for the strap of the bags. It makes the bag more durable and it is long enough to give you option about the lengths.

 

The Impact

This campaign is complex as your donation not only support one cause but also has deeper meaning and powerful mission. Your donations are going to leave a positive impact in multiple levels.

  • You are going to receive an eco-conscious, high quality product what will be a useful item in your everyday life
  • Your donation will support a social enterprise to carry out its mission
  • Your donation will create workplace for young people
  • Your donation will create opportunities for young people in need to gain new life skills what they can benefit in the labor market.

Risks & Challenges

  • Supplier - Our supplier has 5 years of experience manufacturing and shipping products. They are reliable, highly dedicated, and downright amazing people to work with. They have just as much passion and enthusiasm for Cimbi as we do and we are delighted to be working with them.
  • Fulfillment - we have a talented team lined up to make sure everything goes smoothly! They are located in Budapest, the heart of Europe with a highly personable and experienced staff.
  • Getting our product through US and other customs may cause a delay, however, we built this possibility into our timing so we will always strive to over-deliver rather than under!

Guarantee

The bags are made from upcycled materials. It means we are using them NOT for their intended purposes. Even if it is used according to its purpose, it can happen that the material breaks, loses it’s original color or with time will have wrinkles on it. We are not taking any guarantees for these types of problems as it comes from the features of the original material.

We are taking a 1 year limited guarantee for functional problems.

Other Ways You Can Help

If you can't contribute we understand, but if you believe in our mission and would like to help we welcome all support!

Make some noise about us on social media! Use our hashtags
#cimbiforindiego #supportcimbi #getyourcimbi

Tag your friends and make our voice heard in other places!

Use the Indiegogo share tools!

You are going to receive an eco-conscious, high quality product what will be a useful item in your everyday life
Your donation will support a social enterprise to carry out its mission
Your donation will create workplace for young people
Your donation will create opportunities for young people in need to gain new life skills what they can benefit in the labor market.



Risks & Challenges

Supplier - Our supplier has 5 years of experience manufacturing and shipping products. They are reliable, highly dedicated, and downright amazing people to work with. They have just as much passion and enthusiasm for Cimbi as we do and we are delighted to be working with them.
Fulfillment - we have a talented team lined up to make sure everything goes smoothly! They are located in Budapest, the heart of Europe with a highly personable and experienced staff.
Getting our product through US and other customs may cause a delay, however, we built this possibility into our timing so we will always strive to over-deliver rather than under!

Guarantee
The bags are made from upcycled materials. It means we are using them NOT for their intended purposes. Even if it is used according to its purpose, it can happen that the material breaks, loses it’s original color or with time will have wrinkles on it. We are not taking any guarantees for these types of problems as it comes from the features of the original material.
We are taking a 1 year limited guarantee for functional problems.

Other Ways You Can Help
If you can't contribute we understand, but if you believe in our mission and would like to help we welcome all support!
Make some noise about us on social media! Use our hashtags#cimbiforindiego #supportcimbi #getyourcimbi
Tag your friends and make our voice heard in other places!
Use the Indiegogo share tools!

story:
Short Summary

We are ILovetheUS.org, and odds are, you are one of us too. 

We are ordinary citizens who want to express our love for this country while also tackling some of the very "un-American" values that seem to be dividing our nation.  We believe in the American dream that each immigrant to our country comes in search of.  When each one of them succeeds in it, it picks us up as a nation, and lifts us to an ever higher level.  We are true believers that our nation is most secure when we have the greatest diversity of people who love our country.  Help us spread this message around our nation, not just at rallies and protests, but in your daily life.  Become part of something bigger than any one individual.  We aren't about politics, we are about people. 

Our shirts are printed locally by a division of a non-profit organization, that provides job opportunities and vocational training for those with autism and other developmental disabilities.  When you buy our T-shirts, you are not only helping to promote an inclusive environment for immigrants, but also for disabled individuals.

What We Need & What You Get

We need your help to get the ball rolling.  We have our local printer established, and have worked to develop the most eye catching designs to command attention to our cause.  A small supply of shirts have been produced.  The next phase is getting the word out.  We need to advertise and get the product into the hands of those who will spread our inclusive message.  We are currently using social media and web based advertising to draw a larger customer base.  With proceeds from this campaign, we can scale up our business and expand our reach.  We need capital to invest in inventory.  While our printing costs go towards a good cause, we still need to try to minimize our printing costs through high volume orders.  Sales of our product through this channel can achieve that.  We also have administrative and web costs such as a P.O. Box, domain fees, and website fees that may be covered with proceeds from our campaign.  We are seeking $15,000 dollars in our campaign here because that would put us in a good place to begin expanding and advertising more effectively, but we will not rest until our shirts reach anyone and everyone wanting to advance this cause.

Our perks for your contributions include our heartfelt thanks, a bumper sticker, or one or both of our T-shirts designed to grab attention and elicit a conversation.  Each shirt is shipped to you in our patriotic shipping bags!

Arabic "I Love the United States of America" T-shirt

Spanish "I Love the United States" T-shirt

 

The Impact

Every time you contribute to our campaign, you are helping to get the word out that we are a nation of immigrants, and we will not tolerate attacks and mistreatment directed towards them.  It is the American way to accept all cultures into our melting pot, and grow together in peace and inclusion.  We have led the world in this, and every t-shirt we sell will help to continue the American legacy.  Even if we don't reach our goal, every time one of our shirts can help to open someone's mind and heart to immigrants and unfamiliar cultures, then it was a dollar well spent.

Risks & Challenges

The main challenge we face is getting the word out about our products.  There is a risk that we may not succeed in advertising and finding enough interested parties to purchase our products, but this will not affect our ability to fulfill our orders or backers from this campaign.

Other Ways You Can Help

Even if you are unable to contribute at this time, you still play a huge role in our success!  Please, get the word out and make some noise about our campaign. 

  • Our website is www.ilovetheus.org where products can be purchased immediately. 
  • Also, we are on facebook, ilovetheus.org LIKE US!                            https://www.facebook.com/ilovetheusorg-12149371...
  • Follow us on twitter @ilovetheus_org
  • Remember to use the Indiegogo share tools!

story:
Zendrun's Story

Zendrun's story began two years ago, when as artist and designer I began exploring the possibility of bringing some of my own long held ideas and fashion inspiration to life. After a period of experimentation my label Zendrun was born. Influenced by my passion for Japanese graphic design, classical costume and film, I created my first collection of scarves in what I hoped would be the beginning of a growing fashion and accessories brand . 

Designing for men as well as women, my scarves are an uncompromising celebration of colour and a powerful statement of individuality. Boldly patterned, warm and distinctly edgy, Zendrun scarves are designed to brighten any outfit and enhance the uniqueness of your look. In fact, because of the way they are designed it is unlikely that any two wearers of a Zendrun scarf will look quite the same.  

We are now ready to take Zendrun's colour revolution to the wider world but we need your help to do it. We are asking for a modest amount of money to launch Zendrun properly, and to develop some more amazing ideas we have in store. With your help, we can finally spread the word about the Zendrun label and reach out to a small but growing band of Zendrunistas who love what we are doing and would like one of our creations of in their fashion armoury.  

Help get Zendrun running

The first year of Zendrun has been intense and busy, with lots of work going into design and branding. The next step was to find a manufacturing partner who could produce our samples to a high standard. Then in summer of 2016 we took the Zendrun show on the road and previewed our collection to fashion fans and buyers from all over the world at PURE, a fashion expo in London. We were bowled over by the reaction, and found there was a real appetite and enthusiasm for what we are doing. 

But having got this far, we need a cash injection so we can take Zendrun to the next level and actually begin reaching out to customers. We are trying to raise £20,000 to officially launch Zendrun. The modest but crucial amount of money we are asking for will mean we can begin ordering in the stock we plan to sell through the website and we can afford to pay for the PR and marketing campaign we need to build awareness of the brand. And more excitingly, we can begin developing one or two other killer lines of accessories we have in store.

 

 

Perks

 

Risks & Challenges

Having put in a lot of work into the development of Zendrun, we are well aware of the risks and challenges. At times, it feels like a high wire walk in this fiercely competitive industry. But what keeps us going is the enjoyment and belief in what we are doing and the great reaction we have had so far to our range - people love our beautiful, distinct and eye-catching designs. 

It remains a challenge to launch a fashion business from scratch and it will continue to be so, even if we manage to raise our target. What we have learnt is that you need to be realistic and resourceful, and more importantly not put all your eggs in one basket. So we can promise you we will not be complacent and that even now there are hundred other doors we are busy knocking on.

Other Ways You Can Help

Hey there, if you can't contribute financially, your social media connections could work miracles, so please help to spread the word about Zendrun here and also among your family and friends.  

And don't forget to use the Indiegogo sharing tools

story:
Fresh out of high school as a cheerleader, I still remember my best friend's words as I stood casually in front of a mirror in my bathing suit, "Your butt's starting to sag a little."

What?!?! That moment marks the beginning of all my self-conscious, body-exposing behaviors. I believe many a women can relate to fear of exposure in a bathing suit. I have tried to find a bathing suit that makes my caboose look good, but after all these years, I still haven't found one, hence the creations of Butt'r Up Designs.

A little about me, Teresa: I grew up on North Carolina and San Diego beaches my whole life. Don't cha love the good ol' carefree days of youth? Swim, sand, sun, beaches, fishing, boating, and of course, bathing suits.

In the adult life, I managed a degree in neuropsychology from UCSD and did volunteer brain research. Later I got a Master's in Education and taught elementary school in Las Vegas. Realizing San Diego is where I'd like to retire, I gave up teaching in Sin City and became an entrepreneur in San Diego. I bought my first business, a kid's sports franchise and gave that up to pursue a second business:  a bistro. Although the bistro didn't work out, I loved being a business owner and realized that was my destiny.

I had made my Butt'r Up prototype at the beginning of my entrepreneurial journey and had thought about a patent, but it had to pass the "unobvious" test to those in the industry. I showed my pics to a swimsuit designer whose exact words were, "Wow wee, how did you do that?" That was enough incentive I needed to take it to a patent lawyer, so I did.

So my design is now patent pending and my lawyer loved it! Yippee!! I found a Los Angeles manufacturer (Viva USA) who said they are able to make its unique style. Production starts in August for the first batch of Butt'r Up bottoms and I'm looking for funds to extend the Butt'r Up Designs collection. Contributions will allow me to expand and add new styles and colors, one pieces, two pieces, boy shorts, bathing suit skirts and bikinis can all accommodate the Butt'r Up butt-lift design.

Contributions will also allow me to place large orders and pay for them in advance, so I can begin marketing and selling to well-known markets and swimwear distribution channels. I would also love to finish paying off the patent (which is about $2000). The patent lawyer believes I should file also file international.

Currently it is costing $20 per swimwear bottom which will retail near $100. Minimum order quantity is 100 units per color, per style; that is $2000 + $500 for pattern making and cut, but the price will go down per unit with larger quantity orders. So it's a lot of money to expand a collection's color and styles and that's where the bulk of the money will go. Currently I have one color and one style but eager and ready to add more. Extra funding will go to expanding the business beyond sole proprietorship and pursing international patenting.

If I do not reach my entire goal, I will still be able to expand the Butt'r Up Designs collections, but just to a smaller capacity. This leaves very little risk, if any at all to any potential investor, as the first batch of bathing suits has already been funded and all contributors will receive their bathing suit perk no matter what,  Also, if you're a man contributor, don't think you can't use the perk. Any woman in your life would LOVE it. I would also like to dedicate a page on my website to all my investors with their names, because I appreciate everything everyone and anyone can contribute.

A portion of my business proceeds will fund inner-city hunger, and there's no better place to start than my own downtown San Diego. I believe it's important to give a little bit back and always help others who are in need.

Also, if you love this product, please use the Indiegogo share tool and help me get more backers and share my brand & campaign! Thank you!!

story:
Of California’s largest 15 cities Anaheim is the only city that lacks a performing arts center. When Linda Knohl (Anaheim resident and then-President of the Board of Directors for Musical Theater West) discovered this fact she resolved to do something about it. In 2007 she founded the Anaheim Performing Arts Center Foundation, a 501c3 non-profit, and embarked on what would become a decade-long journey to fulfill the mission of bringing a world-class performing arts center to the city.

In 2016, APAC Foundation secured a negotiating agreement with the City of Anaheim to develop nearly 12 acres of land adjacent to Angels Stadium where the City National Grove currently exists.  When completed, the Anaheim Performing Arts Center campus will feature a state-of-the-art 1,800 seat full proscenium theater, 2,000 seat music hall, 600 seat black box theater, art museum and gallery, fine dining options, and much more. 

In conjunction with the launch of a major capital campaign, APAC Foundation is thrilled to introduce our very first crowdfunding campaign! With your help, we can move the APACF project forward by investing in tools and resources needed to meet upcoming targets. At 6 different support levels, you can become a campaign supporter at any budget. See perk information to the right → 

  • High 5 ($5 donation)  
  • Arts Advocate ($20 donation)
  • Supporting Role ($36 + Shipping) 
  • Star of the Show ($100 + Shipping)
  • Make Your Own ($100)
  • Make it a Party ($600)

The star of this campaign is a handcrafted bracelet that can be completely customized.

  1. Choose your metal: aluminium, copper or nugold
  2. Choose between 4 fonts
  3. Choose any word or short phrase (up to 12 characters)

These bracelets are perfect to commemorate a special occasion, share an inside joke, express a sweet sentiment, inspire action + more. Priced at just $36, each custom bracelet makes a thoughtful and affordable gift and arrives to you in a neatly packaged presentation.


Aluminium is eco-friendly! This cuff has the advantage of being nickel-free & non-reactive (hypoallergenic + best option for gift giving). This cuff will not patina or darken over time. Cleaning is minimal and this lightweight cuff is perfect for stacking.

Copper is a reddish gold, bright shiny metal that's soft and easily malleable. It's the oldest known metal and considered to have healing properties. It patinas to a warm brown but can also take on a green patina with oxidation. Over time, copper jewelry will lose its bright shine and take on a patina of its own. 

NuGold is a form of brass and is very similar to 14k gold in color. Many people believe that by wearing NuGold, your skin will absorb minerals from the brass and provide the wearer with positive health benefits such as; helping with headaches, arthritis, joint pain and zinc deficiency. Over time, your NuGold jewelry will take on a warm, gold-tone color making your cuff look even more unique than before.

  • August 21, 2017 - Crowdfunding Campaign Launches
  • September 20, 2017 - Crowdfunding Campaign Closes
  • September 25, 2017 - Scheduling for Private Workshops Begins
  • October 2 through 27, 2017 - Bracelet Fulfillment + Shipping*
  • October 2,  2017 - Dates and Location for "Make Your Own" Workshops Announced (scheduled for November)

*All bracelets are made with care by APAC Foundation staff. Shortly after the crowdfunding campaign ends, we will email all backers at the bracelet level to get customization details.

Interested in writing about APAC Foundation and our mission? Please email lisa@apacf.org to receive our press kit. Questions? Head on over to our website and send us a message.

story:
Each Leilabox features high-quality jewelry (with a total retail value of $150-250) - that's sophisticated and unique - the kind you'd find in your favorite boutique. 

We search out the up-and-coming new designers, the funky artists, and the talented craftspeople. We're not looking for the jewelry you find at department stores that everyone has seen. 

LeilaBox pieces say, "I have my own style." We guarantee turned heads and tons of compliments.

Even if you can't donate right now there's something you can do to help...

Please share the LeilaBox story and help us get the word out to the world!

Share this short link to this page on your Facebook and Twitter feeds: https://igg.me/at/leilabox

and follow, "like" and share our social media posts: 

Follow us on Facebook, Twitter (@LeilaBox_), and Instagram (@myleilabox)! 

You never know who might want to buy a great gift for a special someone.  

Thank you!

We're not looking for the jewelry you find at department stores that everyone has seen. LeilaBox pieces say, "I have my own style." We guarantee turned heads and tons of compliments.Even if you can't donate right now there's something you can do to help...Please share the LeilaBox story and help us get the word out to the world!Share this short link to this page on your Facebook and Twitter feeds: https://igg.me/at/leilaboxand follow, "like" and share our social media posts: Follow us on Facebook, Twitter (@LeilaBox_), and Instagram (@myleilabox)! You never know who might want to buy a great gift for a special someone.  Thank you!

story:
WHAT WE DO

          CloudBaseNine  is an outdoor clothing brand / philanthropic enterprise. 
We make quality clothing for sporting enthusiasts and then give 80% of the profits           from those sales to partnered charities and foundations across the world.
      With every purchase, you become the boss, you get to choose where you want
                    the profits of the sale to go to make the world a better place.


HOW THIS WORKS

Click on the perks, choose a voucher for use on our website & when it goes live in December, go online, order your clothing and choose which charity you want 80% of the profits to go.

With every sale you get amazing clothing, and you empower a charity of your choice to continue to make a real impact in the world.

You can check out our entire range at www.cloudbasenine.com

It's the Christmas gift that keeps on giving



What We are doing with the money

The following charities have come on board to show their support of CB9 and in turn become supported through the sale of our clothing, the work they do across the world is quite amazing, and we are stoked to be able to give them  80% of our profits to allow them to make the planet a better place. The plan is to rotate the charities every 3 months so that we can continue to have an impact on as many causes as possible. If you would like to suggest a new charity for us to partner with or cause you think we could support, please drop us a line joed@cloudbasenine.com so we can check it out. 

  


                       WHAT NEXT?

We had designers from some of the biggest clothing brands in the world volunteer there time and expertise and they have created a line of clothing and shoes to take us to the next level, but we need to grow to release them.


Who's Testing The gear

A number of the greatest Professional Extreme Sports Athletes in the world are already on-board and promoting and testing the brand … with many more waiting to become brand ambassadors.
We have the fastest humans on the planet working with us.



 Our Stretch Goals

                                      $15000

                  Will allow us to release 30 new items into our current range

                                      $35000

                   Will allow us to release our Compression and technical range

                                      $75 000

                  Will allows us to release our Mountain Ski / Board Clothing

                                      $110 000

                   Will allows us to release our entire Technical Footwear range 

                                      $150 000

Will Allow us to set up oversea distribution, Cutting our costs, meaning more money for the Charities from the sale of each item.

$250 000

Will allow us to bring on another 100 charities in 2016


Get Involved! …

Tell everyone you know what we are trying to achieve. We want charities and foundations to approach us from every corner of the world. But they have to hear about us to make that happen.. Share and share some more.

Follow our adventure on social media as we build a brand to rival the corporate fat-cats.

-Dare To Dream


www.cloudbasenine.com  https://www.facebook.com/Cloudbasenine/ #cloudbasenine. #CB9

story:
After more than a year of research, sourcing materials and designing, AINA jewelry is proud to unveil 'The Kupuna' - a solid koa wood watch so lightweight you can barely feel it.



The Kupuna pays homage to the 'wise ones', as well as the beautiful Hawaiian Islands. Highly valuable koa wood is grown at elevated heights and is endemic to Hawaii. This watch has been handcrafted using koa wood sourced from the upper slopes of Mauna Kea - an active volcano on the 'Big Island' of Hawaii. We hope that by joining the AINA Ohana (family) and wearing The Kupuna, you will feel connected to the islands and share the spirit of Aloha wherever you go.

The Kupuna is a classic. Classic timepiece shape, quality and simplicity. Our purposefully simplistic design allows the wearer to enjoy the beautiful koa grain and coloration that makes each watch truly unique. Even the dial is wooden.

Oils from the wearer's skin will help to maintain the color and condition of the wood.


Bamboo Giftbox




The Spirit of Aloha - Our Inspiration


More than a word; a way of life.
Back design of The Kupuna


Watch Specifications

  • Case Diameter: 42mm
  • Face Diameter: 32mm
  • Band Width: 21mm
  • Band Length: 240mm (Adjustable)
  • Stainless Steel Clasp
  • Date Function
  • Quartz Miyota 2115 Movement



A challenge has been to find and source Hawaiian Koa wood. There are other types of Acacia Koa, however, Hawaiian Koa wood is distinct with it's rich dark color and golden grain - mainly due to highly fertile ground around Hawaii's volcanic areas. The AINA team managed to source this wood from the 'Big Island' of Hawaii after a long search for a suitable and trusted supplier.

Another issue has been packaging. We initially wanted minimal packaging, however, we felt that the quality of our watch demands an impressive box. This time we opted for a sturdy bamboo gift box that will both protect 'The Kupuna' while in transit and look impressive on any nightstand..

Funds will be used to source more Koa wood, provide for shipping and packaging costs, as well as research and design for AINA's next wood watch.

story:
Louloutes needs your backing to allow us to move to the next level creating a high end magazine for Muslim women throughout the UK which inspires, informs and advises to empower you every day of the week.

Louloutes 

Louloutes is London’s inaugural fashion, beauty and lifestyle magazine providing a creative, tasteful and engaging platform for modest fashion designers, enthusiasts and newcomers alike. 

We envision Louloutes to be a perpetual celebration and reflection of the multicultural fabric that envelops the world around us. 



The backstory…

Conceived in 2012 and born in 2015, Louloutes is proudly motivated by modern modes and driven to communicate them to traditional minds in search of contemporary style.

Backed by an eclectic mindset, we draw upon our London setting, Russian background, and Islamic beliefs to amalgamate contemporary fashion coverage with modest styling for multicultural assimilation. 

Ultimately, our aim is to combine a high standard of journalistic content with professional-quality photography to inform, inspire and advise.


Why modest fashion?

We identified a distinct shortage of publications committed to the reporting of Western fashions in a format that is tasteful, respectful, and sympathetic to the requirements of Islamic dress codes. 

In our experience, existing publications aiming to achieve this lose the excitement and pace of contemporary fashion or compromise the definition of modesty.

The nitty gritty. 

Here is exactly what needs funding so you can contribute with confidence and know where your money is being invested. 

Although our ultimate goal is a beefy £27k, we aren’t going to attempt a marathon before we’ve even taken a baby step. This initial £7k pledge will give us the boost we need to gain momentum and get our preliminary concepts off the ground. 

We know, we know, talking money is boring, so we created this lovely, shareable infographic… because everyone loves an infographic, right?


If you’re unable to provide financial support, you can still be part of this exciting opportunity as your social media support is worth just as much! 

Sharing our page on as many social platforms and with your friends, family, colleagues and acquaintances could make all the difference to our project’s awareness and future. 

Choose your poison: FB, Insta, Twitter… just make sure to mention, tag, follow and like us! 

Facebook: https://www.facebook.com/louloutesmagazine?ref=hl

Instagram: https://instagram.com/louloutesmagazine/

Twitter: https://twitter.com/LouloutesM

Thanks in advance. We hope you’re as excited as we are!

The Louloutes team x

story:
Here's the Story

Join the campaign and indicate what design ("colina" or "jar"), size/style (men's or women's) and color (black or white) of shirt(s) you would like to order.  Our desire is to reach the Indiegogo goal, place your order and then have the t-shirts shipped to you for the Holidays! 

What Some Have Said of Vera's Artwork

“Spectacular -- so much can be read into it but there is a lot of individualism and self-confidence. Love it!”

“...the figure on the hill can be seen as coming, or going.”

“Wow Vera Rose”                      “Love this!”

“Beautiful. It reminds me of the illustrations in the Little Prince.”

What We Need & What You Get

The price for one t-shirt is $25.00 (comfy, high-quality, great-fitting, 100% cotton), which includes shipping and handling fees.  Click on the Gallery tab and check out how fantastic the designs look on the T-shirts.  We hope that you’ll be as interested in wearing Vera’s art as you are in seeing it!   


PLEASE NOTE THAT WE WILL CONTACT YOU THROUGH THE EMAIL ADDRESS YOU PROVIDED TO INDIEGOGO AND ASK FOR YOUR ORDER DETAILS!!!


The Impact

Any profit garnered from the selling of these original designs will go towards the purchase of art/design/technological items to further Vera's career as a storyboard/concept artist - hopefully, in the future,  at Pixar!  Vera will also be donating 20% of her profits to an outreach that's very near and dear to her heart: The Malala Fund set up by the Nobel Peace Prize recipient, Malala Yousafzai.

Risks & Challenges

If we don't receive enough orders we won't be able to create these wonderful, unique gifts for you to give to the ones you love (or yourself!).
