story:
We created VOLO to solve the problem of bad pockets in athletic apparel. 

Hi, my name is Qasim, founder and designer of VOLO, a new sustainable handcrafted athleisure brand. My main passions are trail running and rock climbing and I was tired of having pockets that didn't hold what I needed and bounced when I ran or climbed. On top of that I was tired of losing my belongings.  I wanted to create athleisure apparel with full size bounce-free pockets, top quality fabrics, a sleek tailored design, and secured pockets to hold your valuables.

We have created three shorts with our smart pocket tech: Earth Shorts, Flight Shorts, and Terra Shorts (Women specific).  Multi-functional athleisure apparel with pockets that won't move when you do and keep your items secure. 

Sustainably Handcrafted in a Solar Powered Factory. We are rethinking ethical and functional athleisure.

Each pair of VOLO Shorts comes with Snap Button Pockets, to secure all of your valuables. 

Deep Rectangular Pockets that move with you and secure your items. 

          

Multiple pockets design to organize and secure your valuables. 

 

The smartest pockets in town, full of secure snap buttons, pockets within pockets that are secured to the shorts at multiple points so they don't bounce when you do. 

Instead of having U shaped pockets, we created rectangular pockets. Creating more space in the pocket and less movement

Secured at multiple points to not move while running, climbing, hiking etc.

 Breathable pockets made with ballistic mesh. 

We have created three shorts with our smart pocket tech: Earth Shorts, Flight Shorts, and Terra Shorts (Women specific).

The Earth Shorts come with five pockets, an ultra-lite microstretch fabric and a tailored fit.

Reinforced stitched and ultra durable. Designed to last for years. 

 Extremely comfortable, Quick drying, breathable fabric to do all the moves.

Flight Shorts come with secure side zippers and snap pockets to secure your valuables. Featuring our super comfortable, feather lite micro-stretch fabric. 

Ultra quick drying micro-stretch fabric, making them perfect shorts for swimming and water sports. 

            


Choose your favorite shorts from our Men's designs. The Earth Shorts and The Flight Shorts.

The perfect athletic shorts for Women! Supremely soft, 4 way stretch fabric. Full size pockets that hold everything you need (finally!).

 

  

4-Way stretch, high wasted, super comfortable and a tailored fit.   The perfect athletic shorts! 

Comes in four amazing colors. 

 

Deep bounce free pockets for women, with zippers and snap buttons to secure all your valuables. Go on a run without needing a bag! 

     

Peached fabric is a luxurious soft finish. After weaving, the fabric is stretched while it is drying, creating its signature buttery soft feel.

Our manufacturer is located in Lahore, Pakistan. I personally worked with our small family owned factory that worked with brands like Tommy Hilfiger and Calvin Klein in the past.  Our manufacturers are striving to curtail their carbon footprint, by promising to go fully solar as a manufacturing facility by 2022. 

    

Fabric's sourced in small batches from small businesses in Lahore. 

Each pair of Volo Shorts is individually handcrafted, sewn, and tailored. The colors used in the logos are hand mixed by the artisans. 

I personally traveled to Lahore, Pakistan in 2019 to meet our family manufacturers and make personal relationships with the artisans. I worked with them to perfect all of the details in the manufacturing of our products.

  

 

    

We are striving to be an ethical brand. Rather than using plastic bags to wrap your items, which is the industry standard, we decided to switch  our packaging to recycled biodegradable paper bags. Preventing thousands of plastic bags from ending up in our oceans and landfills.

We are rethinking ethical and functional athleisure.Each pair of VOLO Shorts comes with Snap Button Pockets, to secure all of your valuables. Deep Rectangular Pockets that move with you and secure your items.           Multiple pockets design to organize and secure your valuables.  The smartest pockets in town, full of secure snap buttons, pockets within pockets that are secured to the shorts at multiple points so they don't bounce when you do. Instead of having U shaped pockets, we created rectangular pockets. Creating more space in the pocket and less movementSecured at multiple points to not move while running, climbing, hiking etc. Breathable pockets made with ballistic mesh. We have created three shorts with our smart pocket tech: Earth Shorts, Flight Shorts, and Terra Shorts (Women specific).The Earth Shorts come with five pockets, an ultra-lite microstretch fabric and a tailored fit.Reinforced stitched and ultra durable. Designed to last for years.  Extremely comfortable, Quick drying, breathable fabric to do all the moves.Flight Shorts come with secure side zippers and snap pockets to secure your valuables. Featuring our super comfortable, feather lite micro-stretch fabric. Ultra quick drying micro-stretch fabric, making them perfect shorts for swimming and water sports.             Choose your favorite shorts from our Men's designs. The Earth Shorts and The Flight Shorts.The perfect athletic shorts for Women! Supremely soft, 4 way stretch fabric. Full size pockets that hold everything you need (finally!).   4-Way stretch, high wasted, super comfortable and a tailored fit.   The perfect athletic shorts! Comes in four amazing colors.  Deep bounce free pockets for women, with zippers and snap buttons to secure all your valuables. Go on a run without needing a bag!      Peached fabric is a luxurious soft finish. After weaving, the fabric is stretched while it is drying, creating its signature buttery soft feel.Our manufacturer is located in Lahore, Pakistan. I personally worked with our small family owned factory that worked with brands like Tommy Hilfiger and Calvin Klein in the past.  Our manufacturers are striving to curtail their carbon footprint, by promising to go fully solar as a manufacturing facility by 2022.     Fabric's sourced in small batches from small businesses in Lahore. Each pair of Volo Shorts is individually handcrafted, sewn, and tailored. The colors used in the logos are hand mixed by the artisans. I personally traveled to Lahore, Pakistan in 2019 to meet our family manufacturers and make personal relationships with the artisans. I worked with them to perfect all of the details in the manufacturing of our products.       We are striving to be an ethical brand. Rather than using plastic bags to wrap your items, which is the industry standard, we decided to switch  our packaging to recycled biodegradable paper bags. Preventing thousands of plastic bags from ending up in our oceans and landfills.

story:
THE DAMDA WALLET WELCOMES YOU

Traditional wallets no longer satisfy our customers’ needs, making cash obsolete ever since the introduction of the card payment system. With the cashless trend set to grow, more people are drawn to the convenience of no longer having to carry cash around. And so, the Damda Wallet came into development as a response to the demand for smarter wallet alternatives.

WHAT IS DAMDA WALLET?

Redefining the standard for your daily accessory, the Damda Wallet strives to meet the growing needs of the on-the-go, style conscious individuals by featuring all-around convenience, state of the art RFID technology and awareness of the modern aesthetic through its inherent design.

 

CONSIDERATION OVER THE SMALLEST DETAILS

Damda Wallet features semi-automatic unparalleled link sliding and hinge door mechanism, which enable quick and easy access to the storage compartment.  F501 Type comes with a semi-automatic door hinge that flips open and it will let you carry up to 7-8 credit cards. G501 Type also comes with a unique semi-automatic sliding door and you can carry up to 5-6 credit cards for your convenience.  We have included a card size leather pouch for your own convenience; it will help you carry small items, such as coins, keys, USB, SD cards or SIM card tray.

SEAMLESSLY DESIGNED TO MOVE WITH YOUR LIFE

 We've designed the Damda Wallet to be slim and compact for your convenience, avoiding unnecessary mess and bulk.  The Damda Wallet measures in  4.6 x 2.7 x 0.5" and weight less than 2 ounces.

REDEFINE YOUR STYLE

Inspired by the pebble stone to reflect the simplicity of nature, the Damda Wallet emulates refined minimalism for the style-conscious modernist.  The Damda Wallet comes in many attractive colors and styles, it will definitely let you express your attitude and personality.

STATE OF THE ART RFID TECHNOLOGY

The Damda Wallet comes with the state of the art RFID technology, and our RFID Card has two distinctive features in a single body; the Boosting Side will increase the proximity card’s signal strength for easy scanning, but the Blocking Side will prevent identity theft from remotely scanning and stealing your personal information.

 

 

               

G-501

F-501

BACKSIDE

CLEAR/LIGHT GREY

G-501

F-501

BACKSIDE

CLEAR/CHARCOAL

FROM THE EDGE OF DETAILS

The Damda Wallet was designed to withstand all forces to preserve its look and function for long-term usability.  Engineered to absorb impact and to improve durability, the Damda Wallet's front cover is composed out of Poly Carbonate(PC), while the back cover is composed of soft and scratch-resistant Thermoplastic Polyurethane.  Finish off with grip-enhancing Urethane coating, the Damda Wallet has been manufactured to resist all hazards through its carefully procured materials.

 

The Package includes:

  • Damda Wallet of Your Choice
  • RFID Blocking/Boosting Card
  • Slim PU Leather Pouch
  • Neck Strap 

INDIEGOGO SPECIAL PERKS

 

ADDITIONAL PERKS

SAY HELLO TO DAMDA SLIM

Half the size of Damda Wallet 501 Series, the Damda Slim G201 is going to be a perfect side kick for your on-the-go everyday adventures.  It is also featuring a semi-automatic sliding door mechanism for your convenience and will let you carry up to 2 credit cards.  Carefully crafted with Polycarbonate (PC), the Damda Slim offers a lightweight, and sturdy construction.  Damda Slim comes in many attractive color variants as well; Charcoal Black, Cream White, Marine Green, Pink Sand and also available in Stripe/Plain finish.

 

 

 

  

What is your warranty policy?

The Damda Wallet comes with 12 months limited warranty for Indiegogo backers.  We also ensure that every unit is free from manufacturer defects and handled with the utmost care during shipment.(The Damda Wallet comes with 12 months limited warranty for Indiegogo backers.  We also ensure that every unit is free from manufacturer defects and handled with the utmost care during shipment. For any question regarding your order or any questions regarding the product please message us at 

What is your return policy?

Our return policy is a 30 days, if the product is returned within that window we will issue the refund to the card used on file, guaranteed. 

Can I change my shipping address?

Yes, as long as we get notified within a couple hours of the order being made we can make the adjustment. Please have all the necessary information when inquiring about the change to ensure we get the product sent to the correct location. 

Can I get a refund?

Yes, return the product within the 30-day period and we will issue a refund once the item has been received and is in new condition.

Can I change my order?

Yes, as long as we get notified within a couple hours of the order being made we can make the adjustment. Please have all the necessary information when inquiring about the change to ensure we make all the correct order changes. 
 

Can I make a bulk purchase?

Yes, please contact our team at hello@damdawallet.com.

story:
Il marchio "Arcella" può  significare molto più della semplice appartenenza al quartiere, ma veicolare i concetti su cui si fonda: cultura, arte, melting pot.

Abbiamo realizzato alcuni modelli dimostrativi, con la raccolta fondi vogliamo rendere i capi in vendita più belli e più economici:

  • Acquistando un voucher avrai la possibilità di acquistare a prezzo scontato i prodotti a marchio Arcella che saranno realizzati e venduti nello store online e in alcuni negozi.
  • Ogni ricompensa permetterà di acquistare almeno un prodotto e di ottenere uno sconto sui futuri acquisti.
  • Se facciamo la nostra parte possiamo creare un brand che racconti il quartiere e che ci permetta di fare pubblicità positiva!

Dal momento in cui inizia la campagna ci saranno due mesi di raccolta fondi ai quali seguiranno alcuni passi che verranno man mano condivisi su facebook:

  • Realizzazione dei prototipi completi della collezione (est. Marzo 2018)
  • Realizzazione del webstore dove acquistare i capi e dove utilizzare i vostri voucher (Est. Aprile 2018)
  • Produzione e distribuzione dei prodotti (est. Giugno 2018).

Quest'anno abbiamo prodotto altri oggetti, gli stessi d'ora in poi faranno parte della raccolta fondi come ricompense di diverso genere per chi partecipa.

  • Poster con cornice.
  • Bandiera dell'Arcella.
  • Adesivi Arcellatown

Chiunque può diventare parte integrante di questo progetto:

  • Inviateci le vostre idee per modelli di abbigliamento e oggetti che vorreste vedere realizzati
  • Condividete la raccolta fondi sui vostri account social!

Sentiamoci insieme parte di qualcosa più grande!!

story:
asuno is much more than just a clothing brand, we are the beginning of a mindful movement which will change the world. Millions wear active-wear on a daily basis to look good and feel good, let's do good at the same time!

At Asuno, each item of clothing is linked to a particular charity, cause and action. Once you make a purchase, our charities will fulfil a specific action.

Join the mindful movement and be an active part of the change which helps those most in need.

Conflict, natural disaster and disease have caused unprecedented humanitarian crisis issues in the developing world, causing millions to be affected by malnutrition. Plump'd and their partners on the ground in these locations will be able to provide treatment to 7 malnourished children with every purchase supporting their cause through RUTF (Ready-to-Use-Therapeutic-Food) that is desperately needed.

844 million people don’t have access to clean water worldwide causing 30,000 deaths every week from drinking water from unsafe sources. Every clothing item supporting Water For Africa is one step closer to a new, safe local water source being installed. (1,730 purchases provide a whole borehole)

There are an estimated 700,000 children in Guatemala alone who don’t have a birth certificate and are therefore not recognised by official statistics, so they are not protected by the state, cannot gain an education, and more often than not end up on the street. For every 13 items purchased supporting the identity cause, Toybox will be able to provide a child with a birth certificate, an identity and a future.

 

Where our amazing partners work:

asuno began life as an idea, to bring positive change to our world.

Using our experience spanning 10+ years in sport and fitness, whilst invoking a well-established link between sport and charitable giving - asuno was born.

Giving the power of world change back to you with every item of clothing we produce, our vision was to not only create a brand, but to start a movement.

 

"Alone one person can make an impact, but when we all come together, we can change the world" - Founder, Ben

 

Every action our charities provide will have a positive impact on someone's life, and even in some cases, save a life!

Take your first steps in changing the world. Find out about our launch lines below.

We create premium quality active-wear. Made with you in mind, we have selected the highest quality materials to provide you with the ultimate freedom in any activity. Whatever your chosen past-time: hitting the gym, practicing yoga, or hiking in the wild... you can revel in the fact that you have also helped to save a life.

Know someone who would love the clothing, or want to back this great cause? Share the campaign with them on Facebook and Twitter using the links below.

 

 

 


TAKE ME BACK TO THE PERKS, I CAN'T WAIT TO JOIN THE MOVEMENT!

Raise £1,000 - Release matching Embrace sports bra and men's joggers

Raise £3,000 - Release the above, plus men's tank top and women's yoga set

Raise £7,000 - Release all of the above, plus men and womens hoodies

Raise £10,000 - Launch full stock on website including yet to be announced products!

 

Support the campaign to help us provide more clothing, that will have more of an impact.

 

Every item of clothing apparel = action carried out by the specific charity

The rest of the funded money will be invested to build the Asuno brand, increasing our impact of change on the world. The money will fund the initial production runs and distribution, along with expanding our marketing footprint on social media to extend our influence – reaching out to more people and changing more lives.

Manufacturing- We understand that you will be eager to get hold of your ethical clothing and become the first ambassadors of the brand. We will use the money to create the first production line of apparel and get them shipped out asap.

Distribution- We aim to increase our distribution channels to reach as many people as possible, eager to be the change. We plan to open up channels via e-commerce and extend our distribution network worldwide.

Awareness- You have already done so much to help just by joining the Asuno movement, but this is where we need to call on you again: to spread the word.

Get on social media - post, tweet and tag your apparel @asuno.uk and take pride in the huge impact that you are making. Get the world talking.

Growth- As we grow, so will our impact. This means more clothing lines bringing more support to our charities. We will be expanding our lines in the next couple of months, with new releases, and creating high visibility advertising – all strengthening the movement that you have created.

When will the clothing be delivered?

September 2018.

Is the clothing available in retail stores?

No, all our apparel is sold directly through our website. In order to maximise the impact from each clothing item on the people we help and keep the cost down. Guaranteeing better clothing, for a lower price.

What percentage of donations go to the charities?

Our ethos is to be as transparent as possible with our business model.

1 item of clothing = 7 life saving food supplements
13 items of clothing = 1 birth certificate for an unregistered child in Guatemala
288 items of clothing = 1 hand pump
1730 items of clothing = 1 new borehole

Each charitable action will be carried out regardless if our products are discounted or not.

Will there be more clothing lines?

Absolutely! Our website will be launching with our new collections in September, this will include our new Asuno Men: hoody, joggers and casual t-shirt, and Asuno Women: hoody, active-wear t-shirt and the matching Embrace sports bra.

We will continue building our collections as we grow.

What size should I buy?

All our clothing runs true to size, so if you are normally a small, then please order a small. The leggings are designed to compliment the figure, and the t-shirts are fitted to give a relaxed compression fit. If you are in between sizes please go for the smaller of the two and choose hip size over waist size for legging options.

Is there an additional charge for international shipping?

Yes, there will be an additional charge for international shipping. This will be added at checkout. Due to the increased price of international shipping we advise you order our group perk options to make the most of the delivery weight - share with your friends, buy a couple for yourself, you'll be back for more anyway!

International shipping is provided by DHL Express.

If your question was not answered here, please email us at:
info@asuno-uk.com

There are a few ways you can help:

1. Buy an item of clothing

Every purchase changes the world for someone in need.

2. Tell your friends about ASUNO!

Spread the word, let others know about the campaign. The more people we reach the more people we can help.

3. Post on social media #asuno

Help us build awareness of the brand and causes on social media. Get on Facebook, Instagram, Twitter, Pinterest, you name it...

Post on Facebook, or Send a Tweet now...

Choose Your Perk

Thank You.

We hope you will join us in changing the world by

Looking Good, Feeling Good & Doing Good!

 

Website: https://asuno-uk.com

Facebook: https://facebook.com/asuno.uk

Instagram: @asuno.uk

Youtube: https://www.youtube.com/channel/asuno.uk

story:
"It is rare that a fabric comes along which causes one to pause and simply admire and appreciate the ingenuity that is this new cloth ‘Warmsilk®’ Ψ

Robert Emmett, owner of Emmett London:

Ψ Product of Jemala

Now, that sounds like a good investment!

Emmett London are elite purveyors of formal, luxury and business shirts, with 2 main stores in London; one at 112 Jermyn Street, St James, SW1Y 6LS, the other at 380 Kings Road, Chelsea, SW3 5UZ

  • Are you worried about the impact in the environment of artificial fibres?  So are we.
  • Are you concerned about the adverse effects of fast-fashion?  So are we.
  • Are you determined to be ethical and to be the best that you can be?  So are we.
  • Do you want to wear garments that are fully biodegradable?  So do we.
  • Do you prefer classic designs that do not go out of fashion?  So do we.
  • Do you want garments that are designed to last a long time?  So do we.
  • Do you love luxury that is natural, ethical and sustainable?  So do we.

Who are we?  We are Jemala.

Jemala Pty Ltd is an Australian-owned family-company who has been at the forefront of ultrafine wool technology and its' application in luxury garments and accessories for over 20 years.  We produce the finest woollen knitwear in the World, bar none and the most fabulous ultrafine wool Ringshawls®.  Our products are worn by European Royalty, Heads of State and "A-listers", amongst others.  We source ethically produced natural fibres and employ the best artisans in the World to process and manufacture our luxury products.  All of our garments and accessories are designed and manufactured to be long-lasting and at the end of their long lifetime, all of our products are fully biodegradable

"You have a remarkable product (which goes without saying) but also such committed and caring service alongside it.  I can't express enough how much your support has meant for my label.  Thank you so much!  Look forward to our future working together."

Jacinta Demetriou, Australian-based designer at Jacinta James

We are committed and caring

My name is Jeff Gill and I am the CEO of Jemala Pty Ltd.  I used to be a post-doctoral biochemist, working in the UK, Switzerland and the USA and recently, I have come home to Australia, to run our family company.  We have recently developed a fabulous new blend that we call Warmsilk®; a blend of silk and ultrafine wool that looks like silk, but out-performs pure silk in the following ways:

  • It drapes better than pure silk.
  • It does not cling in humid weather, unlike pure silk.
  • It is far more crumple-resistant than pure silk.
  • It weaves and knits beautifully
  • We can weave it much wider than most pure silk (2.8 metres vs 1.4 metres).

"I have worked within the textile supply chain for 20 years, seeing fabrics from all walks of life! Warmsilk® is a fabric that demands attention. You want to touch it and to feel its’ cool silky handle, yet when you wear it and feel like it's almost not touching your skin, yet you have a feeling of warmth that can only be described as the warm blanket you have been sleeping in."

Marianne McLean-Atkins, Hong Kong-based designer

Warmsilk® is a fabric that demands attention

We are looking for funding to be able to effectively promote our new Warmsilk® products and our more established pure wool products to take advantage of our expertise in manufacturing the best in the World, our well-placed trademarks and our growing local and international reputation.

So if you want to look fabulous and feel fabulous, knowing that you are saving the environment and supporting an Australian-owned family-company, help to crowd-fund us, promote us and wear our World's best products.

Here are some more authorised quotes on our products from industry notables:

Klaus Steger, CEO of the Südwolle Group:

"Hi Jeff,  The sweater arrived! Thank you very much.  It is fantastic and my wife says that the colour is perfect.  It seems to be of highest quality, also in particular the linking, not to speak of the material.  Just beautiful.

Nearly too precious to wear!"

Alberto Frignani, CEO of Gruppo Tessile Industriale (GTI) SpA:

"I have received today your wonderful sweater and I thank you very much.  A particularly pleasant and welcome gift for a fan of absolutely “special” and “unique” fibres like me.  I am very proud to wear one of the rarest and precious item ever produced in the world."

More from Robert Emmett, owner of Emmett London:

"The combination of the World's finest wool with silk has brought an incredible new cloth, that is warm when cold, cold when warm, wrinkle free, dry on the skin and all from fibres that have evolved over millions of years.

Together as one, simply perfection."

Natalie Begg, Australian-based designer and silk specialist:

"I have absolutely loved working with the Jemala fabrics! Thanks for this opportunity and I look forward to including in my AW19 Collection."

Giovanni Germanetti, Managing Director Tollegno1900

"Your products are stunning, well manufactured and the hand-feel of your wool is better than cashmere!!"

 

How your money will be spent:

  • As you can see from the pie chart above, over two thirds of the cost of this project is in securing the raw materials, processing them to make yarns and then manufacturing with these yarns.
  • This budget will allow us to have a promotion budget to market the fabric, garments and accessories that we produce.  For us, this will be a welcome change.
  • Our unique perks are described below.  We are excited to be able to offer you our products at discount below their retail price!
  • If we don't reach our entire goal, we will scale the project back, but we guarantee supplying and delivering all products ordered. 
  • If we get more than we have asked for, we will be able to offer even better prices on the products of our labours.

The Impact

  • This project is aimed at producing the most fabulous fibre, that is beautiful, long lasting, better than pure silk, ethically and sustainably produced, and at the end of a product's life, totally biodegradable.
  • We have chosen ultrafine wool, due to our decades of experience working with this rare fibre, it similar fibre diameter to silk and due to the environmental advantages of wool and silk over other fibres.
  • Neither wool, nor silk, require arable land which could be used for growing food, like cotton, or create deserts, like cashmere goats.  We think that as the World becomes more aware of the environmental advantages of these two animal proteins (silk and wool), the demand for products that are made from these noble fibres will only increase.
  • By creating luxury products that are long-lasting and contain no artificial fibres, or other fibres that are damaging to the environment, such as cotton or cashmere, we will be providing an ethical alternative to toxic fast-fashion.  https://www.whatsinmywash.org.uk/
  • Our Ringshawls® were invented to provide a sustainable substitute to the famous Shatoosh shawls of Kashmir, in an attempt to help protect the endangered Chiru antelope, who are shot in the traditional process of making Shatoosh shawls, which have been banned by CITES as a result.  http://www.kashmirshawlatelier.com/the-sad-trut...
  • We have spent decades putting together a supply-chain that harnesses artisan expertise from all over the globe.  This is why our sweaters and Ringshawls® are the best in the World.
  • As you have seen from the quotes above, we have already made an impact with the prototypes we have made from our Warmsilk®, and now it is only a matter of promotion and scaling up production.  This is where we need your help.

Risks & Challenges

  • As I see it, the biggest risk that this project faces is obtaining the funding that we have asked for. This is not within our control.  We have to rely on you.  But regardless of whether we get to our target or not, we guarantee to supply and deliver all products ordered. 
  • Another potential risk is the volatility in the prices of raw wool and silk.  Thankfully, we have direct access to wool growers and have reliable agents who can source the best silk at the best possible prices.

Other Ways You Can Help

  • If you are unable to help us with funding directly, but believe to what we are trying to do, then I would ask that you get the word out, via your networks and make some noise about our campaign!
  • Feel free to use the Indiegogo share tools, which can help you to help us without financial outlay!

story:
Surgical Face Masks are too Loose.

  • A loose mask makes it easy for particles to get in and particles to get out. 
  • This is not a safe solution, especially when you are indoors.

Surgical masks are the most commonly used masks in America. Yet, no matter how much you squeeze you can't get a tight fit.

We can prove it.

Put on a surgical mask right now.  Wear it as tight as you can. Wear your glasses if you have them.

  • Breathe out. Look at air particles get out and fog up your glasses.
  • Feel air go out the sides and bottom.
  • That is not a good fitting mask.

  • Better fitting masks like the N95 are much too expensive and need to be replaced after 5 uses.
  • Those costs add up. Plus, N95 masks are being limited to healthcare workers (from Healthline)

So we are left in a dilemma. It is either expensive masks like the N95, or cheap masks that don't work.

 

Our Solution: The Face Mask 2.0

Our Face Maks 2.0 creates a tight fit that is designed to contour to your face. This is the missing piece that the surgical mask needs to be much more effective, and more efficient.. And it's designed to be extremely comfortable. Like wearing a cloud.

 

 

Check this out:

We created the Face Mask 2.0 to be that missing piece that upgrades a common surgical mask.

There are multiple benefits with our design:

  • The N95 is a mask that takes a long time to make and is very inefficient. 67% of materials used in the process are ultimately discarded.
  • The common surgical mask is extremely efficient. Very little of the production materials end up going to waste.

The surgical mask, therefore is an environmentally friendly, and affordable mask. It just needs our Environmentally-friendly reusable Face mask 2.0.

(Our product is washable, dishwasher-safe, and boilable for sanitization.

Comfort in Mind.

Our product is designed to be comfortable.

1. Groovy

Our ridges fit comfortably around your nose, closing off the area that would have allowed air out & in.

Small, soft bumps fit snugly in your hair/on your hair while giving you a snug fit around your face.

2. No Glasses Fog! 

One of the most annoying things about having glasses during covid is the endless fog that coats your glasses. Especially if you're walking/moving around. 

No more. With the Face Mask 2.0 your breath is forced through the mask, not out to your glasses.

(The Ear loops can be neatly tucked in the sides of the Face Mask 2.0)

3. No more irritated ears

Even after wearing your mask for 15 minutes, (surgical or cloth masks), your ears get irritated by the mask's earloops tugging on it. 

Fixed. Put the Face Mask 2.0 on and you can take the ear loop off!

(Once again, Ear loops tuck away easily into the side of the Face Mask 2.0)

4. Quality Design

Engineered by our development team to solve all of the issues of a traditional face mask.

100% Medical Grade Silicone, cause you're worth it.

Our development team tested multiple prototypes to get the Face Mask 2.0 evenly distributed around your face and head. So, after a minute you'll forget you're wearing it.

Adjust it exactly how you want it around your neck. Zip-ridges on the ends make sure it'll never fall off. (We'll give you an extra fastening device just in case.)

Surgical Mask Filtration Abilities

The ordinary surgical mask has 3 layers, and provides a surprisingly good quality filter. Its three layers (from Healthline)

  • The outer layer, which repels water, and other fluids.
  • The middle layer filters certain pathogens.
  • The inner layer, which absorbs moisture from exhaled air.

But, it provides efficient filtration ONLY WHEN your breathing is actually being forced through the mask. But without an additional structure to keep the surgical mask in place the air isn't being forced through the mask's filter.

It's about time we upgraded the surgical mask.

Why This is So Important.

The curve has not been flattened.

America is facing up to a thousand deaths per day. 226,000+ deaths as of today, with NO sign of slowing down. That is unacceptable.

  • Businesses like restaurants & bars are struggling or out of business. Libraries, colleges & classrooms cannot be safely reopened.
  • EVERYONE ONE OF US needs a high quality, comfortable, affordable mask that works.
  • Especially, the elderly, temperature checkers, front-line/essential workers, airplane passengers, the immunocompromised, service employees, students, & teachers.

In order to be safe and keep our country open. We're going to all have to re-think all of this and come up with a better solution.

Full Disclosure

We are not saying our product is better than, or equivalent to an N95.

  • Yet, if you walk into almost any hospital today nearly all workers there are usually wearing surgical masks. Not N95 masks.
  • Why? The N95 masks are hard to find & expensive.
  • If hospitals can't figure out how to get every medical professional an N95 mask and replace them every 5 days,  how does the average person possibly hope to do so?

Other Ways You Can Help

Our product is in the production stage. By buying our kickstarter campaign at our discounted price, you can help us get to the volume we need.

If you don't see yourself using the Face Mask 2.0, but you believe in the idea, you can pledge any amount to help bring this product to those who need it.

Thank you for your time.

- The Face Mask 2.0 Team

story:
345 - Love, Believe, Proud

What is 345?  It represents three statements: I Love You, I Believe in You, I am Proud of You.  Three words, four words, five words.  Or, simply 345. These are words we tell our loved ones daily, and words that we love to hear back from them.  345 gives you an opportunity to convey these three powerful statements in a simple, visual way.

 

My 345 Inspiration

Hi, I'm Julio Rodriguez, President of 345.  I found a way to convey these three sentences - I Love you, I Believe in You, and I am Proud of You in a simple, easy way.   I was inspired by my daughter, Jessica, who had been struggling with addiction for years.  Every day, I made sure to tell her one of these statements to help her stay strong during her battles. When she moved away, I wondered every night if she was ok and hoped she was with someone who could comfort her.   I longed for a way to tell her all three statements at once in a simple, visual way.  345 is the way to this.  I could give her an item with 345 on it and she would always remember that she was loved, believed, and my pride and joy.  I then thought of my other three daughters.  Each one had their own unique achievements and challenges.  Alena was deciding between two jobs.  Ari had just graduated from high school and nervous about the future.  Nicky was recently married and starting a new life with her husband.  These are moments in life that we all have and can use a message like 345 to keep us going.

 

Your 345 Inspiration

I'm sure that you are thinking of a loved one who just got married, or recently graduated, or played in their first sports competition.  Maybe a friend of yours just had a child, or is starting a new career.  Or, maybe, someone you love is struggling with addiction or depression, like my daughter Jessica.  345 is a simple, visual way for you to let them always know that you Love them, Believe in them, and are Proud of them.  This is a message for everyone, for any occasion.

 

345 Jewelry/Clothing Concepts

I've created a line of unique jewelry and clothing items to convey the 345 message.  I have the Abstract 345, which consists of the numbers interlaced among each other in a cool, sleek way.  There is the Heart345, which combines the 3 and a heart followed by 45 for a soft, romantic message.  The 345 Circle has Love, Believe, and Proud circling the 345 numbers for a versatile message for all.  Last, there is the iconic 345 Hand, which has the fingers separated apart to portray the 3, 4, 5 numbers.  This 345 Hand is a two-dimensional version of the hand gesture that we can use at any time to remind someone we are thinking of them.

These unique logos will be available on jewelry and clothing items that you can choose from to give to your loved ones.  All jewelry will be available in an affordable zinc-alloy metal for an entry level gift, stainless steel or gold plated stainless steel for a more fashionable gift.

How Can I Help Spread 345?

I invite you to join me in spreading this 345 message to everyone.  Your donations or funding will go towards helping me raise the capitol I need to start producing the items that you or your loved ones can wear to keep the 345 message close.

Other Ways You Can Help

Any donation or funding is greatly appreciated.  However, if you simply cannot make a financial contribution at this time, I understand.  We all have our personal struggles and challenges, especially during these uncertain times.  Keep your courage up and don't lose faith.  As you watched my video, you saw that the 345 message is for everyone, regardless of where you are in life.  All I ask is that you remember my 345 hand gesture.  You can still simply, visually convey I Love You, I Believe in You, and I am Proud of You just by using your hand.  Place it over your heart and remember that someone is always thinking of you.   

Please use your social media and Indiegogo share tools to spread my 345 message and get the word out to all your friends.

Thank you.

345 Jewelry/Clothing Concepts

These unique logos will be available on jewelry and clothing items that you can choose from to give to your loved ones.  All jewelry will be available in an affordable zinc-alloy metal for an entry level gift, stainless steel or gold plated stainless steel for a more fashionable gift.


How Can I Help Spread 345?
I invite you to join me in spreading this 345 message to everyone.  Your donations or funding will go towards helping me raise the capitol I need to start producing the items that you or your loved ones can wear to keep the 345 message close.


Other Ways You Can Help
Any donation or funding is greatly appreciated.  However, if you simply cannot make a financial contribution at this time, I understand.  We all have our personal struggles and challenges, especially during these uncertain times.  Keep your courage up and don't lose faith.  As you watched my video, you saw that the 345 message is for everyone, regardless of where you are in life.  All I ask is that you remember my 345 hand gesture.  You can still simply, visually convey I Love You, I Believe in You, and I am Proud of You just by using your hand.  Place it over your heart and remember that someone is always thinking of you.   
Please use your social media and Indiegogo share tools to spread my 345 message and get the word out to all your friends.
Thank you.

story:
M3LANYN is an inclusive urban brand created by a young African American woman, Alonya Coney. While navigating the new world of motherhood, she brought her first creation to life - unique crepe satin bonnets. Postpartum depression initially activated Alonya’s interest in the world of sewing, and what started out as a healing process soon turned into a passion that has evolved into a small business. With Alonya’s ability to quickly learn and master the art of sewing, satin bonnets were merely the first of many stitchery creations yet to come. She has expanded her family friendly line of products to include satin hairline edge wraps, pillow slips and scrunchies, and 100% cotton face covers for adults and children of all ages.

M3LANYN’s satin products combat hair breakage and split ends, and lock in hair moisture preventing dryness and stimulating hair growth. The main focus of M3LANYN’s hair pampering products is to embrace and maintain healthy hair with the goal of promoting and enhancing the consumer’s overall self-confidence, self-assurance and creativity. M3LANYN products are intended for all day use, anywhere. They can be worn while relaxing or working in the comfort of your home or while attending a public event. Our target audience is youth and adult consumers who can add M3LANYN products to their daily essential health care and maintenance routine, as well as professional hairstylists for their clientele. 

M3LANYN essential products are a part of a niche market of companies of all sizes. Large companies include beauty supply stores, wholesalers and other chain drugstores that sell internationally; smaller companies include sole proprietors that sell locally at vendor events, pop-up shops and/or online. M3LANYN’s marketing strategy is to communicate via email newsletters to target audience consumers, non-profit organizations and hospitals, posting targeted advertisements on Google, Facebook and other social media, and in person marketing at local vendor events. M3LANYN will sell directly to consumers at vendor events, pop-up shops and from an online store. As business grows, M3LANYN will advertise in targeted markets—especially in advance of the holiday season.

The M3LANYN team currently consists of the sole owner, Alonya Coney. As profits increase, M3LANYN plans to employ staff to assist with designing social media and online marketing. Donations made to M3LANYN will enable this young mother to acquire supplies and equipment needed to develop and maintain product inventory. Profits from M3LANYN will aid Alonya in achieving her primary goals of securing required state certification as a childcare provider and opening an in-home childcare facility.

story:
The STORY:

We initially set out to make the best heated athletic jackets for men and women.  Jackets that not only looked and fit good, but that were made from a high-end water resistant material that was lightweight, breathable and stretched. Also high on our wish list were thin, built-in, hidden heated gloves for those cold morning starts.  We wanted the gloves to be easy to tuck away when not in use but to always be there in a pinch if needed.

Then a lightbulb went off in our head!  It was a very early dark morning during some official product testing when it hit us, (or when we were almost HIT!)... It's dangerous out there!   For safety sake, we decided right then we NEEDED to add wearable lights to the jackets.   With our battery already integrated into the jackets we were halfway there.  After months of research and development, samples, testing and more samples, we finally have jackets that are beautiful, functional and dependable.

With pedestrian fatalities in the U.S. skyrocketing up 46% since 2009, we all have loved ones who put themselves in danger by not being visible enough in low light situations.  Whether you're trekking across campus, walking the dog, going for a bike ride or commuting for work after dark, the FNDN heated LED athletic jacket not only provides an amazing level of adjustable heat, but also lights up, illuminating the wearer so they can safely enjoy evening/early morning activities.  The athletic jacket can also be used as a safety device if you have car troubles, are stranded on your boat or find yourself without an Uber. The water-resistant jacket heats up, has built-in gloves that also heat up, LED visibility lights and can even charge your cell phone in case of emergency.   

 

In an effort to provide an additional level of functionality and peace of mind for our heated clothing customers, we have created the world’s first heated athletic jacket with built-in LED lights for nighttime and early-morning safety. Strips of LED lights can be illuminated by pressing a button on the jacket. Pressing another button on the jacket will activate multiple zones of heated comfort which the user can easily increase or decrease to achieve their optimal level of comfort. Hidden within each sleeve is a heated glove liner that can be pulled on when the chill sets in or tucked away when no longer needed. Each water-resistant jacket comes with rechargeable lithium ion battery.    

Here’s how you can support our campaign and order your Heated LED Athletic Jacket:

1) Select a perk on the right hand side to start your order.

2) Continue onto the next page to enter shipping information followed by payment details.

3) Complete payment via Paypal or using your credit/debit card. 

4) Your Heated LED Jacket(s) will be dispatched when the production order arrives. We can't wait to deliver this cutting edge technology to you!

 

Product Features:

Sizing Charts:

Mens

Womens

What We Need & What You Get

Here's a breakdown of the project backing and why we have turned to crowdfunding:

  • We have physically developed these garments through multiple sample phases to get to the  the working prototypes you see in the videos.  The next step is mass production.
  • Buying the unique materials and components must be purchased in bulk to make this project affordable to the end consumer.  Crowdfunding allows us to verify this project is as good as we believe it is and helps us raise the money needed to start the production.
  • This direct-to-consumer crowdfunding approach allows us to offer backers deep discounts for getting behind this project at an early stage.  We are offering early bird and combo pricing at amazing discounts for a select number of units that will not be available at a later date.
  • If the project does not make it to production for any reason, 100% of your funds will be returned to you.

 

The Impact

Here is what backing this project will help do:

  • Bring a much needed safety product to outdoor enthusiasts. Pedestrian fatalities in the U.S. have skyrocketed 46% since 2009, creating an emerging public health crisis.  If this product saves one life, it will have been worth it to us.
  • We are experienced product developers.  We have designed, built and brought 100's of products to market before but none that have had this kind of ability to make this type of real world positive safety impact.  

 

Risks & Challenges

We need your help in achieving our goal.  Buying the minimum order quantities on materials and components needed to bring this project to life at an affordable price comes at a significant risk for us.  We have designed custom controllers, software and battery power banks to make this all work seamlessly but we need your help backing the project to meet our funding goals and green light this project.

Bringing this product to life is easier for us than you might think.  Relying on our experience and proven track record in the heated apparel category, we feel this is the next natural progression in wearable technology.   Adding a safety component to our cold solving heated wear creates another wearable solution and helps keep people safer.

Other Ways You Can Help

We do realize some people just can't contribute, but that doesn't mean you can't help us bring this project to life.  You can also help us immensely by simply sharing this campaign on your social media channels with your friends and family. 

You can use the Indiegogo share tools and post this to your your social networks.

Thank you again for all of the support, we simply couldn't do this without your help,

- The FNDN Team

story:
ICone by Intelligent Clothing

Multitasking clothes for your multipurpose life

 

 

Put intelligence into your wardrobe!

Minimalism is the key word.

 

 

 

 ICone replaces several outfits, and no one will ever notice.

 

Reverse it and Return it !

 

 

Change style, color or both !

The switch is completely undetectable.

 

 

 

 

 

the collar is put on with the magnet

 

 

 

 Our magnets are certified OEKO-TEX

Standard 100 - Class 2

Internationally recognized label in the field of the protection of people

against the content of undesirable substances.

  •  Ease of use for impaired people
  •  Pacemaker safe 
  •  Preserve your health
  •  Credit card magnetic strip safe
  • pass the security doors

 

The Bicolor Collar 

Turn it for a new cool style

 

 

 

 The Bicolor Hood 

It adjusts so well on the sweatshirt or jacket than no one will ever imagine it can be removed. 

It simply closes by itself. 

 

 

 

 

 

Why pack that much clothes?

Travel light with versatile clothing.

Save time, efforts, money, and reduce pollution. Textile industry is one of the most pollutants releasing industries of the world and we want to fight that.

And we also suppressed the zipper and replaced with a very revolutionary magnet system. 

 

The hood is a shoulder bag

 

 

ICone is the result of a long research for innovative and original solutions, and a meticulous work on the patterns to create a perfectly reversible and returnable garment. 

 

 
 
 

One product - 20 ways to wear it

 

  • Wear it as is, zipper in front, it's a jacket.
  • Zipper in the back, you have a sweatshirt.
  • Add a collar, you instantly become more elegant.
  • Protect you head with the hood, you are warm and cosy.

 

Multiply the effects for up to 20+ different combinations.

So many fun ways to look different !

 

 

The Belt Clip 

Very unique patented mechanical magnet system.

The clip closes by itself once you approach the two ends. It's like magic. No more pushing to enter one part into the other. No more pressing to extract a clucked part.

Once closed, it is impossible to snatch.

 

 

 Antiperspiration Armpit 

Another genius idea, the antiperspirant armpit. Your choice of white or black.

 

 

Pockets 

The pockets are on the grey side of the garment to give a sporty look.

We chose not to have pockets on the black side to inspire a more elegant look.

 

 

 

 

 

The fabric we use benefits from the Global Organic Textile Standard (GOTS). It is organic cotton, soft, strong, machine washable, breathable and non polluting

 

 OEKO Tex Label

STANDARD 100 by OEKO-TEX® is one of the world's best-known labels for textiles tested for harmful substances. It stands for customer confidence and high product safety. Find out here what STANDARD 100 means and why it is worth checking for this label when buying textiles.

We even obtained the OEKO Tex Label for our magnets. They are as safe as safe can be.

Size grid

 

Reward

 

 

 Colors

ICone comes now with two colors grey and black

 

 
 
As the campaign reaches monetary goals, we will release the below colors.
 
 

 

 

Partnership : globosurfer

https://www.globosurfer.com/intelligent-clothin...

 

 

 

Humanist philosophy 

We fully comply to the GOTS norms but also added our own ethIC.

Our productions are made in thoroughly selected human size factories unable to produce more than 1000 units per day and no more than 50 workers to preserve well being and social labor norms.

Before we chose them, we have scrupulously verified that working conditions were respected and that the employees were paid decent wages. And very important, we strongly condemn and reject any form of child labor.

IC is determined and committed to respecting human labor in its production centers and regularly ensures their well-being and the benefits they can receive.

 

 

Besides, these highly priority concerns, we emphasise on work quality and are very strict and demanding on perfect job. We will not settle for approximate quality. Any non perfect IC garment Is unconditionally rejected.

 

 Production Centers

ICone will be produced at strategic points around the world to minimize transportation cost and reduce the CO2 impact on the planet.

 

 

Pollution

Textile industry is the second polluting industry in the world after oil industry. 

Do you know that making a simple cotton T-shirt requires 2700 liter/715 gallons of water, a cotton field may get up to 20 treatments of pesticides in one year, and all that ends in nature and seriously impacts on our health.

The permanent damage on the environment is disastrous.

 

At IC, 

We found the way to reduce the carbon footprint by limiting the number of clothes we need to buy. Any of IC garment replaces several, saving money and the planet.

We pride ourselves to select only factories and manufacturing facilities that respect its workers and pay them decent wages. Close to the distribution centers, and closer to you to save what we can of what’s left of our beautiful planet.

 We have children, and we try to preserve as much as we can for them.

 

 The next products already in the starting blocks 

  • LogIC T-shirt by IC 
  • EpIC Pants by IC 

 

 

 

 And many more to follow 

 The Dream Team 

 

If you would like information for IC distribution or press contact: 

 intelligentclothings@gmail.com

mail: contact@barbarian.com.co​

 

 

The campaign IC Indiegogo stops here, but f you want to see more, look down here.

▼▼▼▼▼▼▼▼▼▼▼▼▼▼▼▼▼▼▼▼▼▼▼▼▼▼▼▼

 

 

 

Risques et défis

We have worked for months without any rest since we have decided to launch the project, but the idea was in our mind for quite a few years already and we have fine-tuned it ever since. It has not been a week without a new idea, a new challenge, a new improvement in the concept. We have overcome all the obstacles, and it was not always easy. When we have been convinced that it was ready, there was no reason to wait anymore and we made the plunge. What you see now is the result of many meetings, brainstorming sessions, sandwiches, pizzas slices and sodas (some beers too, we confess). And the result is here today and we are very happy, we can now, at last, start a diet and go back to the gym. We have given our best to bring you a perfectly finished product that we are sure will please you for a long time. There are many more products in design already and are very eager to launch them as soon as possible. Expect more new innovative and surprising products and garments in the months to come. Be as impatient as we are, and tell it, it will encourage us to work even harder to get them out quickly. Your participation will help fund these new ideas.

  • Share what qualifies you to overcome these hurdles.
  • Describe your plan for solving these challenges.

Other Ways You Can Help

Some people just can't contribute, but that doesn't mean they can't help:

  • Ask folks to get the word out and make some noise about your campaign.
  • Remind them to use the Indiegogo share tools!

And that's all there is to it.

story:
Featured On



The GYDA label was established with the vision of re-imagining the current perceptions of production techniques and use of materials through the prism of high-technology. To accomplish our vision, we’re using unusual textiles and the latest technology available in the fashion industry. We’re developing our models using software for production on laser cutters including 3D-printing technology

The GYDA NYC capsule collection consists of two pieces: male and female outwear garments limited to just 1000 pieces each. The inspiration behind the collection was found in minimalistic shapes and contrasting textures of modern architecture: glass and concrete, metal and stone. Designer plays with same contrasts in the collection: transparent and non-transparent textiles, dense and light textures

WOMEN TRANSPARENT WHITE BOMBER

MEN SEMI-TRANSPARENT BLACK BOMBER

Fabric: white neoprene, transparent TPU. Model is 178cm/5'8' tall and wears size M

Fabric: black neoprene, semi-transparent TPU


The collection has been created in collaboration with young fashion designer Veronika Bogush. Veronika Bogush is a fashion designer from Ukraine, and the founder of her own label, Bogush. The choice of a designer was a deliberate move in order to promote young designers from the Ukrainian fashion scene.

Veronika Bogush with ready-to-wear piece from GYDA NYC collection






Ventilation holes, semi-transparent pocket, two-way concealed waterproof zipper with 3D-printed sliders


You are always on the go and we here at GYDA know that. Now you have all you need at your fingertips!

Safe place for cards, slot fro wristwatch


Capsule-shaped pocket for sunglasses


Pocket for smartphone, headphones holders






Neoprene is usually used for the production of wet suits. It sheds water like a duck, making it an ideal outdoor material. It provides great protection against a vast range of conditions, including rain, snow, sand and dust. The neoprene we use is made using a limestone base instead of petroleum, which makes it the most environmentally responsible choice currently available on the market. 

TPU or Thermoplastic Polyurethane is very similar to other plastics like PVC (polyvinyl chloride) or PUL (polyurethane laminate), which although they are not breathable fabrics, are designed to keep in liquids they also prevent air from flowing in and out as well. With TPU being a waterproof fabric, airflow is allowed. The main difference is that TPU is heat bonded instead of chemical bonded, which means that it’s better at biodegrading. However, what is most exciting about TPU is the feel - it's extremely soft and far more fabric like. In fact, it feels like your second skin.

Left to right: black&white neoprene, black semi-transparent&transparent TPU


We have spent the past 6 months progressing through the idea to the pre-production samples. The development and manufacturing process took 5 months. We started with sketching of our models, before making the best choice on the fabrics market. Once the maquette was approved, we started to produce our samples using laser cutters. As a final finish we added 3-D printed elements. And that's how we made it awesome!




Risks & Challenges

We have worked tirelessly to put all of the necessary logistics in place for this project.

Timing is the biggest risk. In the best-case scenario, we can have fabric, zippers and labels in hand four weeks after the Indiegogo closes. We can turn these around in as little as four weeks, getting the first garments in the mail in September 2016. Our supply chain and manufacturing partners are now already in place and ready to go.

We are 100% confident that we will fulfill on our promise to produce and deliver your bombers on time.

story:
Gregg and the Groggle

Gregg Vollet has been working in the construction industry in Whistler, BC for over 35 years. He has seen his share of on-job injuries and knows how an eye injury can ruin a person's career. But it didn't really hit home until he was trimming trees in his own backyard. Gregg couldn't find his protective eye wear but decided to go ahead anyway. He promptly hit a pine cone which exploded sending debris right into his eye. Luckily he didn't end up with any lasting damage. It was at this moment that Gregg realized there should be a more convenient way to keep your protective eye wear handy. The idea of a combo eye and ear safety device was born – introducing, The Groggle.

The Groggle is an important safety device and there's nothing out there like it. Which, we believe could potentially save the eyes of not only trades workers but also of the DIY wood worker or even while doing yard work.

If you know anyone who has suffered an eye injury, you know how devastating it can be. Not only physically and emotionally but also by having the potential to derail a persons career, lifestyle and more.

With your support, we can get the Groggle off the ground and into the hands of people who could really benefit from "Always There Protective Eye Wear".


What Is It?

The Groggle is a hard lens case with built-in lenses that pivot from inside the case to your eyes - which Gregg has been working on perfecting for the last 3 years (the first prototype was made from boot-fitting material!).

The device easily clips onto any ear muffs with wire side bands - similar to a 3M Peltor Optime 98 Series Earmuffs. The lens can be flipped down when they are needed for eye protection and flipped up into the protective case when they are not needed.


We Are Doing With The Money

The entire amount we are asking for will go into manufacturing. The prototype we currently have is a 3D printed version.

Here is a breakdown:

  • Mold and materials for the Groggle
  • Production of 10,000 pieces (minimum order amount)
  • Lenses (we plan to offer both tinted and clear)
  • Ear Muffs
  • Shipping


What Could Go Wrong?

While we do have interest from local hardware stores and have even been in talks with several larger suppliers, we can't say that we have any retail locations lined-up. Largely because we don't have an actual product. Of course this makes it difficult to guarantee it will end up on retail shelves after it has been manufactured. But we are confident that once we have actual product, suppliers will be interested.


Help Spread The Word

We understand that not everyone can afford to help monetarily - but if you think our product is as important as we do, then help spread the word. Share this campaign on your social media channels and tell your friends. We bet everyone you know, knows at least one person who would benefit from a Groggle.

Thanks in advance!

Gregg Vollet & Team

story:
About Me:

My name is Derek Wells, and I've always been a dreamer. 
In college, I worked for a local retailer and created bold, unique designs that were tailored to Texas A&M University. They were designs that played off of college-specific terminology and pop culture; creations made intentionally to spark conversation, and they sold incredibly well. Since then, I've dreamed of starting my own company in order to bring the next generation of unique designs to those who prefer to stand out from the crowd.
My company is Crown Twenty, so named to honor the two little blessings my wife, Kelly and I are privileged parents to - our daughter, Nealee (nicknamed "Princess", thus the Crown) and our son, Rhett (born on the 20th day of the month).  My company motto is "What Lives Inside of You?", reflecting the belief that we all have something inside of us to be embraced and celebrated, especially when it comes to supporting our favorite universities. I believe my vision for Crown Twenty fits a missing piece of the market. It is my sincere desire to grow Crown Twenty as a company built on the voice of our customers, a commitment to service that exceeds all expectations, and exceptional quality products.
With your help, Crown Twenty will target young alumni and supporters of universities, specifically the 25-40 year-old demographic. We will respond quickly to customer requests. We will become the BEST retailer for college-centric apparel. Quite frankly, with your help, Crown Twenty will challenge the status quo of cookie-cutter ideas and products that have homogenized the market. We will be better!

What I Need & Why I Need It:

My goal is to raise $25,000 for my company, which will be spent in the following detail :

1. $17,500 - Production costs (70% of operations). I have print-ready designs created and waiting to be put into production. Having an on-going creative process and working with a local print shop, I eliminate missed opportunities to capitalize on new ideas, seasonality constraints, and being second-to-market from other vendors. It also affords me the confidence that blank material and design specifications are complete and accounted for, ensuring that production avoids any hiccups along the way. 

In addition to designs I currently have for sale on my website (crowntwenty.com), the production costs mentioned are detailed as follows:

  • $9,000 for 12 new designs created for unisex short-sleeved and long-sleeved shirts, and unisex sweatshirts
  • $3,000 for 4 new designs created for women's apparel.
  • $2,250 for 4 new designs created for headwear.
  • $1,750 for 4 new designs created for men's golf/business apparel.
  •  $1,500 for 4 new designs created for youth apparel.

 2. $2,500 - Technology/Hardware (10% of operations). My website will always be the easiest means of driving sales, and the ability to update the site at any given moment and from any given location is one vital piece of excellent customer service. In addition, the ability to capture sales data and complete sales transactions on the spot will only strengthen my ability to grow loyalty among my customers!

3. $2,500 - Legal (10% of operations). Trademarks, copyrights, intellectual property, and representation are a necessity in today's business climate. Crown Twenty will plan to be well advised to protect our interests as a company. 

4. $2,000 - Marketing (8% of operations). While the concept of marketing hasn't changed much in years, how to apply it has greatly evolved. Social media platforms such as Facebook, Twitter, Instagram, and Pinterest have proven to be tremendous avenues for small businesses to gain customers and impact sales, and for virtually no monetary investment. There are other efficient ways to reach my target audience, and that will be through advertising campaigns in football and basketball gameday programs for the universities I create ideas for. These publications provide the most cost-effective and largest-reach possibilities for exposure. 

5. $500 - Website (2% of operations). Currently hosted through Squarespace servers, this will ensure that crowntwenty.com remains active and "live" for at least the next 2 years.

Even if my $25,000 goal is not met, all funds raised will be used on a percentage-of basis.

Crown Twenty's Impact

In doing my research, I really wanted to understand what the market was missing, and how (or even if) I could help satisfy that missing piece. I found that most of my target demographic of 25- to 40-year-old college graduates and supporters are looking for apparel ideas they can wear to support their teams, but they don't want something that screams "This is where I went to school!" They want something that is subtle, yet recognizable to fellow alumni; something that shows who they support, but doesn't make them a walking billboard. 

I also researched licensing fees and what it would cost to maintain and use copyrighted material. In my experience working with collegiate licensing companies while in college, I found the process to be somewhat frustrating, and here's why:

  1. A design is created and submitted for approval through the university's licensing department.
  2. You wait - maybe a day or two, maybe a couple of weeks - for the decision to be returned regarding your design idea.
  3. If approved, the design is now granted permission for production; if denied (can be a very frequent occurrence), then it's back to the drawing board and you start over at Step 1. If a denial is the outcome, then added costs of time and labor are factored into the equation of profitability!
  4. Once an idea has been produced, a royalty must be paid, whether on an overall annual projection of revenue (projection, not review!), or on a per-unit-sold percentage (i.e. 8% of every single unit sold).
I absolutely respect each university's decision to mandate how and where and why their likenesses are used, but my goal is to create something that does NOT need to submitted through licensing, therefore allowing more creative and artistic freedom! There are an abundance of really fun ways to tie an idea into a school without infringing upon that school's protected property. As I mentioned earlier, I've done it multiple times in multiple years and with tremendous success. 
I hope my motto "What Lives Inside of You?" resonates with customers by allowing them to be bold, loud, and proud in support of their alma maters. My designs may be different and edgy, but they will always stimulate conversation.
One final impact that I also want to describe is my partnership with Boot Campaign (bootcampaign.com). Boot Campaign is a tremendous organization that gives back to the men, women and families of military service, and 20% of the proceeds from all sales are donated to their non-profit cause. This agreement is good for 2016, and will be revisited in December to hopefully extend it for 2017.

Risks & Challenges

I recognize and readily acknowledge the inherent risks in launching an apparel company. There may be backlash for a design creation. There may be pressure from universities to cease using certain terms or ideas. The way I intend to combat each risk and face each challenge is by being extremely responsive to the market, by assuring excellent customer service, and by using a core focus group as a creative model instead of relying only on a single individual. My insight into the entire process of procuring materials, idea creation, production, market tendencies and pricing will serve me well to overcome challenges that I know will come.

My customers will tell me what they want; it will be up to me to provide it! 

 

Other Ways You Can Help

If you've made it this far, I thank you for doing so! If you can donate, I am incredibly grateful; if you can't, there are other ways I would ask for your help:

  • Use one of the share buttons and post it on your social media.
  • Visit my website at crowntwenty.com and sign up for the Crown Loyalty program.
  • Visit teespring.com/crowntwentywhitelogo or teespring.com/crowntwentyblacklogo and purchase a shirt with my company logo on it. 
  • Follow me on Facebook (facebook.com/crowntwenty)
  • Follow me on Twitter (twitter.com/crowntwenty)
  • Follow me on Instagram (instagram.com/crowntwenty)
  • Follow me on Pinterest (pinterest.com/crowntwenty)

story:
Have you ever stopped, just for one second in your daily life, to think what they really mean for us, what they mean for you, for me; well, for me they mean: The smile on my face,  the heat on my copilot seat, the breath that ease my mood, the prove that i can, the paw that warms my skin, the reason to be: motivated, sad, confident, happy.

Hi my name is Ramiro Albán, since i was a kid i was always inspired by drawing and the colors, textures and shapes that compose it.

The fact that you´re able to recreate what your mind imagines with art is amazing and it was the way that i choose to express what i think and feel.

Thats why i found in design and graphic arts my true passion, passion that i always share with my best friend who discovered this inspirational world with me and joined me in the adventure that made me who i am.

This is why i want to introduce you to my shirts and clothing company Matben, a product that combines art and design with a style that is adaptable to our daily life with functional clothes inspired by our best friends, our pets.

MatBen comes from a combination of my two sons names, Matias and Benjamin, who share the same nation for pets, that i have.

That unconditional love for them is reflected on the quality and detail of our products, which are elaborated with the best 100% Pyma Peruvian cotton, the process of creation of the design starts from things like drawings on old napkins to dartboards on the pc.

With the help of design tools i shape my ideas and give them that awesome look, the detail and patience make every pet illustration unique and different from each other, which reflects that awesome feeling between best friends.

I need your help to obtain $10000 with will help make this project a reality, not only for me and my family but for everyone who wants to show our best friends to the world and carry them with us whit their best artistic look on our shirts.

I know i can count on your help, thank you for being part of Matben, go on and feel your pet fur on your shirt.

Thanks very much for your help!
