story:
The Amazon jungle is one of the most beautiful places of the world, that has important biodiversity in flora and fauna of the world, there live hardworking, cheerful and simple people. But the main problem is THE DEFORESTATION. Per year 150 000 hectares of forests are deforested by ilegal logging, ilegal mining and narcotrafic , creating enviromental, unbalancing and explotation problems.

But against this problem, we have seen a great solution that permit us the development of one product with amazonian insumes withouth damage the trees and supporting the amazonian families through: THE NATURAL LATEX OF SHIRINGA

Is here where the Evea project was born.

Evea Ecofashion is a Peruvian social company that work with amazonian communities that recolect the natural latex from the shiringa trees, developing ecologic shoes that respect the enviroment and contribute to amazonian families development.

How does it work?

The shiringa is a tree that grow up in the amazonian jungle and it has a milky liquid call latex. This latex is extracted by the communities through incisions on the cortex, only is extracted the liquid needed without damage the tree, then it is stored in containers and through a craft process is converted in latex sheets. This sheets are converted in soles.

The most important is that to produce an Evea shoe it has not felled any tree, it hasn´t been damaged any animal, and the enviroment hasn´t been polluted, also it favors the communities economic growth because we work with them in all the process. The challenge of Evea Ecofashion it was convert this craft product in a resistant product and availible to fashion market. For wich we developed an investigation and formula to obtain a high quality shoe and achieve a design that accomplish the required characteristics of the fashion industry.

The Problem of the deforestation

The problem of deforestation arises from  a need of the inhabitants of the jungle to subsist within the inmense natural environment, for that reason in Evea Ecofashion we have understood that we can empower communities trough method that permit the to live in the forest withouth damage it, so we will protect the forest against indiscriminate logging. This will increase the communities families economic income and encourage them to protect the forests, thus achieving a model that can be replicated in other amazonian regions.  

The Evea Ecofashion Campaign

The campaign need $15 000 dollars to adquire:

  • Natural Rubber processed from the Communties
  • Logistic Costs (Including the transport cost between the jungle and the zone production)
  • Steel matrices for new solids sizes
  • Shoes Production

This will be the first model of Evea Shoes . If you support this campaign , you can win an elegant casual shoes that protect the Amazon. Go on!!!!

 

 

The Impact

  • 31 Families of the jungle will improve their economy
  • 3728 rubber trees will preserved.
  • Each family have 50 - 200 hectares of forest (average): The possibility to create more value in the forest without cut the trees will have the potential to conserve this jungle area.
  • Thousands of species conservated, plants, insects, animals and others (We are researching the number of species in that zone - average)

  

 

Risks and challenges

 

We have some challenges on the road. Every region in the amazon, has different kind of natural latex, for that reason we need to research and cevelop new formulas to each zone to standardize the final product.

Currently  we are working in workshops to create different formulas for each amazonian region.  

We are working in Pasco and Madre de Dios regions, we have planned to increase the Evea workshops in other amazonian Peruvian regions .

Team Evea

 

Other forms of support 

 
  • You can share our campaign with your friends and contacts.
  • Following in our social networks.
  • We can preserve the Amazon forest!

Allies

Evea Ecofashion, in her years of research has worked and collaborated with different institutions and won social entrepreneurship competitions. Here some of them:

 

 

 

FAQ

How did Evea was born?

Evea was born like an alternative to achieve a sustainable use of the forest based in the organized recolection and procesing of ecological latex of siringa. In Evea we work wiht communities and Amazonian families that collect and developing fashion products using natural latex by the premise of forest conservation and fair trade.

What way Evea Ecofashion contribute to amazonian communties development?

The Evea Project find the idea to intagrate amazonian communities in the sustainable us of the forest. The rubber tapper has an important quantity of jungle hectares to his use, with that lands the rubber tapper has the opportunity to work it to satisfy the needed of his family. Normally the way fastest and common to obtain incomes is trading the Wood , it means cut trees or renting some hectares of his forest (equal deforestation). Finally this rent produce more deforestation. In Evea we propose an ecological alternative to the amazonian families can live in the rain forest without depredation, generating a source of income in harmony with the nature that permit them improve their standart of living.

Tell me more about the shiringa tree

The natural latex is extracted from the shiringa tree. The shiringa is a tree that grow up in the Amazon and it has in the interior a milky liquid called latex, through artisanal proccess is converted in latex sheets. There is an ancient technic and is not cut the trees, only extract the latex needed for that reason the tree still alive and it regenerate. The shiringa also is called rubber tree and it has a history very hard in Latinamerica, specially in the epoque of rubber fever. Currently is a new hope to Amazonian communities.

The shiringa tree is not damaging in the process?

The process only includes the extraction betwen June to November, the rubber tappers are very careful in the process they know how to do the work without damage the tree, the ancestral knowledge teach them about the importance of not touch the "cambium" area of ​​the Tree, with this careful the tree can regenerate between December and April (Rain epoque)

Currently how many communities are you working ?

Currently we are working with 2 amazonian regions, one of them are in the Pasco department (jungle zone) and Madre de Dios región. We have contact and aproaching with other shiringa gatherers communities in Loreto and Amazonas.

Why do you said that not pollute the enviroment?

Because is not necesary cut the trees to obtain the natural latex. With this system the communties preserve the forest agains the ilegal loggers.

Do you work with the fair trade system?

We paid a fair Price for the rubber worked by tappers, including a payment in advance to the communities, we share  with them  workshops to improve their quality material. In our plans we have the idea to teach about the financial plan.

How was achieved the process of converting natural latex to footwear?

To convert the shiringa natural latex in soles to sustainable footwear, we work with the amazonian comunities , inspiring us in their ancestral knwoledge and wisdom of the trees and empower the research and development of the material with profesionals and labs , it was a work by 2 years to improve the resistance and quality of the products derivated from latex collected.

Tell me how other institutions are related in this process and who are supporting your Project?

In Perú we are part of  this institutions:

  • YLAI. https://ylai.state.gov/ Young Leaders of the Americas Initiative. A movement impulse by Barack Obama from 2014 with the idea to empower the social entrepreneurship with great potential in LatinAmerica. Evea is part of this group since 2016.
  • Kunan: http://www.kunan.com.pe/  A social entrepreneur comunity empower by Global Shapers and Fundación Telefonica that provide support thorugh different actors of the ecosystem.
  • Startup Perú: http://www.start-up.pe/  A institution that is part of the gubermental  Production Minister of Perú. They provide of knowledge and funds. We are parte of the second generation and the Biodiversity generation.
  • AMSP: http://www.amsperu.org/  Asociación de moda Sostenible Perú. They are an sustainable fashion asociation in Perú that promote the sustainable brands

This organization support us:

  • Nesst: http://www.nesst.org/peru/  They are a incubator and accelerator social worlwide. They are work with us in the incubation part with the program startup Perú.
  • WWF: http://www.wwf.org.pe/ They work in different strategies to consérvate the biodiversity. Currently the support us in the contact with the tappers in Madre de Dios and the comunication through their network.

How Evea has a positive impact in the enviroment and the amazonian communities?

The Evea Project has a positive impact in the enviroment to integrate the amazonian communities in the sustainable use of the forest. By one side the develope of products derivated by the natural latex from amazon zones it generate an income source very positive to the families, that model contribute to incentive to take care the forest generating an income to them between 65% and 90%

story:
Hi I'm Sylvia W. Allen, minority owner of Sylvideo Productions, LLC.-the Future. I was gifted at the tender age of 4 to draw, paint and create. Nurturing this gift by the knowledge of amazing art teachers I was awarded a full tuition scholarship from Maryland Institute College of Art, 4th in the nation. During this time the nail industry was just coming to life and starting a craze. My close friends notice the artwork I created on my nails and suggested I do nails. I agreed, got my license as a manicurist and launch Hands of Gold, a mobile nail salon service based in Baltimore, Maryland. In eight years the company grew from Baltimore to Washington DC hosting Pampering Parties which included mani/pedi, massages and facials. My personal goal of seeking a degree kept screaming in the back of my head so I presued my Bachelor of Science degree in Corporate Communications minoring in TV, Video, Film & Commercial at the University of Baltimore and found my passion for producing. It was a natural transition of creativity, teaching, helping others reach their greatness through my greatness. I relocated to Los Angeles, executive produced Indie Award of Merit short film, 'I Want A Man,' loving herself or loving her man, she can't do both if he's abusing her. My feature film script adapted from the short film, was 'Hot 100 List,' winner in the Capital Funding Screenplay competition. My novel 'Witness of Love, When Loyalty Kills,' won an 'Honorable Mention,' in the New York Book Festival. I was nominated by the Los Angeles Business Journal, 'Women Making a Different Awards,' and developed Syntilicious in 2013 to eliminate the awful smell of nail polish with the most popular scents from our natural sense of taste and smell. As you're reading my background everything I create is a winner (Hands of Gold). I expect nothing less with 'Syntilicious, A Taste of Top Coat.' I'm very excited to launch this new brand with you as a new client, supporter and backer for several reasons. The benefits of this product are; it dries quickly, eliminates that chemical nail polish odor with your favorite scents; pineapple, cherry, grape, chocolate, strawberry or tangerine. It is eco-friendly for women who are pregnant, shines all nail bases natural, gels and acrylic nails. It's a high end brand with an affordable cost. I take great pride in the services and products I create under the Sylvideo Productions Brand with integrity and tenacity that is why with all the products I create, attached is the gift of giving back. This campaign will be the gift that keeps giving because 5% of the funds raised will be donated to the Lustgarten Foundation-NYC, for Pancreatic Cancer Research. This Foundation is close to my heart in honor of my mother Celia E. Allen who passed away from PC after a 9 month battle. I get my strength and tenacity from her. Love you Mama!

 

 Our Goal is to reach $5,000 or more to Launch Syntilicious, A Taste of Top Coat to attract mainstream retailers. We also want feedback from our backers, customers, etc. about our product brand to include more scents. When we reach our goal 100% of the funding will go to manufacturing and shipping your polish with the exception of 5% of the funding will be donated to Lustgarten Foundation. For more information go to www.lustgarten.org.

I agreed, got my license as a manicurist and launch Hands of Gold, a mobile nail salon service based in Baltimore, Maryland. In eight years the company grew from Baltimore to Washington DC hosting Pampering Parties which included mani/pedi, massages and facials. My personal goal of seeking a degree kept screaming in the back of my head so I presued my Bachelor of Science degree in Corporate Communications minoring in TV, Video, Film & Commercial at the University of Baltimore and found my passion for producing. It was a natural transition of creativity, teaching, helping others reach their greatness through my greatness. I relocated to Los Angeles, executive produced Indie Award of Merit short film, 'I Want A Man,' loving herself or loving her man, she can't do both if he's abusing her. My feature film script adapted from the short film, was 'Hot 100 List,' winner in the Capital Funding Screenplay competition. My novel 'Witness of Love, When Loyalty Kills,' won an 'Honorable Mention,' in the New York Book Festival. I was nominated by the Los Angeles Business Journal, 'Women Making a Different Awards,' and developed Syntilicious in 2013 to eliminate the awful smell of nail polish with the most popular scents from our natural sense of taste and smell. As you're reading my background everything I create is a winner (Hands of Gold). I expect nothing less with 'Syntilicious, A Taste of Top Coat.' I'm very excited to launch this new brand with you as a new client, supporter and backer for several reasons. The benefits of this product are; it dries quickly, eliminates that chemical nail polish odor with your favorite scents; pineapple, cherry, grape, chocolate, strawberry or tangerine. It is eco-friendly for women who are pregnant, shines all nail bases natural, gels and acrylic nails. It's a high end brand with an affordable cost. I take great pride in the services and products I create under the Sylvideo Productions Brand with integrity and tenacity that is why with all the products I create, attached is the gift of giving back. This campaign will be the gift that keeps giving because 5% of the funds raised will be donated to the Lustgarten Foundation-NYC, for Pancreatic Cancer Research. This Foundation is close to my heart in honor of my mother Celia E. Allen who passed away from PC after a 9 month battle. I get my strength and tenacity from her. Love you Mama!  Our Goal is to reach $5,000 or more to Launch Syntilicious, A Taste of Top Coat to attract mainstream retailers. We also want feedback from our backers, customers, etc. about our product brand to include more scents. When we reach our goal 100% of the funding will go to manufacturing and shipping your polish with the exception of 5% of the funding will be donated to Lustgarten Foundation. For more information go to www.lustgarten.org.

story:
Jara Rive is a footwear brand born in the Dominican Republic, a Caribbean country with customs and mixtures of Spanish, African and Taino roots which are reflected in our somewhat refined feminine footwear designs.

My intention is to create a brand who delivers feminine footwear that combines materials and manpower of high quality. In order to bring an optimum product that meets the demands of contemporary fashion lifestyle, as well as the requirements of the users of the brand.

The costs for production, labor, export and distribution of the first collections, demands a high capital, to be able to carry out the project. The money raised will be invested in the production, manufacture, logistics, export, Labor ... In short, the whole chain of processes that go from the creative part to the distribution of the product.

Jara Rive has excellent potential, so I need the collaboration of all of you, sponsors, that will make it possible to start with this company.

 

BLACK SHOES

 

 

TIE UP SEA RED SHOES

 

 

SILVER BLER SHOES

 

 

CLUCTH BAG

 

 

 

 

 

 

CONTACT

If you have any questions, comments or concerns and would like to speak directly with us, please feel free to email jrive@jararive.com

 

THE FASHION DESIGNER AND FOUNDER

I am Jara Rive, a plastic artist and designer. And I intend to offer, at a global level, the possibility that women can acquire a line of high fashion design shoes with excellent quality, reflecting an elegant lifestyle and above all very feminine.

story:
THE SHOE THAT WILL CHANGE YOUR LIFE!

Hi everyone,

My name's Mariana, I'm a fashion and graphic designer and together with my partner Gonçalo (he's a business manager), we want to create a new line of shoes that will change the way women look at footwear.

I always loved shoes and having many was an impulse buy I couldn't control.

I realized that after my 20th pair I was only using about 5 each season regularly, because no matter how BEAUTIFUL the shoes I bought were, I ended up going to the most confortable.

We then came up with a solution:

  • Creating a shoe that could be personal and adaptable to any situation 
  • Making it look amazing, sexy and appealing while comfortable
  • Allow women to change it at home with accessories, making style and comfort less expensive and more pleasurable.

So I though about a shoe that could change about anything! From top to bottom, heels to accessories and ad-ons, you can add and subtract with lots of colors, styles, shapes, making that shoe your own and still being able to use it comfortably to walk miles in the city with a flat short heel or impress at your sister's wedding with stillettos.

THIS IS WHAT WE ARE ASKING OF YOU!

We have the idea, the plan, the designs and now we need to produce it and test it to exhaustion to make sure you get the best shoe in the market!

  • We will need €3500 to kick start everything. 
  • This will be used to make the prototypes, make all the tests and finalize the idea in order to then be able to start selling them, online, by order.
  • If by any chance we don't reach the final goal, all funds will still go towards the first prototype and case study to help this idea move forward.

HOW IMPORTANT YOU ARE!

This project will only be possible with your help! But if you do help us, very soon you could be the first to have the all personalizable shoe in the market and be sure to have a safe, comfortable and very stylish shoe in your hands that will save you hundreds of dollars, meters of wardrobe space and miles of foot pain.

  • These shoes can change lives! Not only to every woman in the planet that can appreciate having a shoe that can fit every event and necessity, but because we are passionate about empowering women around the world and helping the ones that need it the most.
  • We are very eco-friendly people and are studying a shoe made with materials that don't hurt animals, leaving our eco-footprint in the world.
  • If you help us achieve our goal you could have the chance to own one of the prototypes to try your self before they are even on the market!

OTHER WAYS YOU COULD HELP!

If you love this idea but you don't have the means to help out with a contribuition:

  • Please spread the word! A good investor or several small ones is all we need to make this dream a reality! We can do this together!
  • There are a ton of Indiegogo tools to share the project and there's also word of mouth, emails, your network of friends, family and co-workers, your group of girlfriends that will love to get their hands on a pair... 

Thank you for taking the time to read our pitch! I hope we can meet soon and that I can give you a big THANK YOU in person!:)

story:
Pigs Will Fly organises and leads exciting rallies to classic motorsport events in Europe. Le Mans, Spa, Monza, Nurburgring and Silverstone are just some of the venues we will embrace. Le Mans is perhaps the most famous, a 24 hour endurance race for man and machine. Donned in vintage style overalls, helmets and goggles participants will enjoy an experience to fondly remember. We are seeking start up funding to make our pigs fly. 

Click here to contribute to our goal. 

The story so far...

I wanted to spend some quality time with my parents as they both live abroad. My Father and I had always dreamed of going to Le Mans but never thought we would get the opportunity, "Pigs Might Fly" we thought! So his 60th birthday was the catalyst to us finally making the pilgrimage to La Sarthe for the 24 hour endurance race. We have been going ever since that first trip in 2006!

Over the years we have taken friends, family and an ever growing number of like minded enthusiasts with us to Le Mans, both guiding and introducing them to the best features of visiting this event.

For our own entertainment we began introducing more elements to the experience and felt other people would enjoy our Rally and hopefully take the opportunity to tick this off their wish list because through ourselves - Pigs Will Fly!

The Vision

Pigs Will Fly will bring together motorsports enthusiasts. Participants will be guided by our very own "Wild Boars" and take part in a themed Rally dressed in personalised branded replica race-wear, experiencing a road trip to some of the most iconic venues such as Le Mans, Spa, Monza, Nurburgring and Silverstone to enjoy the racing.

Why we need your help

To move from "might" to "will" we are seeking to raise the funding needed to create, promote, and deliver the Pigs Will Fly brand. We are working with professionals in all areas of our business as we launch and they have already contributed their time and expertise generously.  The money raised will be used to complete the startup phase. Click here to contribute now.

This chart shows the breakdown of the budget:

A taste of Pigs Will Fly

PWF - Le Mans Rally 2016

Pigs Will Fly offers the opportunity to join our Rally, you will be with like minded individuals who like road trips, have a sense of adventure and enjoy watching Motorsport.

Costume

As a PWF Rally Entrant we will make sure you look every bit the racing driver. You will be provided with your own set of personalised replica overalls that will be emblazoned with your name and our associated company sponsors. Along with your suit we will provide you with your very own racing goggles and branded linen racing helmet. All the items provided will be yours to keep as a memento of your experience with us.

The fancy dress aspect of our event will heighten your enjoyment of the Rally as you will soon appreciate the extra attention you will receive, not only on the journey to the event but at the race itself.

Feel famous for the weekend and be prepared, as you will have the general public asking you for photographs, especially as we walk the Pit Lane on Friday morning. Lycra clad Pit Girls will be more than happy to have pictures taken with you, so make sure you bring a camera!

Don't be a bore, be a Wild Boar!

Car

But what good is a driver without an authentic car. Entrants are welcome to bring any car, there are no restrictions (bear in mind it has to fit on a ferry! ). 

PWF will provide as part of the price a set of authentic personalised stickers for your car, including names of drivers and passengers. Associated company sponsors and supporters stickers will also be provided for the bonnet, doors and boot to all help you feel like Steve McQueen for the weekend!

Camaraderie

As we will be Rallying to the event together, walkie-talkies will also be supplied as part of the event. Rally entrants will be able to chat en route to one another and encourages fun and banter between cars and builds camaraderie amongst our party.

Camping

The Le Mans circuit is vast and our experience has led us to basing our event at the Tertre Rouge part of the circuit. Rather than separate parking and camping away from your car, our site allows you to camp next to your car so you are near to all of the items you need to ensure you have a good time.

Tertre Rouge in our opinion is the best location as you have easy access on foot to a lot of the activities on offer such as go karting, fairground, music concert, bars, restaurants, the iconic Dunlop Bridge and more notably a fantastic vantage point for watching the racing. The pits, grandstands and circuit village are 5 minutes walk from our site so you have everything within easy reach.

Itinerary

Here at PWF we keep things fairly informal with regards to organised fun, we understand our entrants will want to enjoy the atmosphere at their own pace and as such suggest places to visit.

If you decide to join us on the items mentioned on the agenda then fantastic, if not it is completely fine. The beauty of the endurance race is you can dip in and out of watching as you wish and mix it up with the other things happening in and around the circuit.

Here's what you can expect.

Day 1

Depart From Meeting Point - wearing full Rally attire with your car stickered up.

Group Assembly - to refuel, comfort breaks, final check to ensure you have all the relevant paperwork

Arrival At The Port of Dover - once checked into the dock entrants get the opportunity to meet each other at the dockside while they await to board the ferry.

Board The Ferry - Grab a bite to eat, the cost of the meal is not included in the package price. Use your voucher to collect your free case of lager - Courtesy of Travel Destinations!

Port Of Calais - Depart the port and head for Le Mans, travelling party lead by Matthew Mitchell. Keeping in contact with the touring party via walkie talkies in case people require to stop for fuel etc and general communication en route.

Arrive At The Circuit - Ensure all our party gain admission into the Tertre Rouge camp site, ensure all our party get tents erected prior to getting out there and exploring.

Orientation & Practice - Head over to the paddock, explore the different grandstands which are open to all during practice. These are easily some of the best seats in the house. Wander over the famous Dunlop Bridge and along the track to see the cars speeding through the "S" bend at Virage de la Foret as the sun sets.

Night owl - practice your night time photography - remember your tripod!

Back To Base - To bed for a lie in...

Day 2

To The Pits - Be a "Legend In Your Own Mind" wearing the racing overalls, goggles and helmets our party can undertake a pit walk.
Go Shopping - The "Village" is the place to be to pick up some souvenirs, a race radio and other essentials.
Drivers Parade - Guided by Matthew MItchell, our party takes the tram to the Centre of Le Mans.
Culinary Delights - While in the centre of Le Mans, it is a good opportunity to grab an evening meal and a few beers at one of the local restaurants before heading back to the circuit via the tram.
Nightlife - For those who wish to carry on partying there is plenty of entertainment just yards from the Tertre Rouge campsite.

Day 3

Breakfast - Up bright and early as race day is here!
Concert - Our group can take the opportunity to wander across to the stage opposite our campsite to enjoy the gig.

Warm Up - Grab your coffee and relax by the Dunlop Bridge opposite our campsite,  to witness the warm up laps and morning's racing.

Ready For The Off - Our group makes way to the start/finish straight and join the festival atmosphere. Sing along with the crowds and enjoy the pre-race action while jostling for a good place to stand.

Race Start - Watch as the cars set off on their 24hour adventure!

Barbecue - Take a moment to enjoy a group barbecue at the camp site, with the background noise of the racing!

Fairground - Our group can take some time out from spectating to enjoy all the fun of the fair, go karting is good fun and the big wheel is a good vantage point to take aerial photographs of the circuit as darkness descends. As night falls, take a ride on the Ferris Wheel for a bird's eye view of the course. Hang out opposite the pits as at night as they are fully lit, this gives a ringside view to all the action and the work going on.

Day 4

Time Out - Take some time out from group activities, suggestions for something a little different are heading into the old town via the tram for a coffee and a croissant, taking in the famous Cathedral. Alternatively, take some time to visit the Le Mans Museum which is based within the circuit complex and approximately 10 minutes walk from the camp site. The Museum houses a fantastic collection of former race winning cars.

Final Stages - Time to head back to the start/finish line. Our group can find a spot near the barriers and watch he cars jostling for their final positions and the late drop outs limping back to the pits.

Finish - All done for another year, the barriers are pulled back and the huge crowds surge forward to the foot of the podium, our group joins in to complete the Le Mans experience, followed by a circuit walk back towards our campsite.

Relax - Time for the group to unwind, grab a bite to eat prior to eat and relax in readiness for departure tomorrow. Limiting the lager consumption as some of the party will be driving early the next morning!

Day 5

Leave Le Mans - Tents packed up and en route to Calais, lead by Matthew Mitchell

Port Of Calais - Arrive 1 hour before the ferry departs (12:35) to ensure the group boards successfully.

Board Ferry - Grab a bite to eat ( food and drink not included in the package price ), take time to look at duty and generally take the opportunity to relax prior to further driving back in the UK.

Port Of Dover - Arrival back in the UK. Here is where the group will either stick together en route back home or disperse and follow their own agendas in readiness for the next year!

We demand a lot from our partners and they and we will ensure that every penny raised is used to deliver a memorable and wonderful experience to all who embark on a PWF Rally. 

Other Ways You Can Help

Of course we'd love you become a Pigs Will Fly backer by making a contribution but we would also value your support by sharing this opportunity with your family, friends and work colleagues so that as many as possible hear about us.


Don't be a bore, be a wild boar!

story:
Do you dream travel round the world, or dream about meeting your favourite star, or even to find the special one? I have one too. That’s to be a full-fledged designer. For 28 years, I have gone through ups and downs, bumping and occasionally falling in life, however the discovery of Crowdfunding has re-ignited a fire within for me. Thus, I have decided to design DVa (in CROATIAN mean TWO ).

 (unlacing the shoe to transform to another design of shoe, life is fun!)

With DVa, All you need is One Pair! Multiple Playful Designs! Trendy! Affordable! Changing It However You Like! Everyone should own one! 

（Mix and Match change the shoe lace change the top to make your very own unique shoe)

Designing DVa is a painstaking process. It's complex design has caused many manufacturers to turn me down. The remaining handful that were willing to collaborate either quoted a high cost or required me to produce a much higher quantity. After much blood and sweat, I am thankful to finally find a willing partner, but have to commit certain amount of ordering in order to make DVa.

I am a dreamer, one that work hard to attain my dream. You are the dream builder. And that is why I hope you will love DVa and help me fulfill this dream I have.

Wish everyone dream come true! LOVE YOU! SEE YA!

FACEBOOK

INSTAGRAM


We use Europe Size, Don't forget to email us (lynvas@icloud.com) or comment at indiegogo for your shoe size in Europe size

story:
Hello to all. I am Nore, the founder of an upcoming sneaker boutique called, Treasure Sneakers. My passion for sneakers started in 1995. When I was just a teen, I always found myself redesigning my sneakers to give them a better style. Rather they were Nike, Puma, Timberland or any other sneakers, I would give them my own unique look. My efforts were to bring to the community a sense of style and fashion in everyday footwear, I decided to open up a sneaker store to bring together a variety of select sneakers. Sneakers are more than just athletic shoes, they have become an integral part of our lives, and as such need to reflect our individual personality and style.

I have taken my company as far as it can go on my own and am at the point where I now need your help!

I have estimated that I will need at least $25,000 to cover expenses such as the purchase of high end select brand sneakers, production of my own line of sneakers, a store located in a high traffic area, and basic overhead operating expenses for the first six months. 

I have had models at fashion shows wear the unique sneakers I have selected for them. As recently as the Behind the Bench National Wives Basketball Wives Association Touching A Life Gala Benefit Fashion Show in New York City this year to benefit cancer research.

This is my first love, my passion and my first business. I know there will be obstacles to overcome, the finances being one of them. However, what business has not had obstacles. I have the determination and the discipline to see this through. Having my own business doing something that I love has given me the motivation to prove something to myself and make my family proud of me. As I continue to network my aim is to surround myself with people of the same mind and goals.

Other Ways You Can Help

I am mature enough to realize that as important as money is in the business world it is not the only way to accomplish your goals. I also need people to help spread the word about my upcoming Sneaker Boutique "Treasure Sneakers"!

story:
Business summary:

Ghesad is a luxury fashion brand which is based in London that currently focuses exclusively on locally producing designer clothing pieces for our line of womenswear. Ghesad was founded by Ahmed Ghesad and Stanley Haertl. 

We are university students who are currently studying business marketing and business management.  We certainly have an entrepreneurial sprite and we are out to bring our luxury womenswear to the front line in this industry.

Grey T-Shirt

   

Business aims:

Currently Ghesad are trying to secure a handful of local boutiques in London, the company is projecting to sell all of our stock due to it being limited at the start of our business. The money is going to current plans such as  being able to fill in large orders from boutiques and retail stores. the money is also going to our future plans include expansion in the products, setting up our own distribution channels and manufacturing relationships in England.

Our vision for Ghesad is simple, minimalistic and classic fashionable piece for womenswear made withthe highest fabrics and materials that we could find. Manufactured locally and created with the intent to make the fit so comfortable that you’ll never want to take our clothes off.

Black Wool Jumper 

   

Challenges:

After we both worked for several years in the retail and fashion industries respectively, one thing became increasingly clear to both of us; we both loved the industry and where fashion is going in the future. With cheap labour being continuously exploited with abysmal working condition overseas we decided that we would like to create, sample, and manufacture all our products here in the United Kingdom to try and create jobs whist making a name for ourselves.  

Long Sleeved Black Polo

   

Brand Differentiation and Value Proposition:

At Ghesad we firmly believe that with the founder’s combined experience, industry partnerships, and focus on providing the quality products with sustainability in mind from cradle to grave, the brand can stand out. Our plan is to leverage our British heritage and love for the fabric and use a marketing strategy that is closely aligned with building personal relationships with our target market.

Our Thank You T-Shirt

story:
BarnabasGerei.com

Who We Are 


Barnabas Gerei Apparel is a small apparel company located in Budapest, Hungary .Owned and operated by Barnabas Gerei, I've been designing apparel  since 2009. I started the business about a year ago. My dream is to be an owner of a big apparel company.  I need your help with in getting some funds to get started.(Marketing & Producing )

The Idea

 This apparel company is set to release a full sale of wide array of clothing’s such as handmade designer tee shirts and other awesome garments that are sure to offer new, trendy items. All of their clothes are checked by the owner to ensure the best quality. For tee shirts, pricing will be at five hundred dollars!. All items will come with certification of authenticity. These are also packed in their exclusive boxes.


Pre-order now and get a chance to wear something that other people have not worn yet.


With the finest materials and all-inclusive sizes for every body type, the clothes are expected to be the best apparel ever worn, after the big launching in June. 

This year will be a great year for the soon-to-launch finest apparel ever made. Two months to go and the public will experience Barnabas Gerei with its exclusive tee designs and styles uniquely created for exclusivity.

Pre-order now and get a chance to wear something that other people have not worn yet.


More and more people are expressing their interest and support for the highly anticipated apparel brand. The company also wants to encourage those who like to place their pre-order through the famous crowdfunding site.



The finest apparel’s tee shirts are exclusively designed to provide individuality for every user. They are also available in various colors that perfectly match the preference of every user.


With the finest materials and all-inclusive sizes for every body type, the clothes are expected to be the best apparel ever worn, after the big launching in June. This year will be a great year for the soon-to-launch finest apparel ever made. Two months to go and the public will experience Barnabas Gerei with its exclusive tee designs and styles uniquely created for exclusivity.



Pre-order now and get a chance to wear something that other people have not worn yet.



We have already established social media identities and have begun building our audience for the website launch. Here are our official pages:

Website: http://www.barnabasgerei.com
Facebook: https://www.facebook.com/BarnabasGerei
Twitter: https://twitter.com/BarnabasGerei

If you choose to support our campaign, you'll be helping a small business with big dreams get a start . PLUS you'll receive the first exclusive T-shirts!

All of the money will be spent on marketing what we get !

story:
Created by a renowned podiatrist, ArchTek has launched a unisex dress sock that features a patented arch support system and uncompromising style. The sock’s advanced materials, built-in insole, and trademarked energy return system brings comfort technology to the world of fashion footwear.

 

 

 

We took the best sock out there and added our proprietary patented dynamic arch support for your foot, comfort, and everyday life and style.

 

 

 

 

 

 

 

Patented five-layer dynamic arch support system that has been shown to support the arch without weakening it as most insoles do. The arch is held in a way that adds structure and support but also trains the brain and leg muscles to control the arch, reducing foot and leg fatigue.

 

 

 

 

 

 

 

 

 

 

ArchTek® socks are fashionable and made of premium quality antibacterial materials to provide comfort and style, while also providing support and relief. ArchTek® socks come in 12 fashionable dress socks and 4 reinforced athletic socks.

 

12 ArchTek® Dress Sock Color Options 

*Backers can pick their sock styles & size when claiming the perk.

 

 

 

Our fashion dress socks come with built-in arch support and take the place of costly and ill-fitting insoles. Our patented dynamic arch support system stabilizes the foot without weakening the arch structures all without compromising your style.

 

 

 

ArchTek athletic socks provide the same patented arch support as our fashion socks but with a more robust yarn weave. This allows better dynamic support of the arch and foot during heavier and more intense activity.

 

 

 

 

Dr. Bob Baravarian is the inventor of ArchTek's patented arch support system and is a board-certified foot & ankle surgeon with more than 20 years’ of patient care experience. After he experienced foot pain during his travels, Dr. Bob wondered if there was a better and more affordable solution than wearing special shoes or expensive custom insoles to prevent foot pain. He worked for more than 2 years to re-engineer every aspect of the classic sock to create a more modern sock that is better for the foot and leg. “ArchTek stands for innovation, and changing the status quo for affordable, every day, fashionable socks.”

 

 

 

 

Nearly 8 in 10 Americans have suffered from foot pain and are also likely to have pain in other parts of their body because of it, according to the American Podiatric Medical Association. However, many people don't realize a sock can do as much to support the foot as an insole or a shoe can.

 

 

 

ArchTek® is more than just a sock. It is footwear featuring patented technology that is a complete overhaul of the traditional dress sock. The ArchTek® sock allows the wearer to wear their athletic or dress shoes of choice, without compromising style or support.

 

 

 

 

 

 

 

 

 

True-Fit Sizing allows us to tailor our socks to fit everyone without compromise. This means there is no bunching up fabric in the toe area, and the heel will fit like a glove. Our socks come in the two most popular sizes, covering a range of almost 80% of adults. 

Check our FAQ's for more information on picking your size.

 

 

 

 

 

 

 

 

We are honored to have your support, and we are thankful for your trust. We want to say thank you, and that we appreciate the faith you have in our brand to back our product.

Your feedback, good or bad, makes us a better brand and lets us serve you better, so please don’t keep quiet and message us directly. 

 

Risks and challenges

At ArchTek, we understand the importance of brand reputation, especially for new brands. We have spent over 2 years in preparation for this launch, which consists of design, product development, establishing logistics and shipping channels and executing pre-production runs to ensure a seamless and enjoyable experience to our backers. We will be working with trusted manufacturers, who supply many global brands. They work with some of the world’s biggest brands and have the capability, scale and expertise to meet any demand. We have the utmost confidence in their ability to deliver. We also planned for production risks by producing approximately 1200 of each SKU, and could quickly manufacture more as needed. Regardless, there could be production delays as with any manufacturing. We will perform thorough checks of the finished pieces using industrial QC standards. With any high volume production run, the biggest inherent risk is timing. We’ve consulted with numerous logistics experts and sample tested our manufacturer to ensure we can deliver an amazing product on time. We will be extremely transparent and open with regards to updates on the status of production and shipment. We will be working with a local fulfillment center in the US, hence custom charges may apply depending on where you're ordering from. Each parcel will have a tracking number so it can be tracked. Unfortunate events can sometimes happen, so in the event a parcel is lost during its delivery we will do everything we can to help track it down and if the error is with our team we will send you a new one. However, we are not responsible for packages delivered outside the expected time frame. We will be posting regular updates here.

story:
Areni 1 Footwear: Comfort, Style, and Craftsmanship Born from Heritage

Welcome to the world of Areni 1 Footwear. Our feet are rooted in a mystical history, and our eyes are set on the horizon of what’s to come. We believe in honest craftsmanship, bold design, and celebrating culture. Handmade in Armenia by a tight knit team of 40 craftsmen, each pair of Areni 1’s is brought to life with passion. After raising $40,000 on Kickstarter, we're excited to bring our product line to the IGG community! 

Joe Andrews (BluMaan) Raves about Areni 1

 

Click to See Blumaan's Review

Our Premier Low Top in Blue/Orange

 

Discover our Handmade Premier Collection

 Introducing the Premier High Top: a lifestyle shoe for the modern creative. Striking styling combine with subtle touches to make this a one-of-a-kind fashion product. 

Handmade quality, premium Italian leather, and long-lasting TPU soles ensure excellent durability and comfort. A laceless design eliminates pressure points and makes for daily ease of use.

Our Premier High Top in Black

Our Premier Low Top model was designed to exemplify velocity and refinement. 

Dynamic elastics work together to offer a perfect fit, while our signature hand-stitched  detailing provides an extra touch of craftsmanship. 

Premier Low Top in Blue/Orange

 

 

Inspired by 5,500 Years of Shoemaking Tradition

Armenia is home to the world’s oldest leather shoe- made 5,500 years ago and discovered in the Areni 1 cave. We celebrate this tradition today by including historical inspirations in our modern footwear. 

Urartian Cuneiform: the inspiration behind the Premier High Top

 

Garni's Symphony of Stones Formation, the pattern used to mold our soles

The Areni 1 Cave and the 5,500 year old Leather Shoe Discovered Inside it

Design

Whether studying the stitching of 1,900 year old pagan Armenian shoes, or recreating ancient script from a 2,800 year old fortress, our designers incorporate glimpses from our past into each model. 

Closeup on the PLT's hand stitched detailing

 

As incredible as the history behind our products is, we didn't stop there. Our shoes are built to perform in the here and now. By combining the unparalleled quality and comfort of a handcrafted upper with the longest lasting soles available, we have created the ultimate lifestyle sneaker.

Squishy foams fail to provide the midsole stability and support needed during prolonged periods of walking. Antiquated rubber soles offer inadequate shock absorption and wear down quickly. Polyurethane offers optimal support and outlasts both!

Social Responsibility

Major brands mass produce shoes with sub-par materials in dehumanizing factories. We reject this wholeheartedly. That’s why Areni 1’s are made in a workshop by a small team of 40 veteran craftsmen right in the heart of Yerevan using environmentally sustainable and biodegradable materials.

 

 

 

Materials

Our shoes are made using the finest Italian grade A leather. Because that's not enough, our shoemakers combine it with layers of high durability textiles to ensure your Areni 1’s break in just the right amount. 

Our soles are made from a single custom molded piece of biodegradable polyurethane that outlasts EVA foam 10 to 1 and vulcanized rubber 5 to 1. 

Models/Colorways

Our two models, the Premier High Top and Premier Low Top, are each available in 4 distinct yet versatile colorways.

Sizing

All of our shoes are produced by EU standards. To find your size, check out the chart below. At the end of the campaign you will receive a survey email to pick your size and color. 

If you find yourself between sizes, we recommend sizing up. As our shoes are built for lifestyle and not exclusively for sport, they are roomier than most.

Our Promise

We pledge to provide you with shoes that are as beautiful and nuanced as they are comfortable and long lasting. We pledge to conduct ourselves with transparency and honesty. And finally, we pledge to help make the next chapter of Armenia’s spectacular story one to remember. 

Completed Uppers Ready to have their Soles attached

One of our US bound shipments 

About Our Founder 

New Jersey native Cole Tashjian repatriated to Armenia 3 years ago. Initially working as a consultant, Cole began putting together his passion project, Areni 1 Footwear, on the side. From the initial concept boards, to tech packs, to the brand’s very first prototype, he worked to bridge Armenia’s heritage and knowledge in traditional shoemaking with a futuristic aesthetic. Today, Areni 1 Footwear is ready to share its unique story with the world, and to participate in the rebirth of Armenian shoemaking.

Social Responsibility
Major brands mass produce shoes with sub-par materials in dehumanizing factories. We reject this wholeheartedly. That’s why Areni 1’s are made in a workshop by a small team of 40 veteran craftsmen right in the heart of Yerevan using environmentally sustainable and biodegradable materials.
 

 

 
Materials
Our shoes are made using the finest Italian grade A leather. Because that's not enough, our shoemakers combine it with layers of high durability textiles to ensure your Areni 1’s break in just the right amount. 
Our soles are made from a single custom molded piece of biodegradable polyurethane that outlasts EVA foam 10 to 1 and vulcanized rubber 5 to 1. 
Models/Colorways

Our two models, the Premier High Top and Premier Low Top, are each available in 4 distinct yet versatile colorways.

Sizing
All of our shoes are produced by EU standards. To find your size, check out the chart below. At the end of the campaign you will receive a survey email to pick your size and color. 

If you find yourself between sizes, we recommend sizing up. As our shoes are built for lifestyle and not exclusively for sport, they are roomier than most.
Our Promise
We pledge to provide you with shoes that are as beautiful and nuanced as they are comfortable and long lasting. We pledge to conduct ourselves with transparency and honesty. And finally, we pledge to help make the next chapter of Armenia’s spectacular story one to remember. 

Completed Uppers Ready to have their Soles attached

One of our US bound shipments 
About Our Founder 

New Jersey native Cole Tashjian repatriated to Armenia 3 years ago. Initially working as a consultant, Cole began putting together his passion project, Areni 1 Footwear, on the side. From the initial concept boards, to tech packs, to the brand’s very first prototype, he worked to bridge Armenia’s heritage and knowledge in traditional shoemaking with a futuristic aesthetic. Today, Areni 1 Footwear is ready to share its unique story with the world, and to participate in the rebirth of Armenian shoemaking.

story:
Our Watch Collection

 

Our Design Features

 

Why wear an automatic watch? 

Mechanical watches have hundreds of tiny gears moving together as one and are characterised by the smooth glide of the seconds hand across the watch face. They are powered by hand-winding and in the case of an automatic like ours, the motions of the wearer's wrist are converted into energy by means of a rotor and powers the watch- there are no batteries in our watches! 

Generally, the world of mechanical watches is a niche market, and one dominated by men. Mechanical wristwatches comprise only 3% of the international watch market, out of which three-quarters comprises men’s watches. This means that less than 1% of watches in the world comprise of ladies mechanical wristwatches. We hope to introduce women to the beauty of mechanical watches and change the way women wear and think about watches, one watch at a time!    

 

Want to see the watches?

 

If you are in Singapore, our watches are on display at Watch Wonderland (address: #01-470/472 North Wing Suntec City) for you to touch, see and feel the watches and our beautiful lacquered wooden box. 

Production Schedule

 

 

*Update: As our first batch of timepieces have arrived, we have a limited supply of ready stock and can ship out to you within 3 working days via DHL express. You can expect to receive your order within 10 days! 

 

About our founder  

 

I started The Eliana Timekeeper as a passion project and it has now taken on a life of its own. It was difficult for me to find a mechanical watch that I liked or could afford; the options available were either too masculine or overly-decorated. Most of my friends were unaware of the difference between a mechanical and a quartz watch, while those who were aware, felt that mechanical/ automatic watches were either too expensive or chunky. This is why I wanted to make my own watch- to introduce more women to mechanical watches. The watches are named after my firstborn,  and I hope you'll enjoy our watches as much as I know she will.

If you have any thoughts or queries, feel free to reach me directly at sherrie@elianatimekeeper.com. You can also view our media kit here. I hope you'll enjoy our watches!

                                                                                                Yours Sincerely, Sherrie Han

Links to reviews of the Twilight Glint:

1. MasterHorologer 2. The Time Bum 3. Haulogerie, 4. Wristwatch Review UK 

5. Crown, 6. Wah so shiok! 

 

Risks and challenges

Risk on your end is minimal as production has already started. We have already purchased all the movements and are in the process of mass manufacturing.

An in-house support capability has also been established to handle the rare occurrence of any mechanical/ workmanship issues on our end, meaning your warranty is well-validated.

Import Duty & VAT will be an additional cost for some countries. We do not take responsibility for any additional cost incurred that is subjected to your countries import rules and regulations.

story:
Materials

  • Eco- Friendly ABS Frame
  • Impact Resistant Lens

Dimensions

  • Arm Length: 140mm
  • Arm Angle: 35°
  • Face Length: 145mm

Lens Dimensions

  • Lens Depth: 4.5mm
  • Lens Length: 53mm
  • Lens Height: 44mm

Features

  • UV400nm Protection
  • Anti Reflective 
  • Perfectly Balanced
  • Anti Indent
  • Super Lightweight
  • Laser Etched
  • Matte Finish
 

Risks and challenges

Over the last 18 months, we've sought out the most premium materials we could use in sunglasses, worked tirelessly to combine them into one perfect package and communicated all our needs to many suppliers across the globe. We narrowed down our list to the perfect three suppliers, all proficient in making sunglasses and who have already made some of the pairs you see on the campaign. Our supply chain - from raw materials to shipping - is readily prepared to take on any magnitude of preorders. Our manufacturers have direct connections to the suppliers and our warehousing team where your sunglasses will be quality checked, packed and sealed to go out to you. It’s our mission to ensure everyone has a chance to see the world in a new light.

Environmental commitments

Indiegogo encourages sustainable practices.

Long-lasting design

The lenses are crafted in a specialist way to ensure that they're able to stand a lot of impact without smashing into your eyes. This way we can ensure you're out of harm's way and enjoying your sunglasses.

Sustainable materials

Our sunglasses frames are made from 100% recycled ABS plastic which itself can be 100% recycled.

Sustainable Distribution

We only use sustainably sourced Eco-Friendly packaging with all our sunglasses to lessen our impact on the environment.

 

Press ⌘C to copy

story:
Who are MGTHA?

We created MGTHA (pronounced Mangutha) with the aim of bringing high quality minimalist watches, that can be worn in any situation be it casual or professional, at an affordable price. We create our watches with the belief that class and style should not need to be at breakneck prices, but affordable for those that are looking.

We want to create a community of people who share the same passion for watches as us, and then help that community define their own style and make a statement, resulting in MGTHA Watches being founded.

What We Need & What You Get

So to speak about where the funding will go in more detail!

First of all, the funding will be used to produce our first batch of watches. We have found a reliable, high-status manufacturer, with many years of working in the business, who have produced watches for Tom Carter Watch. This first batch will be a batch of 100. 

The second aspect any donations will be going to is website development. We currently have our own domain - https://mgtha.com and we will be hiring a professional website builder. All of this section will cost us around £300.

The third and final aspect donations will be going towards is advertising. This is arguably the most important aspect, so we can grow the MGTHA Community. This advertising will be primarily done through Facebook, as this is the biggest social media outlet, and we are firm believers in social media having the potential to create an inter branching network of similarly minded people worldwide. The advertising will also be done using googleads, as google is the largest search engine in the world. We have already begun the social media development, with our instagram growing brilliantly in the 2/3 weeks we have had it active, already at 15,000 followers! You can find our instagram here - https://www.instagram.com/mgtha/ . This advertising will cost around £700.

How do you get your watches?

This began with us designing the watch, and deciding on specifications with the manufacturers. They are currently creating a sample, which will be sent to us, for confirmation. If the sample is how we want the watches to look, we send over the payment for the first batch of watches, which then begin production. Once production is completed, we get sent the watches, and we then send them to you!

This whole process can vary dependant on the sample quality check being correct or not, but we will create the watches in a quick turnaround time, but not so quick that we sacrifice any quality! We want to give the MGTHA Community only the best.

About the watch itself

The specifications of the watches are:
  • Case size (Diameter) - 40mm
    • Case thickness - 7mm
    • Case Material - 304L Stainless Steel
    • Strap material - Genuine leather
    • Strap colour - Black
    • Strap width - 20mm
    • Water resistance - 10ATM (Up to 100m)
    • Watch glass covering - Sapphire Crystal
    • Movement - Quartz Movement
Below is a picture of the watch face (Without the hands):

How does MGTHA plan to develop?

We are aiming to bring many more styles and colour combinations first of all to this original collection. We will then develop into offering milanese (mesh) straps for our watches, and stainless steel straps. The speed of this is dependant on the success of this campaign

What does our warranty cover?

We are confident in the quality of our watches, so confident that we offer a 24 month guarantee with any watch you purchase.

Warranty does not cover:  

  • Life of the battery 
  • Wear/tear and ageing (e.g. scratched crystal; alteration of the colour) 
  • Any damage on any part of the watch resulting from abnormal/abusive use, lack of care, negligence, accidents (knocks, dents, crushing, broken crystal, etc.)

Risks & Challenges

Obviously along the way, as there are with any new brands, there will be challenges. The main one is obviously the promotion and advertisement, trying to reach grow the MGTHA Community out there. We will constantly be promoting the brand through our social media pages, but you could really help us out by giving our facebook a like or a share - https://facebook.com/mgthawatches and following our instagram, our username is @MGTHA

Other Ways You Can Help

We understand that you may not be able to contribute money, however this does not mean you can't contribute at all! A share of this and/or our facebook will grow the MGTHA Community, as well as follows of our instagram!

There is not much more to say really, thank you very much for reading this, and if you choose to help in any way at all, it is greatly appreciated!

story:
The ULTIMATE REVOLUTION in YOGA WEAR.

THIS IS WHY!

Our STORY began with a great DESIRE to put on CLOTHING that fits our ACTIVE LIFESTYLE that not only looks good, feels great & made to last for years to come. But it was just as IMPORTANT or even more to know that it was MADE CONSCIOUSLY - not harming our planet & not using child, forced or undervalued labor. With fast fashion & disposable clothing at an all time high, it was imperative to create clothing that echoes our values - what we truly think is QUALITY. We believe YOGA as one of the GREATEST TOOLs for BALANCE & WELL BEING. 

CONSCIOUS YOGA CLOTHING is Awakened Heart & Mind's foundation, or call us "AHM" for short. We started from the beginning of the supply chain. We use only GMO free fibers woven into the best quality organic fabric that meet our high standards. We teamed up with an experienced company manufacturing quality clothing. With their cutting edge equipment to construct each piece to adapt to the diverse movements of yoga, our garments reach a new level of performance. This is how we define TRUE QUALITY INSIDE & OUT!

We’ve designed every piece with simplicity, elegance & timelessness so that you will want to wear them even after your practice.

With the active woman in mind living in this very busy world & superfast times, this would be the ultimate sports apparel of choice.

HERE'S A CLOSE LOOK AT THE ADVANCED TECHNOLOGY WE PUT INTO EACH PIECE WE CREATE.

  • STYLE 1: THE V-STRAPS SPORT BRA, COLOR: BLACK

  • STYLE 2: THE U-SPORT BACK BRA, COLOR: TAN

  • STYLE 3: THE T-BACK TANK, COLOR: BLUE

  • STYLE 4: THE U-SPORT BACK TANK, COLOR: SOLAR YELLOW

  • STYLE 5: THE ULTIMATE LEGGINGS, COLOR: POPPY CORAL

  • STYLE 6: THE LIMITLESS LEGGINGS, COLOR: POPPY CORAL

WHY WE CHOOSE ONLY ORGANIC COTTON &/OR BAMBOO?

THE PEOPLE WHO MAKE THE CLOTHES MATTER!

OUR RESPECTABLE MAKERS 

A multigenerational owned company with over 25 years of experience manufacturing fine quality clothing using their cutting edge equipment and seamless technology.


INTRODUCING...

 THE ESSENTIALS 

  • Style 1: Our seamless V-straps sport bra is flattering for all types of practice. 
  • Special rib guides at the bust area is created for better support & compression around the cups.
  • Mesh weave aids in air flow, heat release & sweat evaporation to cool you.
  • Elastic straps for better fit & full range of motion.
  • Available sizes: XS, S, M, L, XL (See MEAURE GUIDE)

  • Style 2: Our seamless U-Sport back bra is just perfect for your low impact practice.
  • Special rib guides at the front chest area creates compression around the cups while following the contour for the perfect fit & support.
  • Elastic straps for comfort & better fit. 
  • Available sizes: XS, S, M, L, XL (See MEASURE GUIDE)

  • Style 3: Our seamless T-Back sport tank is ideal for all types of practice - low & high impact. 
  • Built in bra for extra support.
  • Mesh weave increases air flow to cool you all around the front & back midsection during sweat build up. It also aids in heat evaporation.
  • T-back style & close body fit for freedom of movement & minimal distractions during practice.
  • Available sizes: XS, S, M, L, XL (See MEASURE GUIDE)

  • Style 4: Our seamless U-Sport back tank is great for all types of practice. 
  • The built in bra for extra support.
  • Rib guides optimizes fit to follow contours of bust.
  • Woven mesh system enhances movement, moisture wicking & cools you during sweat build up.
  • Sport back style & wide armholes for full range of motion.
  • Elastic straps for better fit & comfort.
  • Available sizes: XS, S, M, L, XL (See MEASURE GUIDE)


  • Style 5: Our ultimate leggings is designed for low & high impact work out.
  • Rib system panels that run along the sides optimize fit & variety of movement.
  • Woven mesh cooler panels allow air to circulate & helps to keep you cool.
  • Keep your keys or credit card in the internal pouch pocket.
  • Available sizes: XS, S, M, L, XL (See MEASURE GUIDE)


  • Style 6: Our limitless leggings is irresistible for your daily practice.
  • The micro dot system that run all around the legs from the bottom upward in contrast color follows contour of the legs heighten fit & magnifies freedom of movement.
  • Keep your keys or membership card in the internal pouch pocket.
  • Available sizes: XS, S, M, L, XL (See MEASURE GUIDE)


  • PERK $55 = 1 BRA
  • Choose your own size/color from Bra Style 1 or 2 


  • PERK $120 = 1 TANK
  • Choose your own size/color from Tank Style 3 or 4


  • PERK $145 = 1 LEGGINGS
  • Choose your own size/color from Leggings Style 5 or 6


  • PERK $170 = COMBO PACK: 1 BRA + 1 TANK
  • Choose your own size/color from Style 1 & 2 + Style 3 or 4


  • PERK $190 = COMBO PACK: 1 BRA + 1 LEGGINGS 
  • Choose your own size/color from Style 1 or 2 + Style 5 or 6


  • PERK $255 = COMBO PACK: 1 TANK + 1 LEGGINGS 
  • Choose your own size/color from Style 3 or 4 + Style 5 or 6


  • PERK $300 = TRIO PACK: 1 BRA + 1 TANK + 1 LEGGINGS 
  • Choose your own size/color from Style 1 or 2 + Style 3 or 4 + Style 5 or 6


  • PERK $600 = THE ESSENTIAL COLLECTION 
  • Your choice of 2 BRAS + 2 TANKS + 2 LEGGINGS
  • Choose your own sizes/colors from Styles 1 +2 + 3 + 4 + 5 + 6


  • PERK $1,200 = THE ULTIMATE REVOLUTION YOGI COLLECTION
  • Choose any 2 colors/sizes from each style of the collection


FAQS: 

HOW DO WE REQUEST OUR CHOICE OF STYLE, SIZE & COLOR AFTER CONTRIBUTION?

We will be sending you an email once your contribution is received to confirm the specific details of your request.

HOW ABOUT SHIPPING COST?

There will be an additional shipping cost for the United States & Worldwide.

FOR ALL OTHER INQUIRY

Please contact us by going to our website www.ahmworld.com

PERK $255 = COMBO PACK: 1 TANK + 1 LEGGINGS 


Choose your own size/color from Style 3 or 4 + Style 5 or 6







PERK $300 = TRIO PACK: 1 BRA + 1 TANK + 1 LEGGINGS 

Choose your own size/color from Style 1 or 2 + Style 3 or 4 + Style 5 or 6






PERK $600 = THE ESSENTIAL COLLECTION 
Your choice of 2 BRAS + 2 TANKS + 2 LEGGINGS
Choose your own sizes/colors from Styles 1 +2 + 3 + 4 + 5 + 6







PERK $1,200 = THE ULTIMATE REVOLUTION YOGI COLLECTION
Choose any 2 colors/sizes from each style of the collection

















FAQS: 
HOW DO WE REQUEST OUR CHOICE OF STYLE, SIZE & COLOR AFTER CONTRIBUTION?
We will be sending you an email once your contribution is received to confirm the specific details of your request.
HOW ABOUT SHIPPING COST?
There will be an additional shipping cost for the United States & Worldwide.
FOR ALL OTHER INQUIRY
Please contact us by going to our website www.ahmworld.com

story:
Oct 2014 while working out together, we came up with the idea of designing a Lifestyle Brand because (1) Most Brands are Commercial styles Promoted by their Endorsement of Professional Athletes & Wearable Banners promoting the Company brand, (2) Most affordable styles consist of Basic Fabric combinations which don’t always feel good on the body nor do they respond well to Wet Dry Conditions or Body Types, & (3) We represent Millions of People who Believe in Hard Work and Dedication. Those who Put their Time and Effort into Becoming Better. We formed the PWR Brand for Those who NEVERSTOP.



We’re Not Here
Asking You To Fund an Idea!

We’re Asking You To Help Expand a
Real Life Brand That’s Already Growing!

We Wanted to Make a Brand that Represents Your Need to Keep Pushing Life to the Limit and NEVERSTOP so We took our Savings went to Work! First we worked with Manufacturers to come up with Our Signature PWRDRY™ Fabric to allow a more breathable Quick Dry Function to the Look and Fit of Each Style created. We wanted PWR to be Stylish, Comfortable and Designed to Fit an Active Lifestyle so once the Material was Created, We Started Building the Brand!

The Picture Below is a PWR Employee’s  Shirt That They’ve Worn & Washed Over 10 Times. Notice How Tightly Knit The Fabric is Even After Multiple Washes! Our PWRDRY Fabric and Knit Pattern Allows for a More Breathable Solution That Dries Quicker Allowing You To Tackle Your Lifestyle Without The Uncomfortable Long-term Moisture Feeling on Your Body.

NEVERSTOP is Not Just A Slogan,

It's How Each of Us Live Out Each Day!

From the Moment We're Born, we NEVERSTOP Trying to Overcome Obstacles and Reach New Goals. Whether You’re Young or Experienced in Life, The Importance of our Ability to NEVERSTOP is the Reason We Get Up, Get Out and Fight each Day to Be Better for Ourselves and Others.

  • Clothing is a basic necessity in our Lives and what we wear often represents what we like, what we believe and who we are. What You Wear Should Be a Positive Reflection of Who You Are. Not The Other Way Around. That’s PWR. And Supporting a Brand that Reflects Your Desire to Never Give Up, Never Settle and above all NEVERSTOP is the key to Making PWR Apparel a Successful Brand in Today’s Market.


    We’re working hard each day to make sure we stay dedicated to those who have chosen to make PWR Apparel a part of their Lifestyle Journey. We Jumped in this Huge Ocean Head First to Build a Company Everyone Could Be a Part of. We have gone from 500 Instagram Followers to Over 60,000 since August 2015. Our NEVERSTOP Phrase has resulted in a massive Consumer Following Online and our Apparel and Bands are popping up online all over the World from People Embracing the PWR Brand!


The Challenges We Can
Overcome With Your Help!

The Key to Being Successful in this Market is the Ability to Mass Produce our PWRDRY Fabric, Quality Styles and Designs at a low cost. This is where we are struggling! We need to increase our Fabric Manufacturing Quantity so that we can greatly reduce our Cost per Item. This will allow us to be More competitive in providing Quality Styles at a Pricing Level that will Allow Us to Compete in This Market and Bring the NEVERSTOP slogan to the World!

The Costs for Manufacturing and Producing our Full Line will max around $13k. With the fees associated with running this Campaign, hitting our Target amount will Secure our Full Line Release to Market! Successfully reaching our Target Goal will bring our overall item cost to consumer down 12-15% below industry competitors for similar apparel of matched quality and standard.

What Happens if
We Don’t Reach Our Goal?

Regardless of the Financial Outcome, we are dedicated to Pushing PWR to Market. We are Putting Every dime back into PWR to Continue to Grow Our Consumer Base. It’s So Exciting To See How Far We’ve Come in a Market Dominated by the Few Elite Brands that Control a Big Part of This Industry. To See the Proven Results of all of You Worldwide Embracing the PWR Brand and NEVERSTOP Motto has Proven to Us that We Can Turn This Growing Startup into a PWRful Global Brand.


We Want To Thank You

For Your Support!

Whether You Contribute $1 or $1000, We want to Say Thank You For Being a Supporter and Becoming a Part of the PWR Brand.  Your Contribution Brings Us 1 Step Closer To Our Goal & We Will Continue To Push PWR Apparel and Live by Our Motto to Never Give Up, Never Settle and Above All NEVERSTOP.

Thank You From Pwr Apparel
PLEASE SHARE OUR CAMPAIGN ON YOUR SOCIAL MEDIA
SPREAD THE WORD TO FRIENDS AND OTHERS WHO PUSH LIFE TO THE LIMIT

story:
A great shoe adventure

Independent Fox was born from our passion and commitment  to create the perfect pair of vegan shoes.

Leather is so last century! Modern, innovative materials are engineered to meet the special needs of your feet.

Independent Fox shoes are a real alternative for heavy leather shoes that don’t let your feet breathe and canvas shoes that get soaked in the rain and that you can’t wear to work.

They are lightweight, impermeable, extremely breathable, anti-bacterial and anti-odor. Designed to be elegant enough for work yet casual enough for everyday use. Its fine lines and color make it possible to match it with virtually anything in your closet!

A great pair of shoes that is not only beautiful but also comfortable and 100% cruelty-free, so both your feet and your soul will LOVE to wear them.

Now they are available to all our backers at an amazing price!

The lace-up Laika in black (retail price: 115 €) now available at a Super Early Bird price (88 €) for our first 20 backers!

Kind and Innovative

Shoes shouldn’t only be beautiful inside and out but also functional and comfortable. We wanted you to love wearing our shoes and to be able to walk in them all day, not wanting to take them off…ever. So we chose the best and most innovative vegan materials we could find that are not only exquisite but way superior to leather and 100% cruelty-free:

  • The outer part is made of an awesome water resistant yet extremely breathable and very durable microfiber. It’s beautiful like leather but 100% cruelty-free and more durable yet lightweight.
  • We lined the inside with a soft and 100% breathable yet very strong and durable microfiber that has excellent thermo-regulating properties to provide maximum comfort to your feet in all kinds of weather. It’s also antibacterial, antifungal and anti-odor so you can wear your pair of Independent Fox shoes without socks.

Whether you are running to the office in the rain or strolling in the park in the summer heat you can rest assured that your Independent Fox shoes will keep your feet happy, healthy and dry.

Pure and Simple

Pure and simple is beautiful. When designing our shoes we wanted them to reflect the effortlessly chic Parisian lifestyle. They combine the comfort provided by sneakers and the elegance of formal dress shoes, so you can wear them any time and for every occasion. With an urban minimalistic design they are perfect for work or leisure any time of the day. If you want to travel light, Independent Fox shoes can become that one pair you'll want to bring with you to go with all of your outfits. 

 

"Fashion fades, only style remains the same."

Coco Chanel

 

Just like Coco Chanel, we believe that the things we buy should accompany us for a long time. This is why we consciously went against the trend of fast fashion and designed our models with great care to be timeless and beautiful in their simplicity and withstand the whims of fashion trends.  So you can wear them year after year.

 

 

Sustainable and eco-friendly

We live in a fragile ecosystem where every choice we make has a great impact. This is why - when sourcing for material for our shoes - we chose a company that shares the same views and creates its beautiful and innovative fabrics in a CO²-free production system without harming the environment.  Our entire production is based in the EU and we selected our production base carefully to keep our carbon footprint to a minimum.

 

Both the shoe sole and the lining are recyclable and we used the most ecological glue available. We will ship your favorite pair of Independent Fox shoes in a box made of recycled paper.  

Our rewards

Buying online can sometimes be intimidating so we made Independent Fox shoes easily available. All our models carry the same price tag, with special offers for early birds… order early and save even more!

You can choose any of our models: the slip-on Cecil or the lace-up Laika. They are both available in black or white.

The shoes fit true to EU sizing, but we will send you a survey at the end of the campaign to find out your size and which model(s) you would like to receive.  If you decide to purchase several models you can choose any combination of model, color and size.

Free Worldwide shipping offered! To make it even more convenient we will ship your favorite pair(s) of Independent Fox shoes for free.

Do you have a question? Post it in the comments section and we will answer you straight away.

Help us spread the word

Please support our project and become one of our first ambassadors by sharing our story and message with your friends and family and telling the world what you chose…

Shoes that both your soul and your feet are happy to wear.

Treasure your choices.

story:
The wallet is always connected to your phone via Bluetooth.

Whenever you leave your wallet behind, like on a table in a restaurant, you will be notified immediately on your smartphone via notification and ringtone.

 

    

       

                  

 

Didn’t see the notification and still left the wallet behind? No problem! You can check what was the last location where you had your wallet!

There is also a chance that you will find your wallet through the lost & found feature. This uses the network of Mstates and Woolet wallets to recover yours.

 

                         

 

The wallet is very easy to charge. Just put it on any QI wireless charger. We will also provide you with a Mstates wireless charger.

Want to know how much battery you have left? Just head over to the phone app and check the battery level!

Time to charge: 2-3 hours

Battery life: Over 2 weeks

 

               

                           

                           

 

We’ve built the wallets to be elegant and efficient. No more fiddling with your wallet trying to find the right card. Just press the holder button and your cards will pop-up in a neatly presented manner. Currently, you can store 7 cards.

 

Also, as much as we would like to live in a cashless society, we aren’t there yet. We’ve added a nice cash compartment where you can store bills and receipts. It can comfortably fit up to 10 bills.

 

    

 

                  

 

We're all about efficiency. Why carry an access card around? There are a lot of things that can go wrong with that. You risk losing it somewhere, forgetting it at home or just leaving it on your desk and locking yourself out of the office.

To solve this problem we have implanted all Mstates wallets with a programmable NFC chip. You can set it up with your preferred frequency to open your home or office door. 

From now on, your wallet is your access card! Isn't that cool?

*Don't know how to program it? No problem, just ask your IT office and they'll help you out. 

 

 

  

 

  • Mstates Business: The full-feature wallet. Great looks + great tech.
  • Mstates Classy:  Don't really need the electronics? Pick the Classy wallet.
  • Mstates Cardholder: The slimmest Mstates wallet. 

 

           

 

   

 

Mstates wallets are made from high-quality Italian leather.  Once we receive the leather, we inspect it thoroughly, so it doesn’t have any defects. After that, we treat the leather and apply a special coating called leather sheen. This will help the leather maintain its pleasant glow but will also protect it from small scratches.

We are very confident in the quality of our leather and thus, offer you a 5-year warranty. You will not find this extensive warranty anywhere else!

 

            

 

            

 

     

 

 

Inside the package you will find:

  • Mstates Wallet
  • 5 Year Warranty Certificate
  • Instructions
  • Wireless charger (For Business model)
  • USB cable (For Business model)

 

 

 

 

To bring this product to life we've partnered with Woolet. With several iterations of their chip, they have become one of the most reliable tracker producers on the market!
