story:
My name is Joe Tolman, founder of Hula Cula®, and I would like to introduce you to the World's first high-function, high-fashion cooler bag.

Using only premium materials, Hula Cula® has the DNA of a high-end designer handbag, but hidden inside that beautiful exterior is the most functional women’s cooler bag ever created. Every facet and feel of this bag is designed to meet the many needs and desires of women in today’s crazy-busy world.

Let's take a look at all the amazing aspects of Hula Cula™ and how it can help make your life more FUN, FUNCTIONAL and FASHIONABLE!

 

Fun

The FUN in the  FUNCSHION™ of the Hula Cula® is the bright and playful, Hawaiian-inspired patterns that the bag comes in. The patterns were designed specifically to appeal to many different personality types. We met with focus groups of women over a period of several months to help define a line of colors and patterns that would appeal to the greatest number of women. Below is a photo and description of each bag, which one is your favorite?

 

  

Fashion

Let’s talk FASHION! You’ve seen the fun patterns that the Hula Cula® comes in, now we’ll talk about the high end materials the bag is constructed of that make this bag High Fashion!


We’ll start with the first thing you see, the vibrant printed leather. Made of vegan synthetic leather, it has a super soft, buttery feel with a genuine leather texture that makes it luxurious, but keep it easy to clean. This bag is made for adventure, so being easy to clean is essential! The material is water resistant, hand-washable, and is a brilliant white that allows our prints to show their true colors. One touch and you’ll be falling in love.

Saffiano is the black structural leather for the Hula Cula®. This textured leather, made famous by Mario Prada in the early 1900’s, is the material of choice for many top designer handbag companies because of its water resistance, durability, easy maintenance, and elegant look. You can feel confident that the Hula Cula® will stand up to every element you throw at it in your everyday adventures, all the while looking FABULOUS!

Our waterproof zippers are effortless to operate, help retain temperature, keep spills inside the bag, and the elements out ... and they look amazing doing it! We’ve designed the bag to showcase these beauties, using black Saffiano so the magenta zippers can stand in the spotlight. A fashion detail not to be ignored.

 

 

Function

The zippers are a great segue from the FASHION aspects of the bag, to the FUNCTION, as they are certainly a vital part of both. The zippers are the entry way to the three pockets of the Hula Cula®: the center Cooler Pocket, the Dry Storage Pocket, and the Utility Pocket.

Cooler Pocket

The largest of the three pockets, the Cooler Pocket is lined with a half-inch thick dual layer of lightweight, flexible, vapor-resistant insulation that will keep the cooler pocket warm or cold even in extreme environments, for hours on end, no less.

Featured inside the Cooler Pocket, is an easy to clean waterproof lining and three padded/insulated adjustable velcro dividers. These dividers allow you to separate items, and keep them upright, without bumping in to each other. Great for keeping wine or glass milk bottles safe! The dividers can also be easily removed if you would like to use the full compartment.

All-in-all, an extremely functional pocket that will keep your drinks, medication, groceries, etc, at the proper temperature, and safe from breakage of spilling.

 

Utility Pocket

Three phone sized pockets, a zippered valuables pocket, plenty of room for your laptop, iPad or kindle, and a key clip for easy key access ... it’s called Utility, and it’s wrapped in a beautiful shade of magenta! This is the part of the bag that acts as your handbag or pocketbook normally would. Keep you phones, wallet, keys, credit cards, computer, check book and anything else you need easy access to, in this convenient pocket. This pocket also houses our Hula Juice™ solar charging station!

Dry Storage Pocket

On the other side is the Dry Storage pocket, with its vibrant green lining. This is the part of the bag that takes the place of your tote. Here you can keep magazines, clothing, towels, equipment, as well as keep your sunglasses clean and safe in the built in sunglass pocket. We made the pocket green to differentiate it from the Utility Pocket, so when you are sending your little ones in to the bag to get something for you, it is much easier for them to find the "green" pocket or the "pink" pocket. Detail to make your life easier!

 

 

Accessories

The Hula Cula® experience doesn't end with the bag, itself. We have developed a few accessories that turn an already amazing bag in to something truly exceptional.

 

Function is what the Hula Cula® is all about, and the Hula Juice™ is one of its key accessories. No more crying kids because their game ran out of battery. No more dead phone at the most inopportune time. With our solar powered charging station, you can set it and forget it in the Utility Pocket and charge two devices at once, or take it out and use it where you need it! You can charge anything that uses a USB charger, and with it's 20,000 mAh power. you can charge several devices on one charge.

Phones, iPads, Kindles, bluetooth devices, you name it!! It has a charging cable to charge it traditionally, but with its solar charging panel you can rest assured you can charge your devices all day at the beach or ball field. Did I mention that it comes with your own personal usb fan? Can it get any Cula? I don’t think so!!

Maybe the most exciting and innovative part of the Hula Cula® brand is our patent-pending Hula Skurt™, our targeted, flexible, heating/cooling system for the Hula Cula®.

The function of these gel packs is revolutionary. There are six different patterned Hula Skurts™ to match the six different bags. The Hula Skurts™ are made out of custom printed, high stretch material, and have 100% gel panels sewn in. This gel will stay frozen 5 times longer than ice, so combined with the superior insulation in the Hula Cula®, you are able to keep things hot or cold all day or night.

With the stretch-to-fit properties of the Hula Skurt™, you can choose which items you would like to keep hot or cold, rather than just lining your cooler with hard, flat cold packs, or the mess of dealing with ice. Targeting your items is more efficient, since you are directly cooling or heating the item, rather than the air inside the bag. The Hula Skurt™ is 6" tall and can easily stretch to fit around a half gallon of milk, most any size bottle of wine, and even a four pack of 16oz cans. And if you don't want to wrap anything with the Skurt? The gel pack will lay flat to use in a traditional manner. They are washable, beautiful, and make unpacking and keeping your bag clean, so much easier!

We don't stop there, we also have a smaller version of the Hula Skurt™, called the Mini Skurt™! The Mini Skurt™ is half the size of the Hula Skurt™, so it is great for targeting individual cans or bottles, and you can keep the Mini Skurt™ on your beverage to keep it hot or cold once you take it out of the cooler. No need to worry about that drink getting warm in the hot summer sun! The Mini Skurts™ comes in a six-pack; all in one of the patterns, or a six pack featuring one of each pattern. So much fun!

Keeping your drinks hot or cold aren't the only use for the Hula Skurts™, you can also use these versatile gel packs for therapeutic purposes. Did your child just twist his ankle at the soccer game? No problem, just grab a Hula Skurt™ from the bag and slip it on. Hot or cold therapy couldn't be any easier, or fun!

 

 

The perfect compliment to the HULA CULA®, the Coconut™ Bluetooth speaker is tiny, but packs massive sound! With its beautiful rosewood exterior, laser engraved with out Three Palm logo, the Coconut™ offers premium audio with a double bass component in a very small and convenient 3" diameter size. Just connect it to any of your electronics with bluetooth capabilities and bring the party wherever you go. Perfect for your desk, golf cart, the ball field, picnics, dinners on the deck, and especially the beach, where the bass is so deep, it will make the sand around it dance. YOU WILL LOVE THIS SPEAKER!

Timeline and delivery projections

Below is our timeline from beginning to projected end of this initial campaign. Of course, we can only project a timeline for our manufacturing and shipping. We have built in some cushion in production, just because we expect there to be delays, as there always seems to be. But we will be a very active participant in the manufacture of our products to make sure the quality is what we expect. There will be no rushing of these products at the expense of quality. We expect our products to be of the highest integrity, and something you will be very proud to own and display. After all, we know that happy customers are our best salespeople. So we not only want to satisfy you with our products, but exceed your expectations.

 

This is the face of Hula Cula® 

Meet Joe, Karli, Jordan and Nick Tolman. Joe and Karli are the driving force behind the brand, and their children, Jordan and Nick, are crucial cogs in the concept and development of the products.

For the past 25 years Joe has owned and operated a very successful design company in New Hampshire. After getting married in 2004, Karli came on board and has run the day-to-day operation of the business. Jordan and Nick have both started working for the family driven business after graduating from college.

After all those years of creating the image and campaigns for numerous companies, Joe has had a desire to create something that is his own. In walks the Hula Cula®.

There is a tremendous presence of high end cooler products in the market today. The only problem is, they are heavily geared towards men. The design, functionality, marketing, and even the company names, are meant to evoke manliness, durability and COLD! This isn't a bad thing, they are hugely successful and remarkably effective. We own several ourselves, which led to an interesting situation. On multiple occasions, when bragging about the fantastic qualities of our coolers, we found many women who would state that they're great and all, but what woman is going to carry one of those things around?  We didn't have an answer.

In early summer 2017, Joe had a dream, as corny as it sounds. In that dream he envisioned a bag, with a vibrant floral print and bright pink zippers. The pattern that would become our Waikiki bag. Jumping out of bed to sketch the image, the concept and name for the bags came within minutes, the URL was purchased, and the Hula Cula® was born.

 

 

All of the premium products on the market are made to be heavy, indestructible, sturdy and keep ice cold for days and days on end. A wonderful thing for men who love to hunt, fish, camp and hike. And all of them have names of icy cold things.

The concept behind the Hula Cula® is the exact opposite. A soft, luxurious bag with bright patterns and premium materials that meets the needs and desires of women on the go with their children, family and friends. A bag that has every function she would need in one place, but had the look and feel of a high end designer handbag. A cooler with premium insulation, but light enough to be easily carried, and keep things warm or cold for a day, not a week. We were looking to create the ultimate soccer mom bag! A bag with a name that resonates the places you want to use this bag, in warm sunny breezes! The beach, the ball field, picnics and poolside.

 

 

So the concept was born in a morning, and it all made sense. But was there anything like it already? Through extensive research, we found exactly nothing. In fact, amazingly nothing even close. There are cute lightly insulated cooler totes for women, and premium insulated bags for men, but nothing like what Joe had envisioned. So after designing conceptual patterns and mock-ups, focus groups were organized over a period of several months. All with the intent of finding out what women from all different demographics would want to see in such a bag. Through this process, we took all the feedback and turned it in to the World's first high-function, high-fashion cooler bag.

The Process

It took a while, but we did find a manufacturer who could produce our prototype. Not an easy thing, it wasn't something that had been produced before. It took a lot of time and a lot of communication to produce what we were looking for. In June of 2018, the Hula Cula® came to life!

We immediately started testing the bag, and the prototype wasn't perfect, we had some adjustments to make in design, materials and hardware ... but it was beautiful!  Our first Prototype is the Maui bag. You'll see it in most of the promotional shots here on the site and in the video. We needed to adjust the strap rings and change the fabric. We also started out with the idea of a 3D patch for the bag. You will see this patch on the Maui bag in many of our photos.

 

 

We began working on the second prototype very quickly, and soon after we had the Turtle Bay prototype done. We nailed the fabric this time, and the strap ring adjustment worked exactly how we hoped.

We also decided we really wanted to showcase our Three Palm logo on the bags, so we changed to a gold metal symbol for the bags. In doing so, we also switched the hardware from gun metal to gold to match the symbol.

 

 

In testing, we discovered we needed to add more structural Saffiano leather to the sides of the bag, and an additional inch to the top as well. This was one of those happy things that happens through testing, as ideas evolve. When heavier, the weight was pulling on the printed leather, causing it to pull. We needed some final refinements.

We continued the Saffiano up each side of the bag, but not just a straight strip. Instead, the leather comes down the sides and gently arcs to meet the base on both sides, creating a beautiful feminine profile, and better showcasing the vibrant bag patterns. With the addition of the gold Three Palm symbol to each end, we have arrived at the final look of the Hula Cula®, and we know you will agree, it is striking!

 

 

The End Game

We chose Indiegogo as our platform because of the tremendous success stories it has produced, and the support that the company and its supporters offer to entrepreneurs with new ideas. We knew we had a product that was revolutionary and would resonate with people, so we see it as a perfect fit for us and our business.

Our goals and how you can help

Our main goal is to build a brand, not a product. We see this revolutionary product package as a gateway in to creating our very own market, since currently there is no market for high-end women's cooler bags. So we are offering you some incredible discounts on the bags as perks of this campaign.

We have a flexible goal of $50,000. Our first goal is to raise enough money to manufacture our early adopter orders (that's you!) while also being able to produce a relatively substantial inventory that we can sell as InDemand product in the marketplace and from our web site, to start.

If we can achieve this first goal, it will allow us to cover our costs on the development of our products, which includes materials, travel, prototyping and marketing, as well as the our costs for our intellectual properties. We have chosen to try and protect all of our ideas through trademark and patent protection. You will notice all of the ™ and ® symbols throughout this campaign text. The Hula Cula® name is already registered, and our Three Palm symbol is in the process now. We also have patent applications in for other aspects of our products. We know we have something special, so we want to protect our company, and the products you purchase, in every way possible.

 

Here's how it works!

Current backers, log in to your account and go to the HULA CULA® campaign page. Use the share links at the top of the page to share the campaign with your friends and family. YOU MUST BE LOGGED IN TO YOUR ACCOUNT FOR THIS TO WORK.

Anyone that you share the campaign with that purchases a bag will be tracked by Indiegogo. You can follow your own referral progress in your Indiegogo profile to see how many people have used your links to purchase bags.

In order for the referral to work, and Indiegogo to track it properly, the referred funder must purchase the bag directly from the link you share, they can't leave the page and come back later, so you can let your friends know this, if you want to be sure you get your referral credit.

Here is what you can earn!!

One bag sale = One Hula Skurt™

Three bag sales = One Mini Skurt™ Six Pack

Five bag sales = One Hula Juice™ Solar Charging Station

Seven bag sales = One Hula Skurt™ Six Pack

Nine bag sales = One Coconut™ bluetooth speaker

Ten bag sales = One Hula Cula® cooler bag

 

We truly appreciate your support, and we look forward to lighting the fashion world on fire with our Hula Cula® brand of products. We know you're going to love them as much as we do!

FAQ section coming shortly.

#keepitcula
story_txt:
My name is Joe Tolman, founder of Hula Cula®, and I would like to introduce you to the World's first high-function, high-fashion cooler bag.
Using only premium materials, Hula Cula® has the DNA of a high-end designer handbag, but hidden inside that beautiful exterior is the most functional women’s cooler bag ever created. Every facet and feel of this bag is designed to meet the many needs and desires of women in today’s crazy-busy world.
Let's take a look at all the amazing aspects of Hula Cula™ and how it can help make your life more FUN, FUNCTIONAL and FASHIONABLE!


 

Fun
The FUN in the  FUNCSHION™ of the Hula Cula® is the bright and playful, Hawaiian-inspired patterns that the bag comes in. The patterns were designed specifically to appeal to many different personality types. We met with focus groups of women over a period of several months to help define a line of colors and patterns that would appeal to the greatest number of women. Below is a photo and description of each bag, which one is your favorite?
 
   



Fashion
Let’s talk FASHION! You’ve seen the fun patterns that the Hula Cula® comes in, now we’ll talk about the high end materials the bag is constructed of that make this bag High Fashion!
We’ll start with the first thing you see, the vibrant printed leather. Made of vegan synthetic leather, it has a super soft, buttery feel with a genuine leather texture that makes it luxurious, but keep it easy to clean. This bag is made for adventure, so being easy to clean is essential! The material is water resistant, hand-washable, and is a brilliant white that allows our prints to show their true colors. One touch and you’ll be falling in love.

Saffiano is the black structural leather for the Hula Cula®. This textured leather, made famous by Mario Prada in the early 1900’s, is the material of choice for many top designer handbag companies because of its water resistance, durability, easy maintenance, and elegant look. You can feel confident that the Hula Cula® will stand up to every element you throw at it in your everyday adventures, all the while looking FABULOUS!

Our waterproof zippers are effortless to operate, help retain temperature, keep spills inside the bag, and the elements out ... and they look amazing doing it! We’ve designed the bag to showcase these beauties, using black Saffiano so the magenta zippers can stand in the spotlight. A fashion detail not to be ignored.

 

 
Function
The zippers are a great segue from the FASHION aspects of the bag, to the FUNCTION, as they are certainly a vital part of both. The zippers are the entry way to the three pockets of the Hula Cula®: the center Cooler Pocket, the Dry Storage Pocket, and the Utility Pocket.
Cooler Pocket
The largest of the three pockets, the Cooler Pocket is lined with a half-inch thick dual layer of lightweight, flexible, vapor-resistant insulation that will keep the cooler pocket warm or cold even in extreme environments, for hours on end, no less.
Featured inside the Cooler Pocket, is an easy to clean waterproof lining and three padded/insulated adjustable velcro dividers. These dividers allow you to separate items, and keep them upright, without bumping in to each other. Great for keeping wine or glass milk bottles safe! The dividers can also be easily removed if you would like to use the full compartment.
All-in-all, an extremely functional pocket that will keep your drinks, medication, groceries, etc, at the proper temperature, and safe from breakage of spilling.


 
Utility Pocket
Three phone sized pockets, a zippered valuables pocket, plenty of room for your laptop, iPad or kindle, and a key clip for easy key access ... it’s called Utility, and it’s wrapped in a beautiful shade of magenta! This is the part of the bag that acts as your handbag or pocketbook normally would. Keep you phones, wallet, keys, credit cards, computer, check book and anything else you need easy access to, in this convenient pocket. This pocket also houses our Hula Juice™ solar charging station!
Dry Storage Pocket
On the other side is the Dry Storage pocket, with its vibrant green lining. This is the part of the bag that takes the place of your tote. Here you can keep magazines, clothing, towels, equipment, as well as keep your sunglasses clean and safe in the built in sunglass pocket. We made the pocket green to differentiate it from the Utility Pocket, so when you are sending your little ones in to the bag to get something for you, it is much easier for them to find the "green" pocket or the "pink" pocket. Detail to make your life easier!
 


 

Accessories
The Hula Cula® experience doesn't end with the bag, itself. We have developed a few accessories that turn an already amazing bag in to something truly exceptional.
 

Function is what the Hula Cula® is all about, and the Hula Juice™ is one of its key accessories. No more crying kids because their game ran out of battery. No more dead phone at the most inopportune time. With our solar powered charging station, you can set it and forget it in the Utility Pocket and charge two devices at once, or take it out and use it where you need it! You can charge anything that uses a USB charger, and with it's 20,000 mAh power. you can charge several devices on one charge.
Phones, iPads, Kindles, bluetooth devices, you name it!! It has a charging cable to charge it traditionally, but with its solar charging panel you can rest assured you can charge your devices all day at the beach or ball field. Did I mention that it comes with your own personal usb fan? Can it get any Cula? I don’t think so!!




Maybe the most exciting and innovative part of the Hula Cula® brand is our patent-pending Hula Skurt™, our targeted, flexible, heating/cooling system for the Hula Cula®.
The function of these gel packs is revolutionary. There are six different patterned Hula Skurts™ to match the six different bags. The Hula Skurts™ are made out of custom printed, high stretch material, and have 100% gel panels sewn in. This gel will stay frozen 5 times longer than ice, so combined with the superior insulation in the Hula Cula®, you are able to keep things hot or cold all day or night.

No need to worry about that drink getting warm in the hot summer sun! The Mini Skurts™ comes in a six-pack; all in one of the patterns, or a six pack featuring one of each pattern. So much fun!
Keeping your drinks hot or cold aren't the only use for the Hula Skurts™, you can also use these versatile gel packs for therapeutic purposes. Did your child just twist his ankle at the soccer game? No problem, just grab a Hula Skurt™ from the bag and slip it on. Hot or cold therapy couldn't be any easier, or fun!

We have built in some cushion in production, just because we expect there to be delays, as there always seems to be. story:
Who Am I? 

My name is Monique Glover (aka Mo Glover) and I was raised in Brooklyn, NY. My love for my family and hometown prompted my decision to stay close by and get my degree from Pratt Institute. The decision to create this campaign was not an easy one. Working hard and being self-sufficient is a trait that I have carried with pride. After experiencing the challenges of not only becoming an Entrepreneur, but also as a single mother, I have learned that success takes not just time and hard work but a good support system. After working for numerous companies, assisting in their brands' needs by maintaining their design and quality aesthetic, I decided it was time for me to put my own brand and aesthetic in the forefront. The help from contributors will take my brand to a level where it can compete and be placed on a similar platform as larger brands with more backing. I will be able to complete a full Spring/Summer presentation, present a show at a brand appropriate platform, maintain production for Fall Season, and build more web/social media presence. This has become a true dream come true and I thank you all for joining the journey. Thank you for supporting and rooting for me. 

What Do I Need & What You Get

My project requires funding of $4000.

It will be going to the following places-

(1) The fee to present through Fashion Week Brooklyn

(2) The execution of Zyem Spring/Summer 2018 prototypes which will include Menswear and Kidswear. This includes art supplies (paint/canvas), fabric, trim, embroidery and screen-printing fees. 

- Contributors Perks have been broken down as follows- 

All are welcome to attend show at no cost.

Under $25 - A personalized Thank You.

$25- A customize postcard and 25% discount on zyem.com purchase.

$50 Silver Package Opt.1- Invitation to Mo Glover's free pre-fashion show reception and inspiration viewing. (25% discount on zyem.com purchase). 

$75 Silver Package Opt.2- A Product Bag and Invitation to Mo Glover's free pre-fashion show reception

$150 Gold Package - A pass to Fashion Week Brooklyn, VIP After-Party and a product bag that includes a Spring 18 exclusive art T-shirt.

$300 Platinum Package- A pass to Fashion Week Brooklyn, VIP After-Party and a choice of artwork (a painting) or any item from Zyem line customized to size. 

If the goal amount is not reached the money will go solely to the fashion show production fees.

You Will Make A Difference

Your contributions will be assisting a black-owned community based small business. You will be assisting in allowing a dream come true with a little more ease. We are part of a community that employs others and gives back to the community as we grow.  With years of experience in the fashion industry, I have the patience and knowledge to manage a growing business with longevity. 

Other Ways You Can Help

Any amount helps. If you cannot contribute monetarily, getting the word out helps. Please use the share tool to spread the word to your network.

$150 Gold Package - A pass to Fashion Week Brooklyn, VIP After-Party and a product bag that includes a Spring 18 exclusive art T-shirt.
$300 Platinum Package- A pass to Fashion Week Brooklyn, VIP After-Party and a choice of artwork (a painting) or any item from Zyem line customized to size. 
If the goal amount is not reached the money will go solely to the fashion show production fees.

You Will Make A Difference
Your contributions will be assisting a black-owned community based small business. You will be assisting in allowing a dream come true with a little more ease. We are part of a community that employs others and gives back to the community as we grow.  With years of experience in the fashion industry, I have the patience and knowledge to manage a growing business with longevity. 

Other Ways You Can Help
Any amount helps. If you cannot contribute monetarily, getting the word out helps. Please use the share tool to spread the word to your network.

story:
The idea of Every Body was inspired by our teenage son, Aaron. Two years ago it came to our attention that Aaron was struggling internally with more than what the average teenage woes are expected to be. "Dad, I'm trans do you still love me?" The emotions we felt were overwhelming not because of his gender identity but because of the immense pain our child was going through. To hear the words "do you still love me" from your child was crippling, and honestly hard put into words. We felt lost and stripped of any power we took for granted as parents. The fact that he even entertained the thought that we wouldn't love and accept him for who he truly is was heart breaking. Through the process of learning about the new him (Aaron) we realized we were facing many obstacles. Baby steps we told ourselves, so where do we begin? Shopping was the first thing that came to mind to help Aaron start his transition. Shopping seems simple, right? Wrong. Close your eyes and picture yourself going into a store where nothing is designed to fit your body type. Too big, too small, too long, too short, uncomfortable, no help, no options and NO WAY TO EXPRESS YOURSELF.

Now imagine you're transgender. To get down to the nitty gritty transgender people, specifically trans teens, struggle with the fit of clothing. They are battling a body that doesn't match their gender identity. In case you didn't know there are at least 1.4 million transgender people across the United States. Out of that 1.4 million,  150,000 are transitioning youth ages 13-17. These are just estimated numbers- imagine how many more people are unreported. So, we have all of these teens going through transition, yet they have no place to shop to find clothes that genuinely fit them.  

THIS IS A PROBLEM. 

Through our love for these kids we will provide a place where the clothing is inclusive, youthful, and designed to evoke self expression.

The difference in what we are designing for TGNC (Transgender/ Gender Non-Conforming)  teens in comparison to Cis teens will be the fit of our clothing.  Typically, transitioning FTM teens have to bind their chests, have wider hips, more narrow shoulders, as well as shorter arms and legs compared to their Cis peers, whom clothing stores cater to.  Typically, transitioning MTF teens have broader shoulders, a more narrow lower body, as well as longer arms and legs, compared to their Cis peers.  These teens have a hard time fitting in the clothes at stores available to them.  For example:  Button down shirts usually will not button on the bottom two because of wider hips, the shoulder seams fall on the wrong spot and the back its typically too wide; all of this contributing to body dysphoria because it accentuates things they do not wish to have.  The list could go on and on for how the sizes and make of clothes do not allow them to feel and express themselves the way that they would like.  Not only do the clothing options not fit correctly but many of these awesome kids are literally scared to go shopping because they are treated poorly; dirty looks, employees not allowing them to go into the correct dressing room, no assistance.  We are working hard to make shopping a more inclusive experience a change in the existing/ traditional

Every Body = A  safe comfortable space for transgender teens to shop freely.  

Every Body = A specialized size chart and in house tailoring to cater to individual needs.

Every Body = A one stop shop that will provide necessary accessories and specifically tailored clothing to fit the unique body types of transitioning teens.

In order to make a change in this community we need your support. Your donations will be going towards helping us build Every Body from the ground up; materials, proper equipment, rental space, clothing production, and a carefully hand picked team that shares our vision.  

"Our mission is to inspire change for an equal future."

WE ARE EVERY BODY

 

http://Everybodyfitsin.com

https://www.instagram.com/wearyoufitin/

 

 

 

 

Shout Outs:

-Animation: A special thank you to Bella Campos for bringing our idea to life through her hard work and creativity. "I would like to thank my dad for making me aware that 'it takes a village', my mom for passing down all her design knowledge, and my brother for supporting me. Also, would like to acknowledge one of my best friends, CJ and other people just like him that are going to feel so much more comfortable being true to themselves because of companies like this and the people behind them."  You can find her @abstractrea1ist

-A very special thank you to Ryan Cassata, Tessa Glanville, Gabe Rondon, Max Koblish-O'Loughlin, Crystal Stull, Ryan Sallans, Landon James, and Brody Ray. This campaign would not have been possible without you. Thank you from the bottom of our hearts. 

-Thank you to the extremely talented John Notto for writing and recording the perfect soundtrack. You can find him @the_john_notto and Johnnotto.com

-Thank you Brian Moore for your audio and video expertise. Find him at Brianmooreaudio.com 

-Video editor: James Pippy

-Thank you Mark Swiech, our lawyer, for believing in us before we even had a website haha!

-Limited edition art donation by the unique and talented Wednesday. You can find her @hellomynameiswednesday

-Music donations from Brody Ray @brodyraymusic, LJ lead singer of Motions' @officialmotions, and Crystal lead singer of Warrens @wearewarrens. 

-Our biggest shoutout goes to the LGBTQ community. 

-We would like to thank our family and friends for their overwhelming continuous love and support. You know who you are!

-Hector, thank you for raising the such an amazing kid. The world needs more fathers like you.

-Aaron, the inspiration behind Every Body. Thank you for being so brave and thank you for being the coolest stepson. We love you.

story:
Act for the Forgotten: the People and the Planet

That’s in essence what WiWi Shoes does. When I first got to Indonesia, my primary goal of pursuing business studies quickly became secondary, as I fell in love with the country and realized that several environmental and human challenges needed urgent responses. That’s why I decided to create a product line that helps both people and the planet. // C'est essentiellement ce que fait WiWi Shoes. Quand je suis arrivé en Indonésie, mon objectif principal de poursuivre des études commerciales est rapidement devenu secondaire, car je suis tombé amoureux du pays et j'ai réalisé que plusieurs défis environnementaux et humains nécessitaient des réponses urgentes. C'est pourquoi j'ai décidé de créer une gamme de produits qui aide les gens et la planète.





WiWi sneakers, sandals and wallets are made from recycled tires, canvas, cork, as well as of traditional tenun silk scraps (from Tenun Gaya by Wignyo)– both as a way of putting the circular economy helping and healing the planet and of honoring Indonesia’s beautiful craftsmanship and traditional silk work.



Now, WiWi Shoes is taking on a new mission: to help the Asmat, and especially their children, to have better lives – just as they deserve. //Les sneakers, sandales et portefeuilles WiWi sont fabriqués à partir de pneus recyclés, de liège, ainsi que de tenun en soie traditionnellement tissé que nous récupérons (par Tenun Gaya by Wignyo), à la fois pour appliquer l'économie circulaire  et prendre soin de la planète et honorer la beauté artisanale et la soie traditionnelle indonésienne. Aujourd'hui, WiWi Shoes s'engage dans une nouvelle mission: aider les Asmats, et en particulier leurs enfants, à avoir une vie meilleure, comme ils le méritent.

ATTENTION// The tenun we recycle is limited by colors and patterns and will evolve in function of the arriving stocks. Each pair is almost unique.

ATTENTION//Le tenun que l'on recycle est limité par couleur et motif et les nuances peuvent évoluer en fonction des arrivages. Chaque paire est quasi unique.
 

The Asmat: The Ignored Tribe of Papua

While they live in a resource-rich region, and despite the fact that their woodcarving artwork has made it into some of the world’s most prominent museums, the Asmat are, for the most part, an ignored tribe left to endure the harshest of living conditions. A tribe of about 70,000 that has lived far from the civilized world, spread throughout some 18,000km2 of mangrove, tidal swamp, freshwater swamp, and lowland rainforest, in the Papua province of Indonesia, has its children falling victim to the most curable diseases due to an entire lack of basic sanitation, healthcare and proper food. The decades-old gold mining activities in the region never benefited the locals. Even today, as infrastructure is growing, the benefits are not trickling down to the Asmat people. That’s why we decided to do something about it – because, at the end of the day, a group of individuals can bring the kind of change that no government ever could.



Alors qu'ils vivent dans une région riche en ressources, et malgré le fait que leurs œuvres de sculpture sur bois en ont fait l'un des musées les plus importants du monde, les Asmat sont, pour la plupart, une tribu ignorée à supporter les conditions de vie les plus dures . Une tribu d'environ 70 000 personnes vivant loin du monde civilisé, disséminée sur environ 18 000 km2 de mangroves, marécages, marais d'eau douce et forêt pluviale de basse altitude, dans la province indonésienne de Papouasie, a été victime des maladies les plus curables à un manque total d'assainissement de base, de soins de santé et de bonne nourriture. Les activités d'extraction de l'or dans la région depuis des dizaines d'années n'ont jamais profité aux habitants. Même aujourd'hui, à mesure que les infrastructures se développent, les avantages ne se répercutent pas sur le peuple Asmat. C'est pourquoi nous avons décidé de faire quelque chose à ce sujet - car, en fin de compte, un groupe d'individus peut apporter le genre de changement qu'aucun gouvernement ne pourrait jamais apporter.

 

No Big Organizations, Just Volunteers with a Big Heart

We’re not working with large organizations. Sadly, the Asmat are not popular aid receivers. On the contrary, we’re a small group of individuals, volunteering directly on the spot. What we would call the facilities based on which we work to help the Asmat in Merauke, Papua, are really very humble favela-like constructions made of scraps. Still, that’s where we have a school working to provide some education to the Asmat children. The facilities are indeed poor, but at least everything that we raise – from funds to goods and people’s volunteer time – goes directly to these children, instead of being absorbed by large NGOs operational expenses. We’re not a big structure, but our hearts are big enough for everyone within the Asmat world.

Nous ne travaillons pas avec de grandes organisations. Malheureusement, les Asmat ne sont pas de fréquents récepteurs d'aide. Au contraire, nous sommes un petit groupe de personnes, qui agit directement sur place. Ce que nous appellerions les installations dans lesquelles nous travaillons pour aider les Asmat à Merauke, en Papouasie, sont en réalité de très humbles constructions de favelas faites à partir de récupération. Pourtant, c'est là que nous avons une école qui agit pour fournir une éducation aux enfants Asmat.

Les installations sont en effet précaires, mais au moins tout ce que nous collectons - des fonds aux biens et aux efforts des gens - va directement à ces enfants et leurs parents, au lieu d'être absorbé par les dépenses opérationnelles des grandes ONG. Nous ne sommes pas une grande structure, mais nos coeurs sont assez grands pour tout le monde dans le monde d'Asmat.

Challenged, but Hopeful

This is not an easy task, though. Undernutrition, caused by the fact that they eat only once a day, and measles, malaria, and diphtheria lead to frequent fatalities. In the last 4 months alone, 71 children died of causes that would be as simple to prevent as ensuring that they have 3 meals per day, and basic sanitation and healthcare. In fact, proper food is so scarce for these children, that it’s the only reason that brings them to our school – their parents do not fully appreciate the importance of education, but they sure are happy to send their children to a place where they are all fed. This means that the Asmat children come to class every morning and go back to their families in the afternoon, with at least some nourishment. Yes, this is challenging, but we remain hopeful.

Ce n'est pas une tâche facile, cependant. La dénutrition, causée par le fait qu'ils ne mangent qu'une fois par jour, et la rougeole, le paludisme et la diphtérie entraînent des décès fréquents. Au cours des 4 derniers mois, 71 enfants sont morts de causes aussi simples à prévenir que de veiller à ce qu'ils prennent 3 repas par jour, ainsi que l'assainissement et les soins de santé de base. En fait, la nourriture adaptée à leur besoin est si rare pour ces enfants, que c'est la seule raison qui les amène à notre école - leurs parents n'apprécient pas pleinement l'importance de l'éducation, mais ils sont heureux d'envoyer leurs enfants à un endroit où ils sont tous nourris. Cela signifie que les enfants Asmat viennent en classe tous les matins et retournent dans leurs familles l'après-midi, avec au moins un peu de nourriture. Oui, c'est difficile, mais nous gardons espoir.

Hygiene, Health, and Education

When you’re dealing with such a remotely located tribe, used to 40,000 years of isolation, every basic concept that we take for granted seems like a sophisticated concern that is pointless. //Lorsque vous traitez avec une tribu si éloignée, habituée à 40 000 ans d'isolement, chaque concept de base que nous tenons pour acquis semble être une préoccupation sophistiquée qui ne sert à rien.



While they appreciate the chance of having at least one meal per day at our school, they are only now beginning to understand the importance of hygiene as a way of being healthier and stronger, and of education, as a way of having better chances of making something meaningful with their lives – namely to become educated advocates of their tribe and traditions. // Alors qu'ils apprécient la possibilité d'avoir au moins un repas par jour dans notre école, ils commencent seulement maintenant à comprendre l'importance de l'hygiène comme moyen d'être en meilleure santé et plus fort, et de l'éducation, comme un moyen d'avoir de meilleures chances d'avoir quelque chose de significatif dans leurs vies, d'avoir des rêves - à savoir devenir des avocats éduqués de leur tribu et de leurs traditions

 

What We (Together With You) Can Do to Help

Our work has been bringing change to the Asmat tribe, but there is only so much we can do with our own resources. The volunteers who spend their entire days and means supporting these children struggle with everyday needs that we cannot, on our own, provide for.



//Notre travail a apporté des changements à la tribu des Asmat, mais nous ne pouvons faire grand chose qu'avec nos propres ressources. Les volontaires qui consacrent leurs journées entières et leurs moyens à soutenir ces enfants sont aux prises avec des besoins quotidiens que nous ne pouvons, seuls, pourvoir.

 

So, with your help, namely if you choose one of the great WiWi rewards that we have for you, we’ll be able to:

 

  • Offer the Asmat children 3 nutritious meals per day instead of just 1
    //    Offrir aux enfants Asmat 3 repas nutritifs par jour au lieu d'un seul de manière durable
     
  • Allow them to shower with soap and teach them the basic life-changing hygiene habits that can save lives.
    //    Pour leur permettre de se doucher avec du savon et leur enseigner les habitudes d'hygiène de base qui changent la vie et qui peuvent sauver des vies
     
  • Provide them with vaccines for measles and malaria, as well as medicines when they are sick.
    //    Pour leur fournir des vaccins contre la rougeole et le paludisme, ainsi que des médicaments quand ils sont malades
     
  • Extend the healthcare support to the children’s mothers, who play a defining role in the children’s lives.
    //    Pour étendre le soutien de la santé aux mères des enfants, qui jouent un rôle déterminant dans la vie des enfants

 

Depending on how far your support helps us go, our stretch goals are:

 

  • Offering the Asmat children medicines for ringworm, skin disease and vitamins for a better intellectual performance
    //    Offrir aux enfants Asmat des médicaments contre la teigne, les maladies de la peau et les vitamines pour un éveil intellectuel amélioré
     
  • Providing the Asmat with emergency drinkable water, since they have difficult access to sources of clean water. The water from the ground is hard to get because it's a swampy land, but, since the villages are close to the sea, we will be looking into installing a desalination system to offer them a permanent and safe source of clean potable water.
    //Fournir aux Asmat de l'eau potable d'urgence, car ils ont un accès difficile aux sources d'eau potable. L'eau du sol est difficile à obtenir parce que c'est une terre marécageuse, mais comme les villages sont près de la mer, nous allons envisager l'installation d'un système de dessalement pour leur offrir une source permanente et sûre d'eau potable propre.
     
  • Offering the Asmat training in more efficient agriculture techniques, as a structural way of helping the tribe produce a constant stream of nutritious food.
    //Offrir à la Tribu des Asmat une formation sur des techniques agricoles plus efficaces, comme moyen structurel d'aider la tribu à produire un flux constant d'aliments nutritifs.

​

  • Building a new and proper school, with adequate areas of hygiene and food, so that the Asmat children enjoy a fully healthy environment and consolidate new habits while they are with us, during the day
    //Construire une école nouvelle et appropriée, avec des zones adéquates d'hygiène et de repas, afin que les enfants Asmat bénéficient d'un environnement entièrement sain et consolident de nouvelles habitudes pendant qu'ils sont avec nous, pendant la journée​.
     
  • Providing the Asmat children with school uniforms and shoes that will help them be more comfortable and protected from the local environment’s harsh conditions (the land where they live)
    //    Fournir aux enfants Asmat des uniformes scolaires et des chaussures qui les aideront à être plus à l'aise et à se protéger des conditions difficiles de l'environnement où ils vivent.

When I came from France to Indonesia, little did I know that I would be starting an eco-friendly shoe brand that would go as far as it has come. However, what really surprised me, to the point of changing my life, was the way I was touched by the Asmat. I also especially related to their struggle with health problems because, as a child, I struggled with and survived leukemia, so I know how it is to feel unhealthy. So I am extremely committed to dedicating an important part of my WiWi business to start a virtuous circle of a circular economy in favor of the Asmat.

Quand je suis arrivé de France en Indonésie, je ne savais pas que je créerais une marque de chaussures écologique qui irait aussi loin que possible. Cependant, ce qui m'a vraiment surpris, au point de changer ma vie, c'est la façon dont j'ai été touché par les Asmat. J'ai particulièrement  senti la difficulté de leur lutte contre les problèmes de santé parce que, quand j'étais enfant, je me suis battu avec une leucémie, alors je sais ce que c'est que d'être en dans de mauvaises conditions de santé. Je suis donc extrêmement engagé à consacrer une partie importante de mon projet qu'est WiWi à la création d'un cercle vertueux d'économie circulaire en faveur des Asmat.

So this is my offer to you: in exchange for buying cool, fashionable, light, comfortable, durable and eco-friendly WiWi shoes and wallets, you will be helping the Asmat and their children have better, healthier and safer lives. 

//Voici donc mon offre: en échange de l'achat de chaussures et accessoires WiWi bien sympas, à la mode, légers, confortables, durables et écologiques, vous aiderez la Tribu des Asmat et ses enfants à mener une vie meilleure, plus saine et plus sûre.
 

  • So I’m inviting you to choose one of the great rewards that I have on offer while helping the Asmat along the way.
    //    Je vous invite donc à choisir l'une des récompenses que je vous offre tout en aidant les Asmat au passage.
     
  • I also invite you to share this campaign on social media, as well as with your friends and family members who may also want to have great eco-friendly shoes while helping the Asmat to have better lives.
    //    Je vous invite également à partager cette campagne sur les réseaux, ainsi qu'avec vos amis et les membres de votre famille qui voudront peut-être aussi avoir de superbes chaussures écologiques tout en aidant la Tribu des Asmat à avoir une vie meilleure.


     

Thank you so much, and we hope to be soon sending your WiWi Shoes and reporting from the field, already with extra help for the Asmat!  //
Merci beaucoup, et nous espérons bientôt envoyer vos chaussures WiWi et nos reportages sur le terrain, déjà avec de l'aide supplémentaire pour les Asmat!

The decades-old gold mining activities in the region never benefited the locals. Even today, as infrastructure is growing, the benefits are not trickling down to the Asmat people. That’s why we decided to do something about it – because, at the end of the day, a group of individuals can bring the kind of change that no government ever could.Alors qu'ils vivent dans une région riche en ressources, et malgré le fait que leurs œuvres de sculpture sur bois en ont fait l'un des musées les plus importants du monde, les Asmat sont, pour la plupart, une tribu ignorée à supporter les conditions de vie les plus dures . Une tribu d'environ 70 000 personnes vivant loin du monde civilisé, disséminée sur environ 18 000 km2 de mangroves, marécages, marais d'eau douce et forêt pluviale de basse altitude, dans la province indonésienne de Papouasie, a été victime des maladies les plus curables à un manque total d'assainissement de base, de soins de santé et de bonne nourriture. Les activités d'extraction de l'or dans la région depuis des dizaines d'années n'ont jamais profité aux habitants. Même aujourd'hui, à mesure que les infrastructures se développent, les avantages ne se répercutent pas sur le peuple Asmat. C'est pourquoi nous avons décidé de faire quelque chose à ce sujet - car, en fin de compte, un groupe d'individus peut apporter le genre de changement qu'aucun gouvernement ne pourrait jamais apporter. No Big Organizations, Just Volunteers with a Big HeartWe’re not working with large organizations. Sadly, the Asmat are not popular aid receivers. On the contrary, we’re a small group of individuals, volunteering directly on the spot. What we would call the facilities based on which we work to help the Asmat in Merauke, Papua, are really very humble favela-like constructions made of scraps. Still, that’s where we have a school working to provide some education to the Asmat children. The facilities are indeed poor, but at least everything that we raise – from funds to goods and people’s volunteer time – goes directly to these children, instead of being absorbed by large NGOs operational expenses. We’re not a big structure, but our hearts are big enough for everyone within the Asmat world.Nous ne travaillons pas avec de grandes organisations. Malheureusement, les Asmat ne sont pas de fréquents récepteurs d'aide. Au contraire, nous sommes un petit groupe de personnes, qui agit directement sur place. Ce que nous appellerions les installations dans lesquelles nous travaillons pour aider les Asmat à Merauke, en Papouasie, sont en réalité de très humbles constructions de favelas faites à partir de récupération. Pourtant, c'est là que nous avons une école qui agit pour fournir une éducation aux enfants Asmat. Les installations sont en effet précaires, mais au moins tout ce que nous collectons - des fonds aux biens et aux efforts des gens - va directement à ces enfants et leurs parents, au lieu d'être absorbé par les dépenses opérationnelles des grandes ONG. Nous ne sommes pas une grande structure, mais nos coeurs sont assez grands pour tout le monde dans le monde d'Asmat.Challenged, but HopefulThis is not an easy task, though. Undernutrition, caused by the fact that they eat only once a day, and measles, malaria, and diphtheria lead to frequent fatalities. In the last 4 months alone, 71 children died of causes that would be as simple to prevent as ensuring that they have 3 meals per day, and basic sanitation and healthcare. In fact, proper food is so scarce for these children, that it’s the only reason that brings them to our school – their parents do not fully appreciate the importance of education, but they sure are happy to send their children to a place where they are all fed. This means that the Asmat children come to class every morning and go back to their families in the afternoon, with at least some nourishment. Yes, this is challenging, but we remain hopeful.Ce n'est pas une tâche facile, cependant. La dénutrition, causée par le fait qu'ils ne mangent qu'une fois par jour, et la rougeole, le paludisme et la diphtérie entraînent des décès fréquents. Au cours des 4 derniers mois, 71 enfants sont morts de causes aussi simples à prévenir que de veiller à ce qu'ils prennent 3 repas par jour, ainsi que l'assainissement et les soins de santé de base. En fait, la nourriture adaptée à leur besoin est si rare pour ces enfants, que c'est la seule raison qui les amène à notre école - leurs parents n'apprécient pas pleinement l'importance de l'éducation, mais ils sont heureux d'envoyer leurs enfants à un endroit où ils sont tous nourris. Cela signifie que les enfants Asmat viennent en classe tous les matins et retournent dans leurs familles l'après-midi, avec au moins un peu de nourriture. Oui, c'est difficile, mais nous gardons espoir.Hygiene, Health, and EducationWhen you’re dealing with such a remotely located tribe, used to 40,000 years of isolation, every basic concept that we take for granted seems like a sophisticated concern that is pointless. //Lorsque vous traitez avec une tribu si éloignée, habituée à 40 000 ans d'isolement, chaque concept de base que nous tenons pour acquis semble être une préoccupation sophistiquée qui ne sert à rien.While they appreciate the chance of having at least one meal per day at our school, they are only now beginning to understand the importance of hygiene as a way of being healthier and stronger, and of education, as a way of having better chances of making something meaningful with their lives – namely to become educated advocates of their tribe and traditions. // Alors qu'ils apprécient la possibilité d'avoir au moins un repas par jour dans notre école, ils commencent seulement maintenant à comprendre l'importance de l'hygiène comme moyen d'être en meilleure santé et plus fort, et de l'éducation, comme un moyen d'avoir de meilleures chances d'avoir quelque chose de significatif dans leurs vies, d'avoir des rêves - à savoir devenir des avocats éduqués de leur tribu et de leurs traditions What We (Together With You) Can Do to HelpOur work has been bringing change to the Asmat tribe, but there is only so much we can do with our own resources. The volunteers who spend their entire days and means supporting these children struggle with everyday needs that we cannot, on our own, provide for.//Notre travail a apporté des changements à la tribu des Asmat, mais nous ne pouvons faire grand chose qu'avec nos propres ressources. Les volontaires qui consacrent leurs journées entières et leurs moyens à soutenir ces enfants sont aux prises avec des besoins quotidiens que nous ne pouvons, seuls, pourvoir. So, with your help, namely if you choose one of the great WiWi rewards that we have for you, we’ll be able to: 

Offer the Asmat children 3 nutritious meals per day instead of just 1//Offrir aux enfants Asmat 3 repas nutritifs par jour au lieu d'un seul de manière durable 

Allow them to shower with soap and teach them the basic life-changing hygiene habits that can save lives.//Pour leur permettre de se doucher avec du savon et leur enseigner les habitudes d'hygiène de base qui changent la vie et qui peuvent sauver des vies 

Provide them with vaccines for measles and malaria, as well as medicines when they are sick.//Pour leur fournir des vaccins contre la rougeole et le paludisme, ainsi que des médicaments quand ils sont malades 

Extend the healthcare support to the children’s mothers, who play a defining role in the children’s lives.//Pour étendre le soutien de la santé aux mères des enfants, qui jouent un rôle déterminant dans la vie des enfants

 Depending on how far your support helps us go, our stretch goals are: 

Offering the Asmat children medicines for ringworm, skin disease and vitamins for a better intellectual performance//Offrir aux enfants Asmat des médicaments contre la teigne, les maladies de la peau et les vitamines pour un éveil intellectuel amélioré 

Providing the Asmat with emergency drinkable water, since they have difficult access to sources of clean water. The water from the ground is hard to get because it's a swampy land, but, since the villages are close to the sea, we will be looking into installing a desalination system to offer them a permanent and safe source of clean potable water.//Fournir aux Asmat de l'eau potable d'urgence, car ils ont un accès difficile aux sources d'eau potable. L'eau du sol est difficile à obtenir parce que c'est une terre marécageuse, mais comme les villages sont près de la mer, nous allons envisager l'installation d'un système de dessalement pour leur offrir une source permanente et sûre d'eau potable propre. 

Offering the Asmat training in more efficient agriculture techniques, as a structural way of helping the tribe produce a constant stream of nutritious food.//Offrir à la Tribu des Asmat une formation sur des techniques agricoles plus efficaces, comme moyen structurel d'aider la tribu à produire un flux constant d'aliments nutritifs.

​

Building a new and proper school, with adequate areas of hygiene and food, so that the Asmat children enjoy a fully healthy environment and consolidate new habits while they are with us, during the day //Construire une école nouvelle et appropriée, avec des zones adéquates d'hygiène et de repas, afin que les enfants Asmat bénéficient d'un environnement entièrement sain et consolident de nouvelles habitudes pendant qu'ils sont avec nous, pendant la journée​. 

Providing the Asmat children with school uniforms and shoes that will help them be more comfortable and protected from the local environment’s harsh conditions (the land where they live)//Fournir aux enfants Asmat des uniformes scolaires et des chaussures qui les aideront à être plus à l'aise et à se protéger des conditions difficiles de l'environnement où ils vivent.

When I came from France to Indonesia, little did I know that I would be starting an eco-friendly shoe brand that would go as far as it has come. However, what really surprised me, to the point of changing my life, was the way I was touched by the Asmat. I also especially related to their struggle with health problems because, as a child, I struggled with and survived leukemia, so I know how it is to feel unhealthy. So I am extremely committed to dedicating an important part of my WiWi business to start a virtuous circle of a circular economy in favor of the Asmat.Quand je suis arrivé de France en Indonésie, je ne savais pas que je créerais une marque de chaussures écologique qui irait aussi loin que possible. Cependant, ce qui m'a vraiment surpris, au point de changer ma vie, c'est la façon dont j'ai été touché par les Asmat. J'ai particulièrement  senti la difficulté de leur lutte contre les problèmes de santé parce que, quand j'étais enfant, je me suis battu avec une leucémie, alors je sais ce que c'est que d'être en dans de mauvaises conditions de santé. Je suis donc extrêmement engagé à consacrer une partie importante de mon projet qu'est WiWi à la création d'un cercle vertueux d'économie circulaire en faveur des Asmat.So this is my offer to you: in exchange for buying cool, fashionable, light, comfortable, durable and eco-friendly WiWi shoes and wallets, you will be helping the Asmat and their children have better, healthier and safer lives. //Voici donc mon offre: en échange de l'achat de chaussures et accessoires WiWi bien sympas, à la mode, légers, confortables, durables et écologiques, vous aiderez la Tribu des Asmat et ses enfants à mener une vie meilleure, plus saine et plus sûre. 

So I’m inviting you to choose one of the great rewards that I have on offer while helping the Asmat along the way.//Je vous invite donc à choisir l'une des récompenses que je vous offre tout en aidant les Asmat au passage. 

I also invite you to share this campaign on social media, as well as with your friends and family members who may also want to have great eco-friendly shoes while helping the Asmat to have better lives.//Je vous invite également à partager cette campagne sur les réseaux, ainsi qu'avec vos amis et les membres de votre famille qui voudront peut-être aussi avoir de superbes chaussures écologiques tout en aidant la Tribu des Asmat à avoir une vie meilleure. 
Thank you so much, and we hope to be soon sending your WiWi Shoes and reporting from the field, already with extra help for the Asmat!  //Merci beaucoup, et nous espérons bientôt envoyer vos chaussures WiWi et nos reportages sur le terrain, déjà avec de l'aide supplémentaire pour les Asmat!

story:
ÂME, is a Spanish Brand that’s bets of innovation in a textile, starting the crowdfunding with special offers. These garments is make unique and exclusive with biodegradable materials and they contribute to the underwear conform besides helps in the daily problems both female and male.

You can have multiples solutions only with your underwear.

------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------

DETAILING THE MATERIAL:

ANTIBACTERIAL: Thanks to particles such as ionized silver we ensure 100% elimination of bacteria

ANTIFUNGICAL: Prevents 100% al type of candida

HEALING: The small erosions on the surface of the skin resolve without scar and accelerates the process. Avoid irritations due to its biocompatibility 

ELASTICITY: Both horizontally and vertically, it adapts like a second skin

WATERPROOF: Dry sensation continues to absorb all types of liquids without wetting the lower layers of the tissue

ABSORBENT: Get a immediate absorbance of 30ML

WITHOUTH STITCHES: Made with tubular machinery without stitches

WARM-UP: Prevents skin irritation and warming

ANTI-ODOR: Guarantees the elimination of odors created by sweat.

 

ÂME is in testing with the Doc. Juan Jose Vidal the best gynecologist in Spain by the Forbes list. The Doctor Juan Jose Vidal is the manager in “La Unidad de la Mujer” in the Ruber Internacional hospital in Madrid.  

----------------------------------------------------------------

Available for women and men

Available in 2 colors

 

 

1.Boxer, 2.Panties+ABSORBENT, 3 and 4 Tong

 

 

The solutions to intimate problems

  • In sweating periods, the tissue base is viscose CH it has a big absorption, you can run a marathon and feel dry.
  • Thanks to the antiodor system you will never suffer this problem.
  • Prevent the candida only with the use of this garment and it will help in the treatment of it.
  • Absorb discharge, urine lost, menstruation and you will not have any preoccupation thank to waterproof characteristic.
  • This is a garment without stitches and it has double elastic sense, horizontal and vertical, it adapts like a second skin.
  • When the corporal temperature increase the tissue prevents the warm-up dermic.
  • Help and recuperate the small injuries in the skin.
  • A solution in the post-partum period thanks to all its characteristics.
  • Select your size, keep in mind that our garments stretch up to 1m

 

This is the textile certifications

The objetives:

If a win the objective the destination is to pay the innovation, and the first production, 5K$ for marketing. In this totaly has the 7% to Indiegogo and de 21% Taxes.

All extra money will go  to innovate in the second part of the product, to innovate news textiles.

-------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------

Share in your social network!
@ame_underwear

  Âme underwear

 @Ameunderwear

 ÂME

How to get your underwear ÂME?

1. Back this project.
2. Click on the Perk you want and enter your payment information and select your garment (colour, size and type).
3. You will then receive a survey via email 3 days from your pledge asking you for your garment preference and shipping details.
4. Once the survey is submitted to us, the garment will be shipped to you within until August.

About US:

I am Marianna M.Evelyn the founder of ÂME. I have been setting up this project for more than 2 years. Two years of illusion, work and steadfastness.

My ideal was to be able to obtain a solution anti-bacteria, anti-fungal fighting the candida one to 100%, absorbent and waterproof, healing, anti-odor, prevents a dermal warming and without seams, all in a garment with the best quality.

It seems to be something new, but I think that it should have happened long time ago.

All the process of the manufacture and the raw materials is from Spain and the garments is made with an exclusive biodegradables natural materials.

Thanks:

I want to say thanks to all people who works with me in this proses, really THANKS a lot!

And all people who coloborate in this crowdfunding THANKS!
 

For me they have been 2 years of project, and would a dream make ÂME posible and created a garment with this innovation and can make and help the day a day of the people.

 

HELP and doubts in info@ameunderwear.com

 

VIDEO: Luis Carrón @luis_carron / @luis.carron

MUSIC: Morning Walk – Jonny Easton

story:
Why we are here

 

All throughout my teenage years and young adult life I have been an avid fan of football and regular exercise. However, sometimes I would hurt my foot because of twisting, and contortion during sports activities. 

During early 2017, I decided to partner with a Japanese trade company to design a revolutionary new pair of socks that would minimize such instances of injury and protect the foot during exercise and with this campaign I intend to bring this new product to as many health enthusiast as possible to improve the quality of their exercise. 

 

About Spocker socks

 

Our innovative design incorporates all the best virtues you would like in a pair of socks.

Special fibres, interlaced and running along the side of the sock pulls the foot upwards laterally to keep it stable. The sock is specially designed to compress specific areas of the foot to improve blood flow hence removing lactic acid and excess water from the feet. 

 

The cuff of the sock is very soft and made from special woolen fibers  to ensure no stretch marks appear on your leg after wearing them for many hours. In addition the fibers contain scented mint flavor to minimize smells that come from sweaty feet.  These keep the foot fresh so you do not feel embarrassed when removing your socks. 

 

We believe Spocker socks will make a difference in the experiences of millions of people who love outdoor activities and sports. 

 

The money raised from crowdfunding campaigns will go towards furthering our marketing efforts and  production of the initial batch of socks for distribution.

All throughout my teenage years and young adult life I have been an avid fan of football and regular exercise. However, sometimes I would hurt my foot because of twisting, and contortion during sports activities. 
During early 2017, I decided to partner with a Japanese trade company to design a revolutionary new pair of socks that would minimize such instances of injury and protect the foot during exercise and with this campaign I intend to bring this new product to as many health enthusiast as possible to improve the quality of their exercise. 
 
About Spocker socks
 
Our innovative design incorporates all the best virtues you would like in a pair of socks.
Special fibres, interlaced and running along the side of the sock pulls the foot upwards laterally to keep it stable. The sock is specially designed to compress specific areas of the foot to improve blood flow hence removing lactic acid and excess water from the feet. 
 
The cuff of the sock is very soft and made from special woolen fibers  to ensure no stretch marks appear on your leg after wearing them for many hours. In addition the fibers contain scented mint flavor to minimize smells that come from sweaty feet.  These keep the foot fresh so you do not feel embarrassed when removing your socks. 
 
We believe Spocker socks will make a difference in the experiences of millions of people who love outdoor activities and sports. 
 
The money raised from crowdfunding campaigns will go towards furthering our marketing efforts and  production of the initial batch of socks for distribution.

story:
Introducing

No need to compromise, we have the perfect wallet for you. From our first campaign, we found that some people valued features in a wallet that others didn't. It turns out most people fit into three categories minimalist, versatilist, and power user. That is why we created three differnt wallets, The Clique Minimal, Clique Slim and The Clique Plus. Each model designed to fit your unique lifestyle.

 

The Clique Minimal Sticks to the core features. Perfect for those who only care about the bare essentials.

  • Quick Loading
  • Quick Access
  • Stores 1-8 cards
  • Available in 5 colors

  

The Clique Slim is versatile. Perfect for people who want the flexibility to carry more or less.

  • Quick Loading
  • Quick Access
  • Store 1-4 Cards on the front and/or 1-6 cards on the back (10 cards total)
  • Store cash
  • Available in 20 unique color combinations

The Clique Plus is perfect for your demanding needs. Designed for people who love the idea of an all-in-one. 

  • Quick Loading 
  • Quick Access 
  • Store 1-8 cards 
  • Store Cash 
  • Available in 20 unique color combinations
  • Hidden Slot (For storing keys, coins, SD cards etc.)
  • Can become a smart wallet with the addition of a Tile Mate

Carry More

Store your essential items in the hidden slot.

Clique Plus without strap for demonstration

Smart Capable

Throw in a Tile Mate tracking device to add tracking features to the Clique Plus. The Tile Mate will allow you to find your wallet whether it's miles away or misplaced at home.

 

Each wallet was built around the core features that our previous backers love us for, Quick Loading and Quick Access. Features you will enjoy every time you use your wallet.

Quick Loading

Quickly Load your cards

Quick Access

Quickly Access any card

RFID Friendly 

Take advantage of the convenience of RFID technology.  Each Clique model is RFID friendly.

 

Truly customize your wallet. Choose from 5 base colors (Carbon Black, Titanium Gray, Champaigne Gold, Berry Blue or Cherry Red) and from 4 strap colors (Black, Gray, Navy or Red) for up to 20 color combinations.

Clique Minimal Color Options

Black Strap

Gray Strap

Red Strap

Navy Strap

  

Dimensions

size comparison to a traditional wallet

Our design philosophy is very straight forward if it doesn't have to be there, it won't be. It's easy to attach parts with screws rivets or hinges and much harder to achieve the same function without them. Also, adding screws rivets or hinges not only adds size and weight but increases the probability of failure. That is why we worked relentlessly to come up with a design that cleverly avoided the use of any screws rivets or hinges. 

Material and Finish

Each wallet is machined from aerospace grade aluminum T6 6061. A tough, sturdy, yet light weight material. After the machining process each wallet is blasted with fine glass beads to obtain a matt finish. The wallets are then sent off to get anodized and bright dipped to achieve a smooth durable and colorful finish. 

Production Plan 

First Month

  • Wait for money to clear (3-4 weeks) 
  • Place Order with machinist 

Second Month 

  • Pick up machined wallets 
  • Quality check 
  • Produce packaging 

Third Month 

  • Have wallets anodized 
  • Have wallets lasered 

Fourth Month

  • Package wallets 
  • Ship orders

 

Risks and challenges

At Grand Valor we want to produce quality products for everyone to enjoy. We want the 10000th wallet to be just as good as the first. Therefore, we require a highly-qualified production team. Fortunately, through our previous campaign, we were able to assemble a team of the very best machinists, anodizers, laser engravers and packagers. Having already accomplished this step, we feel very confident in delivering The Clique Wallets to our backers in a timely manner. In fact, we have been working out the kinks to achieve an even smoother production flow. As for shipping, we are very familiar with the process. In our previous campaign, we were able to ship our product all over the US and across the world. We look forward to getting the Clique Wallets in your hands.

Therefore, we require a highly-qualified production team. Fortunately, through our previous campaign, we were able to assemble a team of the very best machinists, anodizers, laser engravers and packagers. Having already accomplished this step, we feel very confident in delivering The Clique Wallets to our backers in a timely manner. In fact, we have been working out the kinks to achieve an even smoother production flow. As for shipping, we are very familiar with the process. In our previous campaign, we were able to ship our product all over the US and across the world. We look forward to getting the Clique Wallets in your hands.

story:
The Story:

I was browsing through Instagram one day when I came across an ad about a hat company called dad hat apparel. I clicked on the ad and found a variety of unique and really cool hats. I wondered why I had never seen this company before and thought to myself "what if all these unique early stage companies were marketed on one platform." I then proceeded to purchase a hat but found that they only ship to America, something which KUIRQY will fix with its worldwide shipping option. 

 

 

 

What We Need 

In order to develop our prototype we need £20,000 in order to produce the complex modern app we are looking to create. We will have a social media section displaying fashion news and bloggers writing about fashion as well as a 'my outfit' section where you can try out different outfits on a mannequin. 

Failing to reach the full funding would force us to look to other routes for investment.

We have a variety of great perks to thank you for your investment!

The Impact

KUIRQY will bridge the gap between consumers and early stage fashion brands (ESB's). Many ESB's invest heavily on their unique products however thus lack the funds to market their product to a global scale. With the investment KUIRQY will be able to successfully market the products provided by the ESB's to the world. 

Our team boasts the perfect combination of youth and experience. With Yann Spottiswood, Biram Sy and Roel Van Reenen providing youthful entrepreneurial energy and the golden oldies (David Spottiswood and Dennis Willesen) providing a wealth of experience in the commerce sector. 

With your help we can develop the prototype needed to move to the next stage of our business! We value any support and hope that in the future your shopping experiences will all be improved through KURQY Fashion.

How to Help

Aside from financial assistance we would love it if you could spread the KUIRQY word and help us make a name for ourselves!!!
