story:
An Irishman and a Swiss gentleman went to a bar in Hong Kong and … it should be the start of a classic joke but this was the start of a new direction for watches – the first since the digital watch arrived on the scene – SNGLRTY the one handed watch with accurate minute display.

It was the process of reading time from a watch, both the classical two handed analogue and the digital display that had caught our interest - there had been no evolution in the display of time that simplified the reading of time – until now. Telling time from the classic two hand display needs to be decrypted from the positions of the hands, in contrast a digital display presents an answer. Our challenge was to display the time so that it does not require decryption but utilising a classic analogue movement.

The logical consequence was to use the 12 hour display, but the challenge was to display the minutes accurately with the classic sweep of the hour hand. The solution to this challenge is the core of SNGLRTY, by sending the minutes counter clockwise all the information for accurate time reading could be presented at a single location and assimilated in a single glance.

SNGLRTY, the long overdue next step in the evolution of the chronometer, was born. SNGLRTY reaches out to those who identify themselves as different from the crowd and embrace new technology and innovation. They cherish the precision of a Swiss watch, the desire to differentiate themselves from the crowd and to have a conversation as well as timepiece.

The Team

The Swiss gentleman is Daniel Blunschi and has the passion of watches in his blood, as many Swiss do. He possesses over 30 years of experience working in the watch industry developing watches and presentation tools for some of the most famous watch brands in the world.

Stephen Mansfield, the Irishman, started out studying engineering and has spent 16 years living in Japan working for banks, a hedge fund and then managing hotels. He is now a serial entrepreneur focusing on projects that challenge and engage him and the world around us.

Steve on the left and Daniel on the right

The Journey

That moment in the bar was in early 2015, from there we spent time looking at the watch market and reviewing patents going back as far as the records went.  Our hunch was that our idea was unique so we christened our project “OHI” for one hand indication. There are many single handed watches on the market that oblige the wearer to guess the exact time but there was not a single handed watch that displayed the accurate time – until now. We had stumbled onto a simple concept in the field of watch making. Simple but never done before.

 

SNGLRTY was the answer to the questions we had posed to ourselves that night. A single handed watch with a contra rotating minute disc designed to focus the eye on a single point where all the information is displayed. In short, a mechanical chronometer that can present the time accurately and be read efficiently with a single glance.

SNGLRTY is the only analogue timepiece capable presenting the time to the reader with the simplicity of the digital watch but the beauty and elegance of a traditional, accurate, mechanical chronometer.

We filed our patent application in October 2015 and started to develop the prototypes, Daniel knew that the only place in the world to develop and produce a watch with such technical challenges and the desired quality was the heart of the global watch industry – Switzerland.

It was not until the summer of 2017 that we finally managed to have 20 working prototypes - the Zero series was completed and almost concurrently on 15 August 2017 we were awarded US Patent 9,733,618 for a Timepiece With a Single Hand For Simultaneously Indicating Both Hours And Minutes.  Our hunch that this was a unique concept had been substantiated.

This Campaign

This campaign is the next step in the journey of SNGLRTY and we hope you will support us in this critical next step to make this evolution in watches available to everyone. Since that night almost 3 years ago in the bar we have felt obliged to ensure our innovation makes it to market, we have worked with some of the best watch engineers in the world but at each step it has been just the two of us taking each step to bring this innovation to fruition. As you can imagine we have spent a great deal of time (and money) to ensure that everything that is presented here can be offered with great confidence.  We both understand that each of our watches represents a material commitment for each of our backers, but you may rest assured as we have assembled 20 timepieces and each has been keeping the time accurately for over 6 months! When you select one of our beautiful Swiss Made watches you will receive a distinguished and unique piece protected by our US Patent.  

Through the development we have sought to keep our costs as low as possible, and we intend to continue that through the launch of SNGLRTY.  Using all of our knowledge we are able to offer a unique Swiss Made SNGLRTY watch for less than CHF1000, this is a remarkable price for a mechanical movement watch, but if you would like to have something more special and exclusive, that reflects your choices, then we have an offer to meet your desires.  As each watch will be hand assembled in Switzerland we are able to keep our threshold to launch very low – at US$40,000 – but we hope that we will raise this target many times over.

What We Need & What You Get

SNGLRTY is an absolutely unique, highly recognizable product and working prototypes (some of which are available for purchase) are already in circulation. For the launch of SNGLRTY we want to deliver the highest quality at an affordable price, and the best way to do that is by delivering directly to our customers.

SNGLRTY is the only analogue timepiece capable presenting the time to the reader with the simplicity of the digital watch but the beauty and elegance of a traditional, accurate, mechanical chronometer.

For the launch of Series One we have developed three ranges of watches with the aim of satisfying as many different expectations as possible – but all featuring our patented One Hand Indication, individually numbered and a 2 year international warranty.

To celebrate the launch of  SNGLRTY we have created the OHI2 - Limited Edition. Pared back to the very essence of SNGLRTY, this wonderfully simple execution is based on the SELLITA SW200 movement and has a simplified face with no date indication.  There are 5 elements to this watch face 1) the hour index, 2) the minute index, 3) the central disc, 4) the second index and finally the hand itself.  Each backer who selects an OHI2 - Limited Edition will be able to select the colour of each of these elements, so there will be 32 combinations available.  We do not have all these combinations available for you to select from, but here are 3 variations so you can see the impact.

Starting here with the "All White" - well with the exception of the second index for a bit of character.

Here we have mixed it up a bit with black hour index, white minute index, black centre disc, white second index and a white hand.  

And finally, for now, the black version where everything is black with the exception of the second index and the hand.  In this version we have indicated luminescence on the hour index and the hand. 

For those looking for more individualism and more precision we have the SNGLRTY OHI3 and OHI4 ranges.  The only difference between the OHI3 and OHI4 ranges is the movement that is chosen, the OHI3 range uses the Sellita SW300 Elabore which and the OHI4 range uses the Sellita SW300 Premium Execution Fully Decorated, this is the most accurate movement and is decorated on the mass and the bridge of the movement.  For the full comparison of the differences in these movements you can go to our website HERE. 

The photograph above shows the Cote De Geneve decoration on the mass of the movement and the Pearlage decoration on the bridge of the movement. 

Once you have selected which movement you would like the selection process is all about configuration of your watch face, there are six elements to the watch face and there are a number of options for each of the elements as follows: 

  1. The hour index is available in Galvanic Blue, Galvanic Black Gold, White & Black.
  2. The minute index is available in Galvanic Silver and Galvanic Black
  3. The decor plate is available silver, black gold and blue - all with Cote de Geneve decoration
  4. Second index is available in silver and black gold
  5. The date index is available in silver and black
  6. Finally, the hand is available in Black and Silver

This gives a total number of 192 combinations - so it is quite likely that you will have a very unique piece when you make the selections.  You will be able to look through the gallery of photos we have here and see all these individual pieces in the photos, but for everyone who selects to support us with the OHI3 or OHI4 execution we will contact you when the campaign period is over and work with you to select your combination. 

The above shows black hour index, white date index, white minute index, silver decor plate with Cote de Geneve, silver second index and black hand.  We also show a black saffiano leather watch band. 

And, if that is not enough, for those who would wish to create your own watch based around the patented SNGLRTY display we have a special option to design your own watch.  You will have a personal meeting with our renowned Swiss watch designer who will create a design for your own watch and we will have it produced and assembled for you. There are some limitations on this one (for example addition of precious metals or stones will have to be charged in addition after the design is complete) please ask us if you are interested, but you can see more details HERE.

Reviews & Press

We have been very fortunate to have received a number of reviews from the press and Daniel and i have also taken part in a podcast.  Please find the links below to each of these reviews, as more come in we will update this section.

                      

 

 

 

Other Options

OHI App – We created this app before we had even engaged the Swiss engineers and used it to explain the functionality in those early days.  But, for a small donation we will make it available to you.  Please do not get too excited, it is very simple and only available for Android currently, but we intend to continue developing it and will release the Apple version as soon as possible.

Magnifying Loupe - These ultra-lightweight aluminum watchmakers’ loupes have been designed for all our watchmaker enthusiasts.  Available in rose gold, black and gunmetal the loupe comes with a 4X magnification mineral glass lens that is held in place with a screw top so the magnification can be altered simply and quickly by exchanging the lens.

Travel Watch Pouch – Each of our limited edition watches will be delivered in one of these beautiful hand crafted leather travel cases; it has been designed to be compact yet giving your watch excellent protection.  The pouch is made from the finest fine grained calfskin leather, is hand crafted to our own unique design, the edges are buffed and painted and further reinforced with black stitching which results in a strikingly simple, tactile and elegant case.

Multi-Tool – This incredible little tool will come with each and every watch delivered, also designed by Daniel and Stephen.  This compact tool holds 6 tools in its body for easy transport and flexibility.  This one will come with the tools for changing your watch band quickly and easily.

Watch Roll – This magnificent piece is handcrafted with the utmost attention to detail and will accompany all our premium range of watches. The felt lined cocoon will protect each watch from the world outside. Handcrafted from the finest fine grained calfskin leather, the closing strap runs the whole circumference of the case closing with a Signature Edition SWISS REIMAGINED watch buckle.

Watch Band Pack – So you can create an even more unique watch we will have a large selection of watch bands available for you to choose from, so many that  we cannot list them all here!  We will make sure everyone has the correct length of strap but with this pack you will be able to select 5 styles of your choice and they will be delivered with your watch for an even more personalised experience.   

 

About Shipping, Returns & Exchanges

What is your returns & exchanges policy?

If anything you receive from us is defective or broken, we will replace it or, if it is a watch we will ask you to return it to us so that we may repair it. Obviously if it is a watch that has been configured specifically for you then it may take a bit of time to have it repaired and returned to you – if this should happen your understanding will be appreciated.

When will I receive my product? What if I receive it past the listed date?

Daniel has been in the business of making watches all his professional life, and in collaboration with our engineers and watchmakers in Switzerland, who have made millions of watches, we are confident that we can deliver as promised. We have already started planning and will be placing orders with our suppliers as soon as we know we are funded.

We will honor our timelines as best as we can.

What happens if I never receive the product?

We have 20 prototype watches produced and ready to go, and each and every watch will be made the same way – individually by hand by a skilled Swiss watchmaker.  We are confident of our partners in Switzerland so we foresee no issues in delivering the product to you.  If we are not able to ship to you, we’ll refund your money.

How much is internationally shipping? Am I responsible for taxes and duties in my country?

We will cover shipping to USA, Canada and Europe. For areas outside of this, we will charge a an additional fee depending on the product. This extra fee will help us cover some of the costs we incur in shipping it to your door. Keep in mind that you are responsible for paying your own country’s taxes and duties when the products arrive.

Can you ship to my country?

There are some countries we are not able to ship to, we will review every order and let you know if we are not able to ship to your location, if that is the case we will work with you to resolve the problem.  If we are not able to find a solution then we will refund your money to you. If you would like to confirm before you place an order please do not hesitate to contact us.

If You Have Made It This Far

If you have made it this far you clearly like what we are doing, but perhaps it is not what you are looking for - that is OK we understand not everyone likes Swiss made mechanical watches.  But if you like what we are about then please do not hesitate to share the word through social media and the Indigogo share tools just #SNGLRTYWATCH.  We love you for reading to the end!

story:
The Vanilla Project

You deserve much more than just smelling good. You deserve to feel uniquely you. Wearing an eco-responsible fragrance, made with heart and art.

Regain the artist in you and support an ethical perfume creation!

By helping me creating this Vanilla centered perfume, you are not only supporting a small indie French Perfume Brand, but you are also caring for the earth and investing in an ethically produced fragrance, MADE IN PROVENCE, by an independent perfume designer.

Who am I?

My name is Anatole Lebreton. In the heart of green Provence, I create unique fragrances that reflect my journey off the beaten track, from amateur to self-taught perfumer. In complete freedom, by mastering the creative process from A to Z, I’m committed to sharing my passion for beautiful smell with passionate people through original, artisanal and audacious fragrances.

The Vanilla Project is a new and innovative perfume development where the accent will be made on sourcing beautiful sustainable, renewable raw materials (vanilla essence, sandalwood amongst others). The final product will be presented in a recycled kraft paper box. And for each bottle sold, a donation will be made for the One tree planted program.

What I need:

The total cost of this perfume development and production is 12100 €. I'm bringing 4900 € from my personal funds. Then, I need your help. 7200 € on a flexible goal is what I need to continue to work on this exciting project. If we reach the goal: fantastic! If we exceed the set goal: all the money will go into increasing production. 

Raising the necessary 7200€ would support the creation and production of The Vanilla Project, from the trials, regulation tests, to buying the raw materials, including boxes and bottles and producing the full bottles of perfume.

Why I need it:

  • Creating the formula, conducting trials = that’s my favorite part and it’s already started. It’s a passion, but it also costs a bit of money.
  • Producing the eco-boxes. I have the prototype, now it needs to be sent to production for 1500 recycle kraft paper boxes. 

  • Buying the necessary empty bottles + caps
  • Sourcing sustainable materials (vanilla, sandalwood amongst others) = it takes a bit of research, testing the quality of the materials and checking their provenance.
  • Buying raw materials. Great raw materials like pure vanilla can be VERY expensive. (To give you an idea: 100g of pure vanilla absolute costs around 1000 €) 
  • Conducting security tests: regulations compliance, patch test, toxicology... = boring and very expensive too - around 2500 € - but compulsory. Your safety is important and this has to be conducted before putting the fragrance on the market.
  • Producing the fragrance (mixing the ingredients, maceration, putting into alcohol and labeling).  That's the moment the dream becomes real. 
  • And finally: marketing, creating the story and the advertising supports.

That's a lot of work... and I'm totally involved in all the steps with my working partners to check that it all goes well. 

What you get

With any cent you donate, you’ll get my endless gratitude, a smile on my face and on all the people involved to make sure this project will see the light.

And you can get many different gifts:

  • Support 5 to 20 €, and you'll get a sample of the final scent.
  • Receive samples of raw materials + of the final scent for 40€
  • Meet the perfumer (Paris, Nice, Grasse,  Milan, Los Angeles) for 70€
  • Pre-sell: receive a bottle of the final product valued 120 €  for 95 €
  • Receive a bottle of the final product and samples of the raw materials 135 €
  • Join the focus group: 275 € (and help to choose the final scent, the name and work on the story + you’ll receive the final product with a special dedication)
  • Sponsor- your name will be added to the marketing media as a sponsor, and of course, you'll get a bottle:  500 €

The Schedule: 

March - April 2020 - Crowdfunding- production of the boxes

April - May 2020 - work on the formula with the focus group - selecting raw materials - buying bottles. 

June 2020 - start of the testing process, regulation compliance

July 2020 - start the production of the fragrance

September 2020 - official launch. 

The impact:

Innovation: My last fragrance was created with a focus group of perfume lovers that have become active witnesses to the development of the upcoming fragrance. This new project makes a step forward in innovation by integrating ethical sourcing and being socially responsible.

We are caring for the earth and we want to make sure that our beauty products are also keeping the beauty of this planet we’re walking on.

Risks and challenges:

Small brands like mine often have few means and need financial support to shape their dreams.  I’ve learned over the years, that it’s not enough to be a great artist and have the guts to realize your most crazy ideas. It takes also some skills to grow a successful business.

On the other hand, it’s not enough to just build a business if it has no soul and heart, if it’s not contributing to the greater good. The new generation of entrepreneur wants also to create a better world.

I’m challenging myself and my company with this new project. And I make a bet that it will be successful, for me, for you -you’ll get a beautiful perfume and I hope you will love it- and for the earth. We are all partners to make the world a better place to live, that smell awesome.

Other Ways You Can Help

I know, you maybe can’t afford to donate money, even for a cause you support. There are other ways to help! By spreading the word is one, and I’m truly grateful if you do so.

Get the word out and make some noise, click on the share button!

 I’m really excited about this project with you!!
story_txt:
The Vanilla Project
You deserve much more than just smelling good. You deserve to feel uniquely you. Wearing an eco-responsible fragrance, made with heart and art.
Regain the artist in you and support an ethical perfume creation!
By helping me creating this Vanilla centered perfume, you are not only supporting a small indie French Perfume Brand, but you are also caring for the earth and investing in an ethically produced fragrance, MADE IN PROVENCE, by an independent perfume designer.
Who am I?
My name is Anatole Lebreton. In the heart of green Provence, I create unique fragrances that reflect my journey off the beaten track, from amateur to self-taught perfumer. In complete freedom, by mastering the creative process from A to Z, I’m committed to sharing my passion for beautiful smell with passionate people through original, artisanal and audacious fragrances.
The Vanilla Project is a new and innovative perfume development where the accent will be made on sourcing beautiful sustainable, renewable raw materials (vanilla essence, sandalwood amongst others). The final product will be presented in a recycled kraft paper box. And for each bottle sold, a donation will be made for the One tree planted program.

What I need:
The total cost of this perfume development and production is 12100 €. I'm bringing 4900 € from my personal funds. Then, I need your help. 7200 € on a flexible goal is what I need to continue to work on this exciting project. If we reach the goal: fantastic! story:
ABOUT INKAMODA  

We empower women through sustainable fashion, and provide them training and job opportunities so they can produce beautiful alpaca products with high standards to sell in international markets.  We rescue ancient techniques from Inca culture like natural dyes and special weaving techniques.

OUR STORY

Hi, I'm Vari Garcia, co-founder and designer of INKAMODA, a family-owned sustainable fashion business in Cuzco, Peru, close to Machupicchu (one of the wonders of the world). We partner with Andean communities to create modern fashion using alpaca fiber and natural dyes.

Alpaca fiber is one of the finest fibers in the world, soft, hypoallergenic, warm and lightweigth, but the communities that raise alpacas often life in poverty.

We are commited to fair trade and empowering the communities we work with. When you purchase from INKAMODA, you help us provide transformational wages, resources, opportunities and support for our artisans and their families.

By supporting our campaign you will provide more job opportunities for  women and their families in the Andean communities of Cuzco Peru, giving them a better quality of life.

Know that each piece is Eco-friendly and made with sustainable materials  that are developed using a sustainable process in an environment of harmony, love and respect.

ALPACA: GOLD OF THE ANDES 

In the time of the Incas, royalty considered garments made of alpaca fiber to be their most precious and valuable.  The reason for this is alpaca fiber's characteristics of being soft, warm, lightweight, breathable, durable, and sustainable.  Alpaca fiber thermal regulates and keeps your body at its natural temperature.

 

 

WHY WE NEED YOUR SUPPORT

Help us reach our $10,000 goal to provide more job opportunities and employ more women in a new community in the Andes of Peru.

That will cover costs associated with providing our new artisans with workspace, equipment, and technical training.

ABOUT THE DESIGNER

Vari Garcia is an international award-winning fashion designer by Melange INC - USA, a worldwide platform for artists and entrepreneurs of diverse backgrounds. The community is powered by their shared values around diversity and Human rights.

In 2017, Vari won an innovation award by PROMPERU. In 2018 Vari won a scholarship by YLAI (Young Leaders of American initiative), where she met Corielle Heath CEO of Liftuplift Worldwide a company dedicated to creating safe and inclusive communities for women. Shemeon Williams is the CEO of LUVO Cinematography and a YLAI fellow. Natasha Casanova is the CEO of Kathmandu Yogi; all three visited Vari in Cuzco - Peru in April 2019. Together they visited three Andean communities, helped and supported with making the documentary video and project training.

 We worked with Miss Peru, Alexandra Liao, as our model and collaborator,as seen in the picture below.

 

WEAVERS & ARTISANS COLLABORATORS GROUPS  

SUSTAINABILITY AND LOVE IN TIMES OF COVID

The fashion industry has been one of the most vulnerable and affected industries during the coronavirus pandemic, with thousands of retail stores closing. It has left buyers, fashion editors, designers, and models (among other figures with ties to the industry) concerned.

It takes a crisis to form a tactic, and fashion is no exception. Some of the best designs were born from struggle.

This is a wake-up call for both us as consumers and for the industry as a whole. The threat that this pandemic holds over our heads is a call to action for the fashion industry to slow down, move away from mass production and change direction.

It’s a call to start being more creative and to focus on the sustainability of the garments. To make fashion a source of happiness and well-being for those who produce it and for those who consume it.

To create sustainable and ethical fashion, with a system of social responsibility where each part of the value chain can participate and grow.

To create eco-friendly pieces and made with sustainable materials that are developed using a sustainable process in an environment of harmony, love and respect.

At Inkamoda, we are remaining safe and strong, and we understand that we are all in this together. This crisis is a challenge for us, but we are continue looking for the positive outcome and working every day to find opportunities for our business and our workers.

Thank you so much for being a supporter of this project and becoming part of our  family :).

INKAMODA Team.

story:
This journey started with my passion for the beach. I love the sand beneath my feet, the smell of the sea, and the beautiful creatures that live within it. I wanted my look to always give off an ocean vibe, so everyone I encountered would know about my admiration for the sea. 

This is when I began to make jewelry to represent my love for the beach. Now, I would like to share this passion with you all! I have handcrafted many different types and styles of jewelry, so anyone could find something they like here. Many of my items are beach inspired, so what better name for my business than COASTAL LOVE.​

Without the beach and sea creatures as inspiration, my jewelry line would not have been possible. Therefore, it is my mission to keep our beaches and coastlines clean! I pledge to donate 10% of net profits from Coastal Love to Ocean Conservancy to aid with coastline cleanup. It is my goal to increase my brand awareness so, I can not only to promote my jewelry but, to help clean our planet!

With your support we can make a difference to our world! ♡

​

​

​

story:
Swtch is for you!

Conquer the day with our patent-pending comfy and sporty tear-away underwear, designed with the active womxn in mind. These leak-positive undies give you the option you’ve always wanted - to switch ‘em out! Swtch sets are pre-packaged in our handy go-bag, so you can "swtch" wherever your day takes you.Moisture-wicking technology keeps these undies dryer, longer, and our soft Tencel liner (made from Eucalyptus fibers) keeps you breathing easy. The underwear base fabrics are a heavier weight to ensure the underwear’s balanced construction and long life span. The soft, high-tech fasteners are flexible, soft, and stay flat beneath your clothes. Whether you’re going from pilates to work, cycling through your day, or out on a 3-day hike, Swtch has you covered. 

                                 

Our Story

The active apparel industry has transformed over time to meet the needs of our dynamic lifestyles. The only thing missing is an underwear product that's as versatile as our wardrobe.

Introducing Swtch, an underwear brand that can finally keep up. Designed for performance and comfort, our sporty & sustainable tear-away underwear gives you the choice to stay in your undies… or not! We offer womxn the option to change their underwear quickly and easily, without having to strip those sweaty leggings off first. We openly acknowledge and support all types of leaks, as well as the importance of vaginal & urinary health, and understand that not all womxn want to commit to one pair all day. Above all, Swtch encourages womxn to honor their bodies and enjoy the hustle. 

Why We Care

Womxn are often pressured to believe that their vaginas need to be perfect; the right amount of dry or wet, smelling like a rose, and picture-perfect (whatever that means). We feel embarrassed talking about our vaginas and underwear because of this. At Swtch, we’re cutting the bullshit. We’re talking about when, where, and why we’re dying to change into a fresh pair of underwear. We’re talking about vaginal discharge, blood, pee, sweat, you name it. We’re here to say that there’s no such thing as the perfect vagina because let’s face it, they’re all perfect.

"For me, being a womxn is about embracing your unique gifts, and standing up for your needs with healthy boundaries, self-love, and self-trust. The Swtch mission is to encourage womxn to feel empowered by their versatility and multifaceted individuality."

- CEO & Founder, Isabel Muller

Isabel's passion for building the Swtch brand roots from her dream for womxn to feel confident, comfortable, and safe voicing their needs.

Environmental Impact:

A sustainable lifestyle is a waste-free one! Womxn are still using non-compostable and non-recyclable liners and pads on the daily to keep dry. By using Swtch products, womxn can cut down on their daily waste, and at the same time, solve a major annoyance we’ve struggled with for a long time: having to take your entire outfit off to simply change your underwear. Swtch products encourage a waste-free lifestyle while offering convenience and comfort.

                             

Where We Are Now

So far we have an MVP (minimum viable product) and have launched our website and social media. We have all our vendors scheduled and after a little more fine-tuning, we will be ready for mass production. 

We Need: In order to press play on production, we need to raise $35,000. This will cover:

  • Minimum First Production: Manufacture of Underwear & Accessory Products
  • Remaining Legal Services
  • Formational Team
  • Additional Product Design & Development
  • Preliminary Shipping  & Fulfillment
  • Promotional Events & Marketing

Perks for Donating: We're offering 3 different perks for donations:

  • Swtch Kit 1: x2 pairs Swtch underwear + handy go-bag
  • Swtch Kit 2: x4 pairs Swtch underwear + x2 handy go-bags + FREE Swtch gift 
  • Swtch Kit 3: x6 pairs Swtch underwear + x3 handy go-bags + wash bag + FREE Swtch gift

 

PRE-ORDER YOUR SWTCH KIT HERE. 15% OF PROCEEDS WILL BE DONATED TO DIRECT RELIEF, IN SUPPORT OF FIRST RESPONDERS.

photo taken from https://www.directrelief.org/

 

If we don't reach our goal, the funds will be allocated to priority areas and we will proceed to launch under a presale platform. No matter what, 15% of the proceeds will be donated as promised!

 

Other Ways You Can Help

Show us love on social!

  • Follow us on Instagram
  • Like us on Facebook
  • Spread the news! Forward our page to the badass womxn in your life.

Thank you!

XOXO, The Swtch Team

Thank you!XOXO, The Swtch Team

story:
Introducing a MAJOR breakthrough in footwear technology.

Edensoles, Dynamic Customization continuously shapes to the contour of your feet from step to step while providing the perfect level of arch support

We spend much of the day on our feet.

As a result of not having the proper footwear, most people hardly perform up to a fraction of their potential due to foot pain, back pain and fatigue.

Tired of suffering from foot pain day after day?

Edensoles shape to the contour of your feet STEP-AFTER-STEP, adapting to the changing demands of a tiring day from morning to evening.

 

After years of development, we are excited to introduce Edensoles to the Kickstarter community first!

The bottom layer is made of soft, yet stable polyurethane for comfort and flexibility. The middle layer contains cavities filled with a specialized polymer made to shape to your arch and toes upon body weight and changing pressure. The top layer is made of slow release, anti-sweat foam covered by anti-slip, breathable fabric.

 

Great for casual, sport and formal shoes!

Our two styles will provide superior support and comfort for men and women whether you are working out or heading to a business meeting.

 

 

 

For more formal shoes that tend to have less room, we have a thinner version using EVA as the bottom material.

 

The insoles contain two pockets under the arch and toes filled with a moldable polymer that immediately shapes perfectly to your feet.

The polymer is formulated to provide a fine balance of strong support with flexible comfort.

WAIT ONE MINUTE!

Don't confuse our product with old technology.

Dynamic Customization is unlike memory foam, foot molds, heating customization, feet scanning machines or other static devices.

It shapes to your feet and does not bounce back to its original shape or just remain static. Rather it continuously shapes perfectly to the contour of the user's feet.

Several years ago I went to a podiatrist to get a pair of orthotic insoles. He took a mold of my feet, sent them to a lab and $700 later I got the most uncomfortable pieces of plastic that I could hardly keep in my shoes.

In truth, although I was frustrated by my new purchase, it was a great day in my life because it got me started on the research that led me to the creation of "Dynamic Customization". I asked myself why the insoles had to be hard, why must one sacrifice comfort for the sake of support. I asked many questions of podiatrists, biomechanic engineers, shoe designers and many people who wore shoe inserts.

It was clear that other than the small percentage of people who need their insoles to compensate for more complex issues, hundreds of millions of people just need some extra arch support and additional comfort.

 

After seven years of hard work, testing and more research on the biomechanics of the foot, and development of the proper material, me and my development team of some of the world top footwear designers, helped bring my dream into reality. I had reached our goal, "Dynamic Customization".

Unbelievable comfort, total support, constantly changing throughout the day and a specially customized toe grip to help provide extra stability and grip to spring forward when running.

 

Help us spread the word about our new product! Take 30 seconds and share our campaign on social media. :)

 

 

 

 

 

 

 

 

 

 

 

 

 

Risks and challenges

We have spent over seven years developing "Dynamic Customization" insole technology. Although we have a finished product ready to share with you, there is still a major expenses ahead as we prepare to mass-produce and launch our product worldwide. After all this hard work creating such an exciting product, the last thing we want is to see it fizzle away due to the lack of the required funding. You can play a critical role in making this dream come true. We are almost there. Help us pass the finish line.
story_txt:
Introducing a MAJOR breakthrough in footwear technology.

Edensoles, Dynamic Customization continuously shapes to the contour of your feet from step to step while providing the perfect level of arch support

We spend much of the day on our feet. 

As a result of not having the proper footwear, most people hardly perform up to a fraction of their potential due to foot pain, back pain and fatigue.

Tired of suffering from foot pain day after day?
Edensoles shape to the contour of your feet STEP-AFTER-STEP, adapting to the changing demands of a tiring day from morning to evening.
 

After years of development, we are excited to introduce Edensoles to the Kickstarter community first!
The bottom layer is made of soft, yet stable polyurethane for comfort and flexibility. The middle layer contains cavities filled with a specialized polymer made to shape to your arch and toes upon body weight and changing pressure. The top layer is made of slow release, anti-sweat foam covered by anti-slip, breathable fabric.
 
 
Great for casual, sport and formal shoes!

Our two styles will provide superior support and comfort for men and women whether you are working out or heading to a business meeting.

 

 

 

For more formal shoes that tend to have less room, we have a thinner version using EVA as the bottom material.

 

The insoles contain two pockets under the arch and toes filled with a moldable polymer that immediately shapes perfectly to your feet.
The polymer is formulated to provide a fine balance of strong support with flexible comfort.

 
WAIT ONE MINUTE!
Don't confuse our product with old technology.
Dynamic Customization is unlike memory foam, foot molds, heating customization, feet scanning machines or other static devices.

It shapes to your feet and does not bounce back to its original shape or just remain static. Rather it continuously shapes perfectly to the contour of the user's feet.

Several years ago I went to a podiatrist to get a pair of orthotic insoles. He took a mold of my feet, sent them to a lab and $700 later I got the most uncomfortable pieces of plastic that I could hardly keep in my shoes.
In truth, although I was frustrated by my new purchase, it was a great day in my life because it got me started on the research that led me to the creation of "Dynamic Customization". I asked myself why the insoles had to be hard, why must one sacrifice comfort for the sake of support. I asked many questions of podiatrists, biomechanic engineers, shoe designers and many people who wore shoe inserts.
It was clear that other than the small percentage of people who need their insoles to compensate for more complex issues, hundreds of millions of people just need some extra arch support and additional comfort.

 
After seven years of hard work, testing and more research on the biomechanics of the foot, and development of the proper material, me and my development team of some of the world top footwear designers, helped bring my dream into reality. I had reached our goal, "Dynamic Customization".


 


 


Unbelievable comfort, total support, constantly changing throughout the day and a specially customized toe grip to help provide extra stability and grip to spring forward when running.
 

Help us spread the word about our new product! Take 30 seconds and share our campaign on social media. :)
 
 
 
 
 
 
 
 
 
 
 
 
 
 
 
 
 

 
 
 



 
Risks and challenges
We have spent over seven years developing "Dynamic Customization" insole technology. Although we have a finished product ready to share with you, there is still a major expenses ahead as we prepare to mass-produce and launch our product worldwide. After all this hard work creating such an exciting product, the last thing we want is to see it fizzle away due to the lack of the required funding. You can play a critical role in making this dream come true. We are almost there. Help us pass the finish line.

story:
When we set out to make the Dash Travel Wallet, we noticed that there weren’t many travel wallets on the market. The travel wallets that we did find were either too bulky, or too expensive, and most people, including me, were just carrying their passport unprotected.


LOSS PREVENTION

Ask any seasoned traveler what their biggest fear when traveling is, and they’ll all tell you the same thing - losing a passport.


Carrying a passport by itself is ill-advised. It could easily be misplaced when fumbling for your boarding pass, ID, credit card, or money. Our RFID protection will prevent identity theft while in busy airports.


Employees at SFO state that this happens all the time, almost everyday.

We wanted to make a wallet perfect for travel, in the most minimal and simplest form.


A wallet that could hold, not only cash and cards, but your passport, and boarding pass as well. And allow easy access to all of it.


Starting at just $18, the Dash Travel Wallet is not only the most minimal option, but the most economical on the internet.


Designed for you, the international traveler, who knows no boundaries, and is always on the go.


The Dash Travel Wallet is a modern spin on a timeless essential. Do you really want to carry your travel necessities in one of your grandma's old fanny packs?


Of course not.

Next thing you know, you’ll be wearing sandals with socks too.


Whether you’re flying into New York City for a business meeting, or flying to Bali in search of yourself, the Dash Travel Wallet is perfect for you. Stylish enough for any gentleman, or gentlewoman, traveling for business, but rugged enough to tackle any adventure you throw at it.


Don’t waste time stumbling through security. With the Dash Travel Wallet, everything you need to get past the security line is in the palm of your hand. Passport, boarding pass, and everything in between, all in one simple, and quick, travel wallet.


No need to open any zippers, or dig through any bags, just one swift motion, and you’re through.

Exceptionally slim, Dash Travel Wallet is the perfect size for any destination. With pockets designed to hold your passport, ID’s, credit cards, and boarding pass, this is the last travel wallet you will ever need.


The ultra-thin profile will allow comfortable wear with suits or jeans - casual or formal attire.


Unsatisfied with other bulky travel wallets, we set out to make the most minimal, functional travel wallet there is. It is constructed from one-piece of canvas that is folded, sewn, and cut strategically to minimize the size.


The Dash Travel Wallet comes with two side slots to carry cards, one slide slot to carry a boarding pass, and one main slot to carry your passport.


No extra fluff, no unnecessary features, lower the risk of losing any essential items - passport, credit card, ID - when traveling abroad.


WHY THE DASH TRAVEL WALLET?


Simply put, it’s the best travel wallet available. Too often we see travelers losing their passport, or their ID, or their credit card, completely ruining an otherwise perfect vacation. No one should have to worry about these things when traveling.


With the Dash Travel Wallet you can fully enjoy the wonderful experience traveling brings, with the peace of mind that your most important documents are safe and secure.

Minimal, stylish, sleek, and functional, we are confident this little wallet will be your most revered travel companion for years to come.


We asked our manufacturing partners what materials would have the durability to endure our journeys, but also feel so good that we would want to bring them everywhere. They suggested a premium, eco-synthetic leather - the same used in many luxury vehicles, complying with universal stewardship standards across the board. 


We are certain you’ll love the feeling of the super soft, supple canvas on your hand, in your pocket, around the globe. On top of quality, our leather also offers weather resistant protection, ensuring your valuables stay dry wherever the winds may take you.


The minimal simplicity allows for durability by design. In addition, the hand sewn threading and wax oiled edges protect the wallet from fraying from wear and tear.

RFID PROTECTION

We won't bore you with all the details/benefits of why RFID protection is important, but just know the Dash Travel Wallet will protect both your cards and passport from any identity or credit card theft.

OUR PARTNERS

We’ve been producing wallets for three years now, and have made strong relationships with reputable manufacturers that will bring to you the highest quality materials available.


OPTIONS

We will be offering two styles of the Dash Travel Wallet, a pebble leather finish, and a classic leather finish. Choose whichever style suits you best, (or both) and set out to see the world. 


INSPIRATION

We were inspired by the Dash 3.0, when designing the Dash Travel Wallet. We thought the minimalism that the 3.0 brought would be the perfect base for a travel wallet. 


We took the best that the 3.0 had to offer, and added the necessary features for full fledged travel wallet.

 

It turned out to be a match made in heaven.


A little about us - Dash Wallets started over three years ago, thanks to a little pup named Dash, and a little-known website called Kickstarter. He loved to chew through anything leather, so you could just imagine what he did when he got ahold of my old leather wallet.

Thanks to Dash, I set out to create a new, minimal wallet, and the Dash Travel Wallet is product of all our previous wallets.


We are a little company based in San Francisco with the goal of bringing you the best slim, thin, & minimalist wallets. We do so with the integrity and philosophy of always doing our best to deliver quickly, with the best customer service. An unsatisfied customer is never left behind, and we always offer refunds, regardless of the reason.

We have a small team, but we give you big thanks for giving us the opportunity to create products for you.


WARRANTY


We believe in our wallets, and you should too. If anything were to happen to your wallet within the first 2 years, we hope that you will send it back to us for repair or replacement. Under normal conditions and use, the wallet should last you a lifetime.

The Dash Travel Wallet offers very few weak points, providing durable coverage in its sleek design. Just don't pack the thing with excessive cards or cash- it defeats the purpose of a minimal travel wallet.

  • Dimensions: 13.5cm x 10 cm
  • Fits passports up to 12.5 cm x 9 cm x 0.4 cm
  • 1.2 oz
  • Premium eco-synthetic leather
  • Passport sleeve
  • 2-4 cards
  • Section for boarding pass and cash

SHIPPING

Please take note that all perks shown do not include shipping. It is up to you, the backer, to include shipping in your pledge. US shipping begins at $3.00, and International shipping begins at $5.00. If you do forget to add shipping, you can always do so later when we send out BackerKit surveys once the campaign is over. 

PRODUCTION


After numerous assessments on fabrics and designs, we have finished prototyping the wallet using only one piece of leather canvas to ensure a minimal frame and durability.

We can now start production of the wallets for the public. If successful, the production/fulfillment will be planned according to this timeline. We will aim for earlier shipments so that these wallets make for great Christmas gifts.


This is where Indiegogo comes in again. We need your support to launch this line of wallets. We are raising funding for manufacturing, packaging, and logistics for the Dash Travel Wallet.

Your support for the production of these wallets will help to make wallets slimmer all around you.

Thank you for taking the time to check out the project.
